5pzPEpJvjWE.title: The Little Girl Born With No Nose | BORN DIFFERENT
5pzPEpJvjWE.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

Daniele is fundraising for Maria’s treatments, if you would like to donate here: https://www.vakinha.com.br/vaquinha/ajuda-para-maria-joana-daniele-pereira-oliveira 

PRINCESS Maria was born without a nose. Three-year-old Maria, from Ipatinga, Brazil, was born with Bosma arhinia microphthalmia (BAM) Syndrome - an extremely rare genetic condition reportedly known to affect less than 100 people worldwide. Her condition meant she was born without a nose or left eye. Maria has issues with her vision in her right eye and underwent a tracheostomy the day she was born. Maria’s mother, Daniele, 39, refers to her as ‘Princess’. She is raising funds to cover Maria’s day-to-day treatments and hopes her daughter can undergo nasal reconstruction or be fitted with a prosthetic nose implant when she is a bit older. Daniele said: “I want her to remain the warrior that she is, that she’ll be able to look back on everything she’s been through already, in order to see that any difficulties she might face are nothing compared to everything she’s overcome already.” 

Follow Maria here:
https://www.instagram.com/todospormariajoana/ 

Videographer: Bruno Mazzoco
Producers: Becky Robinson & Emika Berry
Editor: Tom Waddington

868Im74h4H0.title: I'm Non-Binary And Bearded - How Will My Blind Date Go? | DATING DIFFERENT
868Im74h4H0.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AS a non-binary bearded woman, it can be difficult navigating the world of modern dating. 28-year-old Klyde from Omaha, Nebraska, is determined to find the special person that would look past their excess facial hair and like them for who they are. Klyde began growing a beard at 21 years old when they started on a testosterone treatment as part of their female to male transition. "Over time I realised that my gender is more complicated than that, so now I identify as a non-binary bearded woman, but I kept the beard and the name because I like them and they suit me," Klyde said. Klyde has had some negative experiences with dating apps where people called them 'disgusting'. But it hasn't put Klyde off from finding love - they are going on a blind date in hopes that their date would be open-minded about their beard. Klyde said: "I'm feeling a mixture of nervous and excited but I feel confident about my date seeing my beard. It's not something that makes me feel self-conscious anymore."

Follow Klyde here:
https://www.instagram.com/that_bitch_on_wheels/

Follow Eli here:
https://www.instagram.com/eli.te_hair/
https://www.instagram.com/strwb3rrii_sh0rtsk8/

Videographer: Esai
Producers: Emilia Jiang & Yasmin Walker
Editor: Sonia Estal

rZH0b4sLUYw.title: I Started With $20 - Now I'm Making 7 Figures A Year | BLING LIFE
rZH0b4sLUYw.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

NAZLIA Yunus started her jewellery business, Chvker, whilst studying medicine at college with just $20 worth of stock. The company is now making seven figures, and Naz's designs have been worn by the likes of Kylie Jenner, Bella Hadid and Addison Rae. It’s taken time to build up her success, and during the early days, Naz recalls working from morning to night to fulfil all her commitments. Naz told Truly: “Since I graduated from college and was able to dedicate myself full time to Chvker, revenue went up 700% in just one year - I did that all by myself." Naz’s parents couldn’t be prouder of their daughter, and whilst her success has given her financial freedom, it has also allowed her to provide and support those closest to her. To top off a remarkable few years, Naz was recently included in the prestigious Forbes 30 Under 30 List, and her profile is set to rocket further in 2022. 

Follow Naz here: 
https://www.instagram.com/nazliayunus/  
https://www.instagram.com/chvkerjewelry/ 

Videographer: Trent Wittenbach
Producers: Joel Ross, Natalia Giorgi
Editor: Garry Sykes

dhawkcuDl_o.title: I Love Looking Like A Woman - But I'm A Straight Man | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
dhawkcuDl_o.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A MAN who loves all things bimbo has gone through drastic changes to look like a woman - but says he still feels 100% male. Jan Simsa, 27, from the Czech Republic, grew up like any other boy but started feeling different at 12 years old. He can trace back the specific moment when it all changed for him; he was setting up decorations around Christmas time, a friend covered him with glitter, and he realised he liked it. Dressing up as a woman wasn't enough for Jan, and three years ago he started getting plastic surgery to achieve his desired look. So far he's had many fillers and two procedures done to his lips, but is now also planning to get breast implants too. Recently, Jan's friends and family have begun to question whether he wants to fully transition to female. Jan told Truly: "For me this is purely visual, I only like how this looks - I don't want to be a woman, it's not what I'm after. To me this is just the visual part, inside I'm still a boy." Unfortunately for Jan, his family didn't agree with his choices, and it was especially difficult for him at the beginning of the process.

Follow Jan here: https://www.instagram.com/bratzdoll_official/

Videographer: Jan Hubacek
Producers: Giacomo Brunelli, Yasmin Walker 
Editor: Reuben Yarwood

EDAdxH6DvUI.title: I Weighed 305lbs - Now I'm Half The Size | BRAND NEW ME
EDAdxH6DvUI.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

LEAH Punch, 29, from Cork was overweight for most of her childhood. She found out she was 26 weeks pregnant at 21 years old because all her pregnancy symptoms were symptoms she already had due to being overweight. After she gave birth, she was in the ICU for weeks and after that, her doctor told her that if she carried on her lifestyle she would die at 22 stone – it gave her a wake-up call. Leah says getting weight loss surgery is just a tool and she maintains her weight by controlling food rather than letting it control her and going to the gym. 

Follow Leah here: https://www.instagram.com/leahpunch_bypassbyleah/

qCmnsg6f4WY.title: We're 19 And Conjoined Twins - But Happy To Be Together | BORN DIFFERENT
qCmnsg6f4WY.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

Sohna and Mohna are fundraising for their future here: https://milaap.org/fundraisers/support-sohna-and-mohna 

CONJOINED twins Sohna and Mohna want to inspire others. The 19-year-old twins from Punjab, India, are conjoined at the torso and share a gallbladder, spleen and pair of legs. Growing up at the Pingalwara Society in Amritsar, India, the twins learnt how to coordinate together and have recently secured jobs as electricians - a field they have always been interested in. Doctors told the twins that separation would lead to one of them not surviving and so the twins have decided to live life to the fullest together. Sohna and Mohna said: “Our message to the world is that we are happy together. We want people to learn from us, be inspired by us because we live our lives how we want despite being conjoined.”   

Follow Sohna and Mohna here:
https://www.instagram.com/sohna_mohna_offcial_pspcl/ 

Videographer: Haziq Qadri
Producers: Emika Berry & Kim Nguyen
Editor: Alex Lubetkin

tjdtAc14u9k.title: I Live With Four Companion Dolls | LOVE DON’T JUDGE
tjdtAc14u9k.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

JAY Doll King Hefner, from Memphis, Tennessee, lives in a polyamorous relationship with four life sized companion dolls. All the dolls have unique, distinctive personalities and the doll he refers to as Kali Suun is his “number one”! In the past Jay has had relationships with real women. However, after experiencing some heartbreak and a string of bad dates Jay read an article on companion dolls and decided to save up and get a doll. Since then he’s never looked back and one day wants to be considered the ‘Hugh Hefner’ of companion dolls. Jay’s friends and family have been baffled at his decision to live with four dolls and he’s also experienced some trolling online for his lifestyle choice. Truly caught up with Jay at his home to find out more about his unusual relationship and meet the dolls in person. 

Follow Jay here:
https://www.instagram.com/jaydollking/?hl=en
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtI63gFAhxd4ZArBKd4QqLA

Videographer: Michael Darling
Producers: Tom Jones & Kim Nguyen
Editor: Sonia Estal

kVvLTyREt8o.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

London-based Chaly D.N is the spitting image of Kim Kardashian, although she says the resemblance to Kim is natural and that the $1.3m she has spent on her overall look is to become her best self - not copy Kim. Chaly's has spent hundreds of thousands on her wardrobe and has a team on hand to help her maintain her influencer look at all times. Today we spend the day with Chaly as she stars in a fashion shoot with one of the UK's most in-demand photographers - and then celebrates in style with her glam squad.

0NrMrqkV-kQ.title: Will My Date See Past My Facial Difference? | DATING DIFFERENT
0NrMrqkV-kQ.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

JUSTIN STEWART was born with frontonasal dysplasia, a rare disorder that affects one's development of the head and face before birth. As a teenager, Justin often felt insecure about his facial difference - but the 21-year-old is now building a thriving career as a model in New York because of his unique facial features. He also works as a basketball coach and content creator raising awareness for his condition. Justin told Truly: "I just try my best to use my platform and to be an advocate for people around the world that have the same condition as me." Justin’s first serious relationship ended a few months ago and he is ready to be back in the dating game again. He admits that it's been a struggle to find a woman who truly sympathises with his experience as someone with a facial condition. Today he is going on a blind date with Nana - a 27-year-old fashion blogger and photography lover. Neither Justin nor Nana have any idea about the other person who will be sitting across the table - will these two hit it off?

Follow Justin here:
https://www.instagram.com/justinstewartt/?hl=en

Follow Nana here:
https://www.instagram.com/officiallnana/?hl=en

Videographer: Kevin Huang
Producers: Emilia Jiang & Kim Nguyen
Editor: Helen Mckee

LZjIwx1NHnk.title: I Lost 140lbs In One Year | BRAND NEW ME
LZjIwx1NHnk.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

CARLY Parker, 24, from Massachusetts, has lost 140lbs in just over a year. Carly was always heavier growing up, but when her weight reached 300lbs her mental health began to decline. Alongside weight loss surgery, Carly followed a basic keto diet and worked out multiple times a week to lose 140lbs in total. Now she’s lost the weight, Carly has continued to follow a healthy lifestyle to maintain her weight. Despite this success, she told Truly: “I’m the most confident I’ve ever been, but now I have new insecurities because I have loose skin and a whole new body.” To combat this sense of body dysmorphia, Carly says it’s important to learn how to love your body at every stage of your weight loss journey. 

Follow Carly here: 
https://www.instagram.com/carlyycamilla/

With thanks to the team at https://www.instagram.com/synergyclubmass/

Videographer: Colin Bell
Producers: Milly Martin, Yasmin Walker
Editor: Ethan Edwards

INxLn8f1Ox0.title: I Escaped An Arranged Marriage To Be In A Throuple | MY EXTRAORDINARY FAMILY
INxLn8f1Ox0.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AFTER an arranged marriage ended badly, Piddu Kaur fled her hometown in California to stay with a couple of newly-made friends in Indiana. But while staying there Piddu developed feelings for her friend Speetie. Sunny, husband to Speetie, welcomed introducing another woman into the marriage and it wasn’t long before Sunny and Piddu also fell in love. The throuple have been together for 10 years now and between them share four children: eldest Cookie is 17, Kissie, 16, 10-year-old Toska and youngest Soch, who is five. All three parents come from traditional Indian backgrounds and while their immediate family has come to terms with their blended family, not all of their extended family has been as accepting with Piddu accused of being a homewrecker and the family excluded from family weddings and events. 

Follow their story here:
https://www.instagram.com/2momsandadad/

Videographer: Patrick T'Kindt 
Producers: Nathalie Bonney, Natalia Giorgi, Giacomo Brunelli
Editor: Giulia Bassanese

SHM-etKW0OE.title: At 445lbs I Struggled To Walk - Now I'm 300lbs Down | BRAND NEW ME
SHM-etKW0OE.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AT her heaviest, Shelly, 34, weighed over 445lbs - but after she decided to regain control over her life, she's now down to 155lbs. Her biggest “problems were using food inappropriately” and felt like she “didn’t have any willpower”. She decided to take the first step into her health journey by having weight loss surgery. After changing her daily routine by going to the gym and changing eating habits, Shelly lost 300lbs and says that surgery was just the first step into getting healthy. After losing so much weight, the mum had a lot of loose skin all over her body so decided to have a tummy tuck and an arm lift. Shelly now spends her days spreading body positivity on both Instagram and TikTok.

Follow Shelly here: 
https://www.instagram.com/happyhealthybabeofficial/
https://www.tiktok.com/@happyhealthybabe

Videographer: Emmai Alaquiva

localized.title: At 445lbs I Struggled To Walk - Now I'm 300lbs Down | BRAND NEW ME
localized.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AT her heaviest, Shelly, 34, weighed over 445lbs - but after she decided to regain control over her life, she's now down to 155lbs. Her biggest “problems were using food inappropriately” and felt like she “didn’t have any willpower”. She decided to take the first step into her health journey by having weight loss surgery. After changing her daily routine by going to the gym and changing eating habits, Shelly lost 300lbs and says that surgery was just the first step into getting healthy. After losing so much weight, the mum had a lot of loose skin all over her body so decided to have a tummy tuck and an arm lift. Shelly now spends her days spreading body positivity on both Instagram and TikTok.

Follow Shelly here:

https://www.tiktok.com/@happyhealthybabe

iJhX-u-of7k.title: I Went Blind At 15 - And No-One Knows Why | BORN DIFFERENT
iJhX-u-of7k.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AT the age of 15, Jay Walker went blind in a matter of hours. Now 18 years old, Jay’s condition is still a mystery to doctors who have not been able to give her a formal diagnosis. In 2017, Jay lost her sense of taste and smell after experiencing bizarre swelling symptoms in her face, then, in December 2018, Jay suffered swelling again. However, this time, the pressures in Jay’s eyes were immense. In just four hours, Jay went blind and was later told by doctors it was permanent. Jay’s life changed drastically and she is determined to keep moving forward. Now a college student, Jay’s future ambitions include writing a book about her experiences. Jay said: “I know how I want to feel and I know that I want to be happy and I know that I want to feel successful. And I want to feel like I've fulfilled something. And that I've made a difference in whether it be a million people or one.”

More of Jay's adventures here: 
https://www.instagram.com/the_real_jay_walker/ 
https://twitter.com/_Blind_Bandit_ 

Director: Nathan Johnson
Videographer: Esai Saenz
Producers: Emika Berry & Kim Nguyen

JzvfH-4d1HI.title: Will My Blind Date Mind That I'm Bald? | DATING DIFFERENT
JzvfH-4d1HI.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

ALISON MANN, a 22-year-old graduate student in New York, started losing her hair as young as four years old due to alopecia. By the time she reached school age, she had gone completely bald. With the support of her loving family and friends, Alison learned to accept her uniqueness. She also found her passion and confidence in gymnastics, which Alison said gave her a sense of identity and protection. Having lost her hair at such a young age, Alison never wore a wig. She also said she would never consider putting one on. She told Truly: "If I had the choice to grow my hair back, I genuinely don't think I would." Alison admits that using dating apps has been a struggle for her, with some people asking insensitive questions or fetishising her hair loss. Today, Alison is going on her very first date in over a year - will she meet the man that accepts her for who she is?

Follow Alison here:
https://www.instagram.com/alison_mann/

Follow Josh here:
https://www.instagram.com/jewrangutang/

Videographer: Kevin Huang
Producers: Kim Nguyen & Emilia Jiang
Editor: Sonia Estal

xUipVJjuxq4.title: My Entire Life Is Barbie Pink | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
xUipVJjuxq4.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A WOMAN from Brazil who is fully committed to living a 100% pink Barbie lifestyle, has been collecting pink objects and Barbie products since she was just 12 years old. Bruna has spent just shy of $100,000 on making her house as pink as possible - and boasts over 16 million followers on TikTok. She says the colour pink means 'everything' to her, as it represents her style, personality and happiness. Every single object in her house, which was recently partially redesigned, is a different shade of pink. The highlight of her house is arguably the kitchen, where Bruna cooks her Barbie-inspired dishes with her exclusively pink kitchen utensils. Even Bruna's car is fully coloured in pink; attracting lots of attention when she is out and about. 

Follow Bruna here: 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@brunabarbieoficial 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/brunabarbieoficial/

gEaAGaZeMAI.title: Today I'm Revealing My Giant Birthmark | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
gEaAGaZeMAI.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A PLUS SIZE model is proudly embracing the large birthmark covering her back and torso. Isabella, 20, was born with a giant congenital nevus - a type of birthmark covered in hair follicles - spanning her body. In her younger years, she was self-conscious of the nevus - which grew as she did - often covering it up under baggy jumpers. But in time, she learned to love the skin she is in, and see the beauty in her uniqueness. In 2021, her confidence reached new heights when she began posting on TikTok, prompting one of her followers to suggest she apply to some modelling agencies. Now, after being signed to Tribe Talent Management, she has posed for shoots and walked the runway in fashion shows. She concluded: "Showing the world my body makes me extremely confident. Growing up, all I wanted was to look like everybody else - but now that I'm older, I am so, so grateful that I don't look like anybody else."

Follow Isabella here:
https://www.instagram.com/isabelladcastorino/
https://www.tiktok.com/@isabelladcastorino

Thank you to Sonder Images for the photography used in this project. For information visit https://www.sonderimages.net  

Videographer: Mike Darling
Producers: Jake Slight, Becky Robinson
Editor: Jonny Poole

wTDaeyJcB88.title: We Help Our Mom With Her Lingerie Modelling | MY EXTRAORDINARY FAMILY
wTDaeyJcB88.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

MOTHER of two, Courtney Ann AKA Texas Thighs, switched from running a Fort Worth cleaning company to posting sexy pics online and now earns over $30,000 a month through her website and OnlyFans account. What started as a dare from husband Nick to post pictures online, turned into a life changing journey for the whole family. They decided to post headless shots to see what attention they would get. They got a lot. Suddenly Texas Thighs had 40,000 followers on instagram. The savvy couple realised that by taking their free social media content onto their own website they could monetise the views and did just that with Nick on board to not only take photos but also drive the content and posting. The couple’s two daughters Landri and Eliza (16 and 13) are super supportive of their parents’ career choice and they often get involved by doing their mum’s hair for lingerie photoshoots. There is a line however that Courtney won’t cross - she does implied nudity but never full nudity. Courtney admits her family has a different set up to many, but it works. 

Videographer: Davin Fitch
Producers: Nathalie Bonney, Camile Rocha-Keys, Yasmin Walker 
Editor: Pete Ansell

j8Rs_rwMut0.title: I've Spent Over $100K On My Britney Obsession | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
j8Rs_rwMut0.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A MAN in Pennsylvania, USA, has spent over $100,000 on Britney Spears merchandise and rare collectables. Zachary Gordon-Abraham is a die hard fan who has dedicated his entire life to the icon. Zachary told Truly: “I am hooked on Britney Spears! I base my look and lifestyle around her. I have almost everything Britney that you could imagine. I've got albums, rare versions of the albums, dolls, tour programs, tour t-shirts. There's so much stuff.” However, Zachary’s dedication to Britney Spears doesn’t end there. “Whenever I'm not at work I'm mostly wearing a Britney shirt or Britney hoodie, Britney hat. Something Britney for the most part.” Today, Zachary will be adding to his unique tattoo collection by getting a fifth Britney Spears tattoo and he doesn't care what other people might say about his dedication to the superstar. Zachary continued: “I always get compliments in public when I wear something Britney. Would I say I’m obsessed? I would say it’s more of a passion than an obsession. Britney is someone that makes me very happy and makes me feel good."

Follow Zachary Gordon-Abraham here: 
https://www.instagram.com/zacharygordon95/

Videographer: Freddie Segro
Producers: Dav Rich, Becky Robinson
Editor: Ethan Edwards

There's so much stuff.” However, Zachary’s dedication to Britney Spears doesn’t end there. “Whenever I'm not at work I'm mostly wearing a Britney shirt or Britney hoodie, Britney hat. Something Britney for the most part.” Today, Zachary will be adding to his unique tattoo collection by getting a fifth Britney Spears tattoo and he doesn't care what other people might say about his dedication to the superstar. Zachary continued: “I always get compliments in public when I wear something Britney. Would I say I’m obsessed? I would say it’s more of a passion than an obsession. Britney is someone that makes me very happy and makes me feel good."

Follow Zachary Gordon-Abraham here: 
https://www.instagram.com/zacharygordon95/

Videographer: Freddie Segro
Producers: Dav Rich, Becky Robinson
Editor: Ethan Edwards

hDjfIT96XOU.title: I'm 28 - And Only 24 Inches Tall | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
hDjfIT96XOU.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AT A height of 2-feet tall, Jyoti Amge, from Nagpur, India, is the smallest woman in the world. Her height, which matches that of a four-month-old baby, is due to a genetic condition called primordial dwarfism. Jyoti’s dwarfism causes her to have pain in her joints and difficulty walking, but she hasn’t let this stop her. Since first winning the Guinness World Records title 10 years ago, Jyoti has dreamed of using her difference to become an international film star. In 2014, Jyoti was cast in American Horror Story: Freak Show, where she saw her dream come true. She told Truly: “I want to get the message out there to anyone who faces challenges like me, that you can do anything. Just ignore what people say and focus on your own life." 

Follow Jyoti:
IG - @jyoti_amge 
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@www.jyote.com.amje

With thanks to @mona_fashion_studio07

Videographer:  Haziq Qadri
Producers: Milly Martin, Kim Nguyen 
Editor: Tani McDowell

eQi9yVPE25I.title: I'm Disabled And A 'Diva' - Will My Blind Date Mind? | DATING DIFFERENT
eQi9yVPE25I.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

BORN with one arm and a deformed leg, Zizipho has never let her disability define who she is. The 26-year-old from Johannesburg, South Africa, is a model and content creator with phocomelia - a rare congenital condition that causes limb mutation and deformity. Growing up, Zizipho had struggled to get accepted by her peers because of her disability. Over the years, she has learned to embrace her body by modelling and working as an influencer. While enjoying a rise in her career, Zizipho is looking for a guy that shares her values in hard work. She is going on a blind date today in the hope of meeting someone special. Zizipho told Truly: "I don't think dating without having an arm or a leg is a problem. If you have character, you have everything." Will Zizipho's date look past her disability?

Follow Zizipho on Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/zizipho_soldat/

Videographer: Charles Meadows
Producers: Kim Nguyen & Emilia Jiang
Editor: Helen McKee

66DIxMqAWto.title: I Was Scared To Wear A Swimsuit - Now I'm 100lbs Down | BRAND NEW ME
66DIxMqAWto.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

CHRISTINA, 29, from Idaho, has lost over 100lbs. She gained weight after having her kids and getting PCOS. She tried eating healthy, working out and took metformin to help with PCOS and nothing was working. She decided to take the first step to becoming healthy when she was too insecure to wear a swimsuit to swim and play with her children. Christina maintains her weight by eating healthy foods and working out four times a week. Her goal for the future is to ‘do a bodybuilding show’ to help her ‘stay more active’ for her children. 

Follow Christina here: https://www.instagram.com/mycurvydiaries/

Videographer: Joshua Monteith
Producers: Nosheen Hussain, Natalia Giorgi
Editor: Joshua Brown

bt_2Ny4xZhQ.title: My Ex Disfigured My Face - Now I'm Helping Other Victims | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
bt_2Ny4xZhQ.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

23-YEAR-OLD Kayla Hayes has risen to overcome domestic abuse, and now she fights and advocates for other women who don’t have a voice. Kayla was 18 when her ex-boyfriend bit off 85% of her lip in an act of revenge. She was rushed to hospital but doctors were unable to reattach her lip. With over 350 stitches on her face, Kayla didn’t recognise herself and she completely lost her sense of identity. She told Truly: “I felt like a monster with such big scars over my face." Over the past five years, Kayla has been on a physical and emotional journey to heal the scars left behind by this tragedy. Her mom, Jamie, said: “It’s hard knowing that this is the life that was chosen for Kayla by someone else. But what she has done with this reality is amazing.” Kayla decided to wear her scars as wings, partnering with author Alisa Divine to share her story. Through speaking openly about her experience, Kayla raises awareness around domestic violence and brings about justice for others.

Follow Kayla at:
https://www.sheriseswithkaylahayes.com/
IG: @kaylahayes101

With thanks to: https://spameonline.com/

If you are experiencing domestic abuse, please get help by calling the National DA Hotline:
1.800.799.SAFE (7233)
0808 2000 247 - UK

Videographer: Gerrit Messersmith
Producers: Milly Martin, Natalia Giorgi
Editor: Cecilia Brunelli

GXaZFRzpgg4.title: I Lost All My Teeth Aged 23 | BORN DIFFERENT
GXaZFRzpgg4.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

BY THE time she was just 23, Alex had a full set of dentures - but that has not stopped her smiling. Born with a genetic issue that means she has brittle teeth, she was in and out of the dentist's office as a child. Aged 18, she underwent 22 root canal surgeries in a bid to save her smile - but within a year, things had worsened to the point where she needed all her teeth pulled. And by 23, she had a full set of dentures. Though she had initially felt insecure about needing them so young, seeing her new smile for the first time gave her a huge confidence boost. Now, Alex regularly shares her story online to normalise tooth loss. She receives lots of questions, from what foods she can eat to what her husband Adam thinks, but is happy to open up in the name of education. She concluded: "I want people to know it's okay to be young and have dentures. Teeth don't define who you are."

To follow Alex, visit https://www.instagram.com/_myreasontosmile/ and https://www.tiktok.com/@myreasontosmile

Thank you to Mercedes Keller for her photography, featured in this project. For information visit https://www.facebook.com/mercedeskphotography/ or https://www.instagram.com/mercedeskellerphotography/

Videographer: Kevin Huang
Producers: Erin Cardiff & Becky Robinson
Editor: Shiona Penrake

5IoVfr9O2ao.title: I'm In Love With My Son's Friend | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
5IoVfr9O2ao.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A 40-year-old mum from Ohio is dating her son’s friend, who is only 22. Tanya initially met Josue through her eldest son Ceydon, 18, who had bonded with Josue over a love of skateboarding and making music. Tanya explained to Truly how she became closer to Josue. “We met in 2018, our relationship changed from friendship to us dating at the beginning of 2020.” At first, her two eldest sons found it difficult to accept the relationship, but are now supportive. However, they have faced criticism from the outside world. Her TikTok blew up with millions of views when she revealed that her new boyfriend was half her age. “I made a simple little video and everybody lost their minds”, Tanya said. “Things that actually made me cry and want to take down the video is them constantly saying I groomed him because I definitely didn’t groom him”. Nevertheless, she feels strongly that she has made the right decision choosing Josue as a life partner. “It’s just opinions, everybody has their opinions, it doesn’t affect us, we’re still going to be together whether they want us to or not”. 

Follow Tanya and Josue here -  https://www.tiktok.com/@josueandtanya

Videographer: Olga Wagner
Producers: Kate Moore & Becky Robinson
Editor: Paul Zeller

A SUPERSTAR trans model has spoken about how she feels like a “powerhouse of a woman” after completing her transition journey and overcoming major hardship. -fCd4pkTlV0.title: How Will My Blind Date React To My Facial Difference? | DATING DIFFERENT
-fCd4pkTlV0.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

20-YEAR-OLD Nathan Cajina is a TikToker and content creator from Orlando, Florida. Nathan was born with a mysterious condition that caused half of his face to have deformed. Born without a nose, ear and one of his eyes, Nathan has undergone 37 reconstructive operations on his face - costing well over $1,000,000. Living with a facial difference hasn't been easy for Nathan, but he has learned to embrace his uniqueness as he gets older. He told Truly: "I mean, I really can't hide my face. It's kind of just out there, so might as well just own it, love it, live with it." When it comes to dating, Nathan says he feels confident about meeting new people but he's never had a serious relationship before. Today, he is going on his first-ever blind date - will his date exceed his expectations?

MtemSplI2nU.title: Our Daughter Knows We're Adult Film Stars  | MY EXTRAORDINARY FAMILY
MtemSplI2nU.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A COUPLE who ditched their conventional jobs to become pornstars have said their new career makes them better parents. Jess and Mike Miller, from Southend-on-Sea, UK, who have been happily married for four years with two children, are now raking in £35,000 a month by making adult content. While in their previous jobs, Jess and Mike were so busy with their work they struggled to spend quality time with their 12-year-old daughter and seven-year-old son. When the pandemic hit and put their work to a halt, the couple started looking into alternative ways to support their family. They began filming amateur pornography and were surprised to see their videos quickly accumulating popularity. Jess and Mike's career move has caused friction with some family members. They also received heavy criticism online. But the couple believe they've made the right decision for their family.

Videographer: Jan-Paul Bednarz 
Producers: Emilia Jiang, Yasmin Walker 
Editor: Garry Sykes

G2UYBRCzOr0.title: I First Met My Fiancé When I Picked Him Up From Prison | LOVE DON’T JUDGE
G2UYBRCzOr0.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

THE FIRST TIME Erica and Austin met in person was not your typical first date, in some bar or restaurant. It was outside the gates of a prison in Iowa, on his release day after serving a seven year sentence for his part in an armed robbery. They had been put in touch seven months earlier by a mutual friend, who had suggested that realtor Erica may be able to help Austin find a place to live once he got out. And though romance was the furthest thing from both their minds at the time, the more they talked on the phone, the stronger their feelings for one another grew. Though loved ones questioned why Erica was turning down dates to stay home and talk to a man in prison thousands of miles away, they soon came around once they saw how happy she was. The couple have also faced their fair share of criticism from online trolls - but proved all the haters wrong when they tied the knot days after Christmas 2021. She said: "People judge from a 15 second online clip when they have no idea what goes on behind the scenes. But I'm really excited for this next chapter with Austin. The future is bright."

To keep up with Erica and Austin's love story, follow them here:
https://www.instagram.com/erica.and.austin/
https://www.tiktok.com/@erica_and_austin?lang=en

Videographer: Trent Wittenbach & John Richard
Producers: Erin Cardiff, Becky Robinson
Editor: Tom Buckman

MMIiGiFLw5Q.title: I Was Born With 'Butterfly Skin' - What Will My Blind Date Think? | DATING DIFFERENT
MMIiGiFLw5Q.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

SHARDAI Cousino, 28, was born with Epidermolysis Bullosa – an incredibly rare condition that causes her ‘butterfly' skin to blister and tear with the slightest touch. She has lived her life in constant pain, pain that has been likened to having your body covered in third-degree burns. Originally from Tennessee, Shardai moved to Palm Bay, Florida after high school, where she has lived since. She has been determined to live as independently and fully as possible, with the support of her sister, family and friends. Dating life has been a mixed bag for Shardai; she has come across her fair share of men who are only interested in hook ups, but she wants a real relationship now. When it comes to what she is searching for in a man, Shardai told Truly: “What I look for in a man is someone who is consistent, who is able to hold a deep conversation, and someone who is caring." Will today’s blind date deliver what she’s looking for?

Follow Shardai here:
https://www.instagram.com/lifewithshardai/

Follow Gary here:
https://www.instagram.com/sotoe1214/ 

Videographer: Carlos de Varona
Producers: Kim Nguyen & Joel Ross
Editor: Pete Ansell

RefSKqdhyCc.title: The Teenager With Bendy Bones | BORN DIFFERENT
RefSKqdhyCc.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

MEET the 17-year-old taking the internet by storm - despite having fractured over 300 bones. Wazir, from Jaipur, India, was born with Osteogenesis imperfecta (OI), a genetic bone disorder also known as ‘brittle bone disease’. Wazir’s condition means he has soft bones that fracture easily, so he has to be careful at all times as even a minor fall could land him in hospital. But despite his medical challenges, Wazir, who also has an elder sister with the same condition, has built up a big following on Instagram - with a recent post getting over 25 million views. His viral fame has led to trolls calling him names like ‘alien’ or ‘monkey’ but Wazir is choosing to ignore his haters and focus on achieving his dreams.

Follow Wazir on Instagram at: 
https://www.instagram.com/real_wazir_khan_786/

Videographer: Haziq Qadri
Producers: Tom Midlane & Becky Robinson
Editor: Jonny Poole

DyuSu3MUvmA.title: I Thought I'd Never Find Love With My Birthmark | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
DyuSu3MUvmA.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

INGRID Schlegel, 20, from Brazil, was born with a port wine hemangioma - a vascular birthmark that covers her left cheek and lip. Growing up, Ingrid used to worry that she wouldn’t be accepted because of her differences. She was bullied at school and she often received judgement and comments from strangers. She told Truly: “I used to say I’ll never get a boyfriend or a job because I don’t fit into society’s standards.” But a few years ago at a big party in her town, Ingrid decided to change her mindset. She said: “I realised that I needed to accept and love myself as I am or I would live depressed, hiding myself away in my room.” That was a turning point for Ingrid, who now uses her social media to raise awareness about vascular birthmarks. She loves her birthmark, saying that it makes her unique and beautiful in her own way.

Follow Ingrid here:
IG & TikTok: @ingridschlegel

Videographer: Bruno Mazzoco
Producers: Milly Martin
Editor: Vanessa Nascimento

8zdhhsSnDp4.title: The Little Girl Whose Skin Grows Too Fast | BORN DIFFERENT
8zdhhsSnDp4.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

NYLA is a five-year-old fashionista with a rare condition called ichthyosis - this means her skin grows too fast. Nyla, who’s from LA, cannot sweat which means she’s at risk of overheating and it’s important that she bathes several times per day to clear away excess skin. Fortunately she loves bath time and her condition certainly doesn’t stop her from being a fashion icon. If she isn’t painting her nails or shopping for clothes she’s probably modelling her trendy outfits in front of the camera. 

Follow Nyla’s adventures online at:
https://www.instagram.com/ichthyosis_fashionista/

-KDtnUMjr-k.title: I Lost 300lbs In Just 18 Months | BRAND NEW ME
-KDtnUMjr-k.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AT his heaviest, DJ Varela weighed over 500lbs. The 29-year-old, from Phoenix Arizona lived a fast lifestyle as a club promoter and ate nothing but fast food. In October 2018, DJ decided he could not continue living his life this way and made the first step on his weight loss journey by ditching fast food. Soon after, with the help of his friend and trainer - Bo, DJ started working out and following meal plans. In 18 months DJ lost an incredible 300lbs and reached his goal weight. DJ now wants to help others on their weight loss journeys and has set up his own company - Functional Fit’Nesse. DJ continues to work on his physique and has set himself another goal of competing as an MMA athlete. DJ told Truly: “When I look in the mirror now, I see the person that I always envisioned.”

Follow DJ here:
https://www.instagram.com/funktionalfitnesse/
https://www.instagram.com/yearoundfinesse/ 
https://www.tiktok.com/@yearoundfinesse

Videographer: Mike Myers
Producers: Emika Berry, Natalia Giorgi 
Editor: Tom Waddington

FTP8HSl6Xcw.title: Little People Are Not My Wife's 'Type' | LOVE DON’T JUDGE
FTP8HSl6Xcw.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

BEING half the height of his wife isn’t a problem for an Iowa man, despite his partner being asked if little people are her “type”. Taylor, who has dwarfism, and Mady have been together for three years, married for two, and say they couldn’t be happier. But the couple have dealt with their share of judgement due to their height difference and even family apprehension. Taylor said: “I get asked ‘why don’t you date someone your size?’ and I say ‘I’m going to date whoever I want to date. A person is a person’.”

Follow Taylor here:
https://instagram.com/alcohwk/ 

Follow Mady here:
https://instagram.com/madyfoster21/ 

And for info on Mady’s forthcoming book, follow:
https://instagram.com/kinddogbooks/ 

Videographer: Dan Peters
Producers: Joe Roberts & Becky Robinson
Editor: Paul Zeller

qZETzYgX2dk.title: Without My Parent's Help I Would Eat Myself To Death | BORN DIFFERENT
qZETzYgX2dk.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

CAMILLE, from Connecticut, lives with a rare genetic condition called Prader-Willi Syndrome, a condition best known for creating an insatiable sense of hunger in the individual. The craving is so strong that if left alone and with access to food, a person with Prader-Willi Syndrome could eat themselves to death. That means Larry and Camille’s mother Kim must create a completely ‘food secure’ environment, including padlocking kitchen cabinets and having an alarm on the kitchen door to stop Camille foraging for snacks. Camille’s sneakiness around food has earned her the nickname the ‘stealth ninja’, but despite her ever-present hunger, people with Prader-Willi have low muscle tone and burn calories slowly, meaning she is required to subsist on a diet of 1,000-1,200 calories a day. Larry said: “Prader-Willi syndrome is what Camille lives with, it’s the diagnosis she’s been given, but it certainly does not define her. She is so much more, she’s loving, caring, kind, compassionate, giving, if you have some sort of animal she’ll never forget the story you tell about them or the animal’s name.”

Videographer: Rajah Samaroo 
Producers: Tom Midlane & Natalia Giorgi
Editor: Omar Gobere

D4oIVPpX2jU.title: My Mum's Addicted To Plastic Surgery - I'm Worried About Her Health | MY EXTRAORDINARY FAMILY
D4oIVPpX2jU.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A PLASTIC SURGERY-OBSESSED mum has admitted that her love for looking plastic fantastic has gotten in the way of her parenting at times. 33-year-old Elaina Starr from New York claims she has spent $150,000 on over 500 procedures, including three Brazilian butt lifts, two tummy tucks and a corseting operation, in a bid to achieve her ideal look. Elaina is a single mum to her 11-year-old son, Chaz, who has been worrying about his mum's health because of the procedures. During her last surgery, Elaina suffered from severe health complications and was left bed-bound for months - but she is still 'nowhere near finished' and planning to get her ribs removed in the future. The mum-of-one admits that sometimes she feels guilty about being a plastic mum, even though getting the surgery makes her happy. "I think plastic surgery has impacted, of course, my parenting. There have been times when I had to take extra time to recover," Elaina told Truly. "As a mum, I'm the best when I'm the happiest and these are the things that make me happy."

Follow Elaina here:
https://www.instagram.com/elainastarrxx/

Follow Naba (Beautician) here:
https://www.instagram.com/moneymakerbeauty/

Elaina would like to dedicate this video in loving memory of Tristan William Reavis (11/24/2010-9/22/2020). As long as we live, you will be loved.

Videographer: Kevin Huang
Producers: Emilia Jiang, Ruby Coote
Editor: Marcus Cooper

Gfjj2rsbnzg.title: Is This Proof Arizona's 'Bigfoot' Exists? | UNEXPLAINED
Gfjj2rsbnzg.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AS IF we don’t have enough to worry about in the world already - please let us introduce you to the Mogollon monster, otherwise known as the Arizona Bigfoot, a huge clawed 7ft nocturnal decapitating beast that covers a two hundred mile round area near the Mogollon Rim, Arizona. Luckily you won’t have to try to track this giant down yourself as beast hunter Nash Hoover and his team have done the hard work for you. Heading to Arizona himself to speak to locals and one of them had this to say: “Lots of stories from the colonial times to today of bigfoot type creatures, there hasn’t really been a huge population of grizzly bears in Arizona in 100 years.”

Editor: Bob Pipe
Series Producer: Simon Goodman

localized.title: Is This Proof Arizona's 'Bigfoot' Exists? | UNEXPLAINED
localized.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AS IF we don’t have enough to worry about in the world already - please let us introduce you to the Mogollon monster, otherwise known as the Arizona Bigfoot, a huge clawed 7ft nocturnal decapitating beast that covers a two hundred mile round area near the Mogollon Rim, Arizona. Luckily you won’t have to try to track this giant down yourself as beast hunter Nash Hoover and his team have done the hard work for you. Heading to Arizona himself to speak to locals and one of them had this to say: “Lots of stories from the colonial times to today of bigfoot type creatures, there hasn’t really been a huge population of grizzly bears in Arizona in 100 years.”

Editor: Bob Pipe
Series Producer: Simon Goodman

xwhSICMr8M8.title: From Racing Driver To Millionaire Model | BLING LIFE
xwhSICMr8M8.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

RENEE Gracie, from Queensland, Australia, is living the high life after swapping a career as a professional racing driver to become a full-time glamour model. Renee began go-karting aged 13 and quickly got into competitive racing, graduating to the V8 Supercar circuit. But by the time she left racing, she was struggling to survive. Determined to make some money, Renee signed up to OnlyFans and made $24,000 in her first month - but since July 2021 she has been clearing over $100,000 a month. Earlier this year she splashed out on a million dollar mansion in her native Australia and her dream car - a Ford Mustang GT. In this episode we meet up with Renee as she gives us the house tour and goes to collect her newest purchase - a $170,000 Dodge Ram 1500 Limited SUV, freshly imported from the USA, which she’s paying to have custom-wrapped in neon yellow by the team at Gangsta Wraps. 

Videographer: Ian MacAuslane
Producers: Ruby Coote & Tom Midlane
Editor: Reuben Yarwood

cBD9dJQgMQc.title: 'Human Ken Doll' Meets The 'King Of BBLs' | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
cBD9dJQgMQc.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

WELCOME to the Million Dollar Body Club. Known worldwide as the 'Human Ken Doll', host Justin Jedlica has spent over $1m to achieve plastic perfection - designing some of his own custom implants and becoming a plastic surgery consultant in the process. Today, Justin is joined poolside by the 'King of BBLs', Mateo Blanco. Justin told Truly: “I first started talking to Mateo online and I was enamoured with his amazing body shape. It was definitely love at first sight. Mateo is definitely known for having a big booty! That booty of his is just redonkulous and I have to see it for myself.” Justin will be quizzing Mateo on the highs and lows of having such an extraordinary body. Mateo said: “I’ve spent over $100,000 on my look and I am the King of BBLs. I get so much attention and I love it.” However, will Justin be in favour of Mateo having another BBL?

Videographer: Istvan Lettang
Producers: Dav Rich, Ruby Coote
Editor: Tom Buckman

neQ6AvOUzhA.title: I'm Mocked For My Beard But I'm Still A Woman | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
neQ6AvOUzhA.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

ROSINA Al-Shaater, from Bristol, UK, started growing her facial hair as a social experiment in 2016. Rosina, who has polycystic ovarian syndrome (PCOS), has been removing her excess facial hair since she was 13 years old. But after years of waxing, she decided to fully embrace her moustache and beard. She said: “I wanted to see how people would react when they saw me.” Rosina has received quite a lot of criticism for being a woman with a beard, but she’s not phased by people’s insults. She believes her beard highlights her femininity. Rosina added: “I don’t want to remove my facial hair just because others want me to. I want to get to a point where I love and accept myself completely."

Follow Rosina here:
@littlemissblackbeard
@mose_issie
@itsabamelife

With thanks to Gam Gam Salon & Barbershop in Bristol, UK. 

Videographer: Peter Tat
Producer: Milly Martin
Editor: Josh Halil

tOCbnmuunyI.title: I Was Born With 2 Vaginas - Can I Have A Baby? | BORN DIFFERENT
tOCbnmuunyI.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A DANCER has told of how a routine gynaecologist appointment led to the discovery that she has two complete reproductive systems. As a teenager, Paige, now 20, suffered from irregular periods - but didn't think much of it for years. That was until, aged 18, she went for a checkup, and was immediately referred for an MRI scan, which revealed that she has two vaginas, two uteruses, and two cervixes, separated by a thin piece of tissue called a septum. Initially, medics thought she had uterine didelphys, but it has recently been confirmed that she has a similar, much rarer condition called complete septate uterus. "Doctors hadn't seen a patient like me in 10 years," she said.
Last year, Paige decided to speak out about her condition on TikTok, in a bid to raise awareness. And now, while the complications her condition may present in the future remain unclear - especially when it comes to having children - she is determined to not be held back and has even found love with boyfriend Hugh. She said: "We shouldn't feel like we have to hide our bodies. It's our bodies. We were born with them. Let's talk about it."

Follow Paige here:
https://www.instagram.com/paigedeangelo/ 
https://www.tiktok.com/@paige.deangelo

Videographer: Kevin Huang
Producers: Erin Cardiff & Yasmin Walker
Editor: Jonny Poole

on2hZFvZIIU.title: I Love My Vitiligo - But Will My Blind Date? | DATING DIFFERENT
on2hZFvZIIU.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

MARY Aquino, 24, first noticed her vitiligo when she was nine years old after she fell and scraped her knee - and it never healed properly. Mary explained to Truly: “Vitiligo is the depigmentation of the cells in the skin. I lack melanin, which is caused by an autoimmune disorder, which means my body is attacking itself.” Mary’s vitiligo now takes over all of her legs and arms, as well as other patches on her body. There was a time in her life where she would actively try to cover up as much as possible, spending hours applying special makeup to hide her vitiligo. However, over time she has grown in confidence and learned to accept herself fully. Mary admits to having trust issues when it comes to men - she has had some experiences where she feels she has been fetishzised. Mary described what makes dating different for her: “I get in my head too much about how other people view my vitiligo or how they would react or respond. I have a fear of rejection so I reject myself first, but I’m working on it." Today, Mary is going on her first ever blind date, will her date help restore her faith in men?!

Follow Mary here:
https://www.instagram.com/mary_aquino_/?hl=en

Follow John here:
https://www.instagram.com/C9LYFE/ 

Thank you to Giovanni Filippi for the use of this photography, you can find more of his work here: https://www.instagram.com/giovannifilippi_/ 

Videographer: Carlos de Varona
Producers: Ruby Coote & Joel Ross
Editor: Sonia Estal

YPcr9ILn5Vc.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A FORMER TEACHER says there is no chance she would ever go back to teaching after landing a lucrative new job as an OnlyFans model. Courtney Tillia, 33, from Los Angeles, California, struggled to make her ends meet when she used to work as a special needs teacher at a local high school. When she made the career switch and started posting in suggestive snaps online - she saw her income skyrocketing to $100,000 a month. The mum-of-two says the financial security she has been able to give her family proves she made the right choice - even if not all family and friends agree with her decision. "OnlyFans has improved our life in so many ways," Courtney told Truly. "Having the financial freedom to say yes to our kids is incredible."

Courtney Tillia, 33, from Los Angeles, California, struggled to make her ends meet when she used to work as a special needs teacher at a local high school. When she made the career switch and started posting in suggestive snaps online - she saw her income skyrocketing to $100,000 a month. The mum-of-two says the financial security she has been able to give her family proves she made the right choice - even if not all family and friends agree with her decision. "OnlyFans has improved our life in so many ways," Courtney told Truly. "Having the financial freedom to say yes to our kids is incredible."

49I8DiPgRIQ.title: I'm 26 - And Trapped In A Toddler's Body | BORN DIFFERENT
49I8DiPgRIQ.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

STANDING at 32" tall and weighing just 21.4kg, Raudhatul could easily be mistaken for a toddler - but actually, she is 26 years old. Her mother Nurlalila, 50, of Aceh, Indonesia, had a completely healthy pregnancy. But when Raudhatul was around three, she mysteriously stopped growing - and has remained the size of a toddler ever since. Medical professionals have never been able to determine the cause of her short stature. Raudhatul is only able to walk very short distances by herself as she tires easily, and also has difficulty speaking. And though she can understand everything going on around her, her personality has also been impacted by her mystery condition. As her mother puts it, she has a "toddler side" and an "adult side." Though the family have accepted Raudhatul's condition, and are incredibly proud of her, they would like to one day have an answer for what has caused her to forever remain the size of a toddler. Nurlalila added: "People often think she is a toddler when they see her. But I am proud of her. When she laughs we are very happy."

Videographer: Jefri Tarigan
Producers: Erin Cardiff &  Ruby Coote
Editor: Vanessa Nascimento

B5vVH1RLjbE.title: My Husband Controls My Life - And I Love It | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
B5vVH1RLjbE.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

THIS 'traditional housewife' lets her husband sleep with other women to keep him happy. Monica Huldt, 37, believes that the secret to a happy relationship is for the man to make the decisions and the woman should always aim to please by adopting an old-school ‘traditional wife’ role. They have been together for six years, and she explained to Truly why she knew that she had finally met her perfect match. “I’ve always had a submissive side.” Adding that: “It's not that I’m a hopeless little girl. He’s assertive and I like that in a man.” From an early age, she had the Stepford wife attitudes instilled in her: “My mum told me, ‘be pretty and in good shape because nobody wants a fat and ugly wife'.” Her subservient nature goes beyond the kitchen and into the bedroom, where John is allowed to sleep with other women. This setup works for John’s values too, “I’m the man and I make the rules around the house”, he explained. “Sleeping with other women is a luxury that most guys wish they had. I think that makes me a better husband." Their relationship dynamic works for them, but has caused rifts with loved ones. “I’ve had childhood friends straight out telling me that I’d lost my dignity as a woman," Monica added. 

Videographer: Andrew Keil
Producers: Kate Moore & Ruby Coote
Editor: Tani McDowell

RWz2GH7CSk0.title: 80% Of My Body Is Burned, Will My Blind Date Care? | DATING DIFFERENT
RWz2GH7CSk0.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

KENNY MATTHEWS from LA California, suffered third degree burns to over 80% of his body at the age of three in a fire at his home. Kenny is blessed to be alive and told Truly: “Beauty doesn't mean to have a pretty handsome face. If you have a consistent mind, a dope heart and a beautiful soul, that's beautiful.” Kenny has learned to love his scars, and has taken to social media to inspire others to accept their differences too. Kenny has over 1.5Million followers on TikTok, where he shares funny videos and personal insights. Having never been in a relationship, he has had mixed results on the dating scene. He told Truly: “I’m focusing on being happy with myself first, and loving myself." When it comes to what he’s looking for, Kenny says the most attractive quality a guy can have is confidence… Will his date have the swag he’s after?!

Check Kenny out here:
https://www.instagram.com/ikendawg/
https://www.tiktok.com/@kendawg?lang=en

Producers: Yasmin Walker & Joel Ross

-39_vj23Da8.title: Born Without Legs - But I Can Still Do Anything | BORN DIFFERENT
-39_vj23Da8.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

Despite being born without legs, Kanya Sesser lives life to the absolute extreme. Born in Thailand, Kanya was found at the side of the road aged just three months before being adopted aged 5 by a family in the USA, where she grew up with an active lifestyle that continues today. Kanya started skateboarding aged 9 and quickly became a highly-skilled skater able to do handstands on her board. Kanya is also a fashion model and a talented actress, having appeared in shows like The Walking Dead and Hawaii Five-0, and today lives in Texas with her boyfriend Jeff.

Follow Kanya on Instagram at:
https://www.instagram.com/kanyasesser/

Additional photography and video courtesy of Jeff Antons:

IZFrNE_Es_g.title: Why I've Transitioned Into 'The Ultimate Bimbo' | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
IZFrNE_Es_g.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

GROWING up, Gracie Jane was always fascinated by the cartoon and anime characters she saw on the TV and over the years has aspired to match that aesthetic. Gracie Jane told Truly: “From a very young age I had a fascination with looking like a character that doesn’t exist in the real world.” Born male in a little suburb in Ohio, Gracie Jane moved to LA to pursue a new adventure and find a place where she could be her true self. In total, she has spent over $40K on her transformation - the list includes a BBL, breast augmentation, nose job and filler. Next up she will be getting facial feminisation surgery worth $20K. Gracie Jane says she faces judgement for the way she looks daily, but told Truly: “If someone doesn’t agree with my surgery, what makes you think you have a right to have an opinion on my body?" Today, Gracie Jane has lined up one of LA’s hottest photographers to bring her futuristic vision to life, emulating her childhood idols.

1ffqn0iepB8.title: I'm Missing Half My Arm - How Will My Blind Date React? | DATING DIFFERENT
1ffqn0iepB8.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

GROWING up Destinee, 20, never realised being born with a limb difference would make her stand out from other people. It was in her first year of kindergarten that the bullying started, which continued throughout school, having a huge impact on her confidence and self image. In January 2020, Destinee began making videos online, which started gaining people’s attention. To her surprise she received lots of positive messages, particularly from people with the same disability. The response completely changed her outlook and helped her to begin embracing her difference. She uses humour in her videos to challenge stereotypes and assumptions surrounding disabilities, which has brought her 800+ followers on TikTok. Destinee told Truly: “I like to make content that shows people with disabilities can lead regular lives!" There was a point in her life where she was self conscious of her arm and dating, but not anymore. Destinee identifies as pansexual and is open to all genders and sexualities - will her blind date be as open minded? 

Follow Nate here:
https://www.instagram.com/natedog7000/ 

Videographer: Adams Wood, Peter Lutz
Producers: Joel Ross, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Hailey Wang

The response completely changed her outlook and helped her to begin embracing her difference. She uses humour in her videos to challenge stereotypes and assumptions surrounding disabilities, which has brought her 800+ followers on TikTok. Destinee told Truly: “I like to make content that shows people with disabilities can lead regular lives!" There was a point in her life where she was self conscious of her arm and dating, but not anymore. Destinee identifies as pansexual and is open to all genders and sexualities - will her blind date be as open minded? 

Follow Nate here:
https://www.instagram.com/natedog7000/

Producers: Joel Ross, Kim Nguyen

7ui3hlg5CgQ.title: My Facial Tumour Hasn't Stopped Me Finding Love | BORN DIFFERENT
7ui3hlg5CgQ.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

MILAGROS Reynoso, 21, from Argentina, was born with the genetic condition neurofibromatosis. Mili was born with bruises on her face which doctors told her mother Natalia would naturally disappear, but instead they expanded into large tumour - obstructing her nose, left eye, and mouth. Mili has so far had eight operations to try and reduce the size of her tumours, which have already caused her to lose sight in her left eye and can make talking hard. Mili experienced bullying due to her appearance, but has now found love with her boyfriend Agustin and regularly posts on TikTok to educate other people about her condition and help break down the stigma attached to it. 

Follow Mili on TikTok at: 
https://www.tiktok.com/@milireynoso296

0TFQkgSqps0.title: Our Relationship Isn't 'Unnatural' - We're Getting Engaged | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
0TFQkgSqps0.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AN INTERABLED couple who found love online, have hit back at internet trolls who believe their relationship is fake and unnatural. Maria first came across Catalin's social media profile in 2019 and was immediately struck by Catalin's artistry and how open he was about his condition. Catalin has a condition called Spinal Muscular Atrophy, which is a degenerative condition which means he needs round the clock care. It was Maria who took the first step by sending him a friend request and leaving heart emoji's to all of his online pictures. After some initial messages, their relationship moved incredibly quickly. Maria told Truly: "Things went from liking to love in less than three weeks for me. We moved in together and now we're living together".  Maria and Catalin decided to start a social media account to show the world their new relationship but not everyone online liked what they saw. Maris explained: "We started to get really rude comments like, 'I don't get the point of him being alive', our relationship is not natural and we are attention seekers". Despite these horrible comments, Maria and Catalin are incredibly happy together and have big plans for their future...with wedding bells possibly on the way!

Follow their story here:
https://www.instagram.com/maria.alina.petrea/
https://www.instagram.com/imcatalinpeter/
https://www.instagram.com/madewithloveonearth/
https://www.tiktok.com/@madewithloveonearth?

Videographer: Laurentiu Garofeanu
Producers: Adam Fleet, Ruby Coote

p9F5ej-xgQM.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A GLAMOUR MODEL whose ambition is 'to have the world’s biggest bum' is tackling her other goal, to find love, by going on a blind date.  Natasha Crown, 27, originally from Serbia, says she first realised she wanted a super-sized bum at the age of 18. Two years later, Natasha started her cosmetic journey from 'athletic teen to a curvy goddess'. So far, Natasha estimates that she’s spent over $150,000 on 5 BBLs, and is showing no sign of her wanting to put a stop to the procedures. After being single for 7 years, we follow Natasha as she goes on a blind date with fitness coach Adam. What will her fitness-obsessed blind date think of her extreme look?

4_ubFtibflw.title: I'm Only 4ft Tall - Will My Blind Date Mind? | DATING DIFFERENT
4_ubFtibflw.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

ABBY Asani was born with spina bifida - a condition that results in a gap in the spine which also affects her organs leaving her with a smaller torso. Abby has wanted to be a model her entire life, and began modelling two years ago. Dating hasn’t always been easy. Abby says: “The problem that I had was trying to figure out a man's true intention, because I think a lot of men have this fetish of being with a smaller woman which is ridiculous." She continued: “Society thinks I don’t go on dates, that I’m not intimate? It’s a bit weird to me that people really think that. I just have a disability, it’s not that serious." Will she finally meet a man good enough? 

Follow Abby here:
https://www.instagram.com/abby.asani/

Follow Kofi here:

88tntBq27W0.title: I Got Pregnant At 16 - But Don't Regret It | MY EXTRAORDINARY FAMILY
88tntBq27W0.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

KAILEY and Nathan had known each other for a few years but when they found out she was pregnant at just 16, they’d only been dating a short time. Kailey took a test as a joke with a friend; she was on birth control and had zero symptoms so when the result came back positive Kailey took another two because she couldn’t believe it. For Kailey, who at that point was living in Alabama, abortion wasn’t an option. It was over a week after finding out before Kailey had the courage to tell Nathan but he was excited and simply said ‘ok well let’s do this’. They only told one other friend at school, keeping it secret until Kailey left school at six months pregnant to continue with online school. Living in a small town where teen moms tended to just go into hiding once their pregnancies were public knowledge, Kailey and Nathan were determined to change the narrative. Avery was born in March 2020, just as the world was going into lockdown. That meant that not only did Kailey and Nathan have to deal with being parents at a very young age but they also didn’t get the usual support groups or family visits that would have happened outside of lockdown. It was 3-4 months before Kailey’s dad got to meet his grandchild. This challenging start has prepared the young couple well, who are entirely self-sufficient. They got engaged when Kailey was just 17, Nathan, 19 with Nathan proposing on the beach. They are now married and live in Omaha, Nebraska for Nathan’s job, while Kailey continues her studies and looks after Avery. Kailey started her YouTube channel and Instagram to be a safe space for other teen moms. She says: “I wanted to not condone it, not encourage teen pregnancy but show the real side.” 

Follow Kailey Here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFJNdM6JSr8y5ZXhXRUQXxQ
https://www.instagram.com/kailey.pool/

Videographer: Esai Saenz 
Producers: Nathalie Bonney, Ruby Coote
Editor: Tom Buckman

jsH6wz5Qlzc.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

KAHLIL Doucette, 27, from Canada, lost over 200lbs after being overweight her whole life. Her highest weight was 420lbs and she decided to have VSG after her mum cried when she came home for the holidays. Kahlil told Truly: "I was told I wasn't going to live past 40." She had to drastically change her lifestyle. The content creator took control of her life and changed her eating habits and decided to join a gym. She is now thriving in life and she documents her progress on social media.

She had to drastically change her lifestyle. The content creator took control of her life and changed her eating habits and decided to join a gym. She is now thriving in life and she documents her progress on social media. 

Follow Kahlil here: 
https://www.instagram.com/princessspear/?hl=en
https://www.tiktok.com/@kahlilda

oIUgINYQUlY.title: My Tourettes Is So Severe I Damage My House | BORN DIFFERENT
oIUgINYQUlY.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

BIANCA Saez, from Queensland, Australia has a very severe form of Tourettes Syndrome. She was diagnosed with the condition when she was five years old, when she turned 12, it became more extreme and got progressively worse. Due to her tics, Bianca breaks household items on a regular basis and has smashed countless TV screens and mirrors. With the help of her boyfriend Zac, the couple have adapted their house to accommodate Bianca’s tics. Her computer is covered in a protective plastic casing to stop Bianca from breaking it, the mirrors are made of polished stainless steel and instead of a TV, Zac and Bianca watch things on a projector. Together the pair also make a YouTube channel called B With Tourettes where Bianca documents what day to day life with the condition is like. Bianca’s dream is to raise money to start a Tourettes foundation to help other people who have also struggled with the condition. 

Follow Bianca here:
https://www.youtube.com/c/BwithTourettes
https://www.instagram.com/b_with_tourettes/?hl=en

rgvM2JZdE18.title: My 10KG Tumour Won’t Stop Growing | BORN DIFFERENT
rgvM2JZdE18.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A woman is hoping kind strangers will help her crowdfund for surgery to remove the 10kg tumour that has taken over her leg. 40-year-old Lasiyem, who lives in Blora, Indonesia, has neurofibromatosis, which has left her body covered in non-cancerous masses. In the past, she's undergone surgery to remove them - but each time, they have grown back. Now, with her largest tumour weighing 10kg, she is unable to work, and can only walk very short distances. Lasiyem is very grateful to her sister, who lives with her and takes good care of her. She also has a lot of friends in the area who often visit her, and receives regular check-ups from a local nurse. As some of her wounds cause mild infections, Lasiyem is prone to fevers, for which she is given medicine and vitamins. However, the most life-changing thing would be surgery. As she is unable to afford the operation herself, a crowdfunding page has been set up for her. "I want to be healthy again," she said.
 
CROWDFUNDING LINK:
To donate to Lasiyem's surgery fund visit 
https://kitabisa.com/campaign/bantulasiyemsembuh

Videographer: Jefri Tarigan
Producers: Erin Cardiff & Natalia Giorgi
Editor: Alex Saunders

0AIUNg1KSi0.title: I Have Dwarfism, How Will My Blind Date React? | DATING DIFFERENT
0AIUNg1KSi0.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

MERYL from Edinburgh, Scotland was born with achondroplasia - a form of dwarfism, and at 25 years old, she stands at just over 4 foot tall. When it comes to dating, Meryl admits she hasn’t put herself out there in that way. Her experiences with dating apps were not positive and she didn’t want to make herself a laughing stock. Because of this, this is Meryl’s first ever date. However, this doesn't mean she doesn't know what she's looking for in a potential partner. Meryl told Truly: “People always say 'Oh my God, are you going to marry someone little like you' and I’m like no, I’m not going to get into a relationship with someone just because they are little. That's like saying someone with brown hair can only go with someone with brown hair." She added: “I want people to get to know me as a person without actually making preconceptions about me." After just buying her first house, and settling in with her two pomeranians, Meryl is ready to take the next step in her life and have her first date... 

Check Meryl out here:
https://www.instagram.com/merylwilliams/ 

Check Stevie out here:
https://www.instagram.com/steviecreed/?hl=en 

Videographer: Kathleen Little & Palle Nodeland
Producers: Shannon Lane, Kim Nguyen, Alan Ferguson
Editor: Reuben Yarwood

H0cY-8Pu9Ik.title: Our Mom's A Big Star On OnlyFans | MY EXTRAORDINARY FAMILY
H0cY-8Pu9Ik.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

WHEN Allie Rae, of Florida, first began posting a few photos on OnlyFans last year, she had no idea how it would change her life. At the time, the 37-year-old mum worked as an ICU nurse while using social media as a hobby to help take her mind off her intense work schedule. But when her colleagues discovered her OnlyFans account, Allie Rae was forced by the hospital to leave the nursing career she loved. Now working as a full-time OnlyFans model, Allie Rae earns over $250,000 a month, giving her the financial freedom and flexibility to be with her husband and their three teenage sons. Despite the backlash she has received for her OnlyFans career, Allie Rae says she is happy with where she is. She told Truly: "I'm judged for being a mum and an OnlyFans model almost all the time. The reality is I absolutely hate that because I don't think being a mum can stop me from feeling sexy and doing what I wanna do."

Videographer: Gerrit Messersmith
Producers: Emilia Jiang, Yasmin Walker
Editor: Paul Zeller

3UokT68PPXw.title: I'm Living My Dream Life After Losing 203lbs | BRAND NEW ME
3UokT68PPXw.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

SAMANTHA Rawley, 31, from Orange County, had Vertical Sleeve Gastrectomy Surgery after being 'big' her entire life. In school, Samantha wouldn't give in her homework as it meant her having to walk up in front of the class. At her heaviest, Sammi weighed 363lbs and maintains her current weight of 160lbs by working out and controlling food intake. The main reason she says she started her weight loss journey was because of her daughter; she wanted to "set an example for her and be a better person for her" and thought "if I can do this then she can do literally anything she puts her mind to". She has now lost over 203lbs and has a podcast all about weight loss with her best friend. 

Follow Sammi here: 
Instagram.com/Therealslimsammii 
Instagram.com/vsgtea 
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/vsg-tea-with-sammi-and-bre/id1557571386

QUf8jpSuIXc.title: I'm Sexy In A Wheelchair - But Will My Blind Date Agree? | DATING DIFFERENT
QUf8jpSuIXc.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

JENNIFER Sierra, 32, from Miami Fl is not only a certified wedding and event planner - she's a social media influencer. She was born with spinal muscular atrophy type 2 but has never let this hold her back. Jennifer is an advocate for disability rights, and in particular talks about taboos around disability and sex. She hopes to inspire other women to be more comfortable with their bodies and sexuality, telling Truly that: “Sexy comes in all shapes and sizes." Dating has never been a problem for Jennifer; she has been in many relationships and was married for eight years. Having been single for a while now, she is more than ready to mingle - but will her date catch her eye?!

Videographer: Carlos De Varona

0KZzz-IjAo0.title: The Twins Who Are Both Turning To Stone | BORN DIFFERENT
0KZzz-IjAo0.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

MEET the twins battling a one-in-two-million condition that is slowly turning their muscles to bone. Lucy and Zoe, 30, from Northern Ireland, were both born with fibrodysplasia ossificans progressiva (FOP). The condition, which is so rare that the sisters are one of just three sets of twins in the world known to have it, causes muscle tissues and tendons to be replaced by bone, growing outside the skeleton. Zoe said: "Your body becomes frozen, like a statue." After being diagnosed aged eight, despite the medical challenges they faced, they enjoyed a happy childhood. But as adults, they have become more affected by the condition - with Zoe now requiring a walker or wheelchair to get around. Knowing exactly how the other is feeling means they have forged an unbreakable bond, and often document their adventures together on Instagram, where they are both trying to raise awareness of FOP. Though it is uncertain how the condition will continue to progress in the future, both women are determined to stay positive. Lucy concluded: "FOP is so unpredictable, so all we can do is love life and live life."

Follow Zoe and Lucy here:
Zoe: https://www.instagram.com/a_littlebitoflife/
Lucy: https://www.instagram.com/allthingsbeautifullymade/

Videographer: Paddy Murray
Producers: Erin Cardiff, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Ethan Edwards

LsDdYfWGop4.title: Obesity Made Me Lose My Vision - Now Look At Me | BRAND NEW ME
LsDdYfWGop4.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

CHRISTINA Jordan, 40, from Arizona, lost 134lbs naturally after being 271lbs for as long as she could remember. Her obesity made her lose her vision whilst she was carrying her baby down the stairs, causing the child to fall. It made her realise that losing weight “wasn't looking a certain way or weighing a certain magic number, it’s really life or death”. After this incident, she decided to change her life to be healthier for her children. Christina went to nutrition school to try and learn why she couldn’t lose weight after six different doctors couldn’t figure it out. She is now a Master Nutritionist and helps people lose weight by fixing their relationship with food.

wBoVq9vhc68.title: I Get Trolled Because I Stopped Working Out | RAHKI'S WORLD
wBoVq9vhc68.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

RAHKI G is turning the big 3-0 and she’s making sure to celebrate in the best way possible. After a difficult year, Rahki admits she’s been in need of a break. After taking time for herself without being in the gym, Rahki’s now feeling like she might need to get herself back on track - literally! After meeting up with her friend Mahmoud, Rahki decides it’s time to try something different to get her motivation back, and suggests an extreme workout at Carter Park race track to push herself to her very limits. Rahki added: “I’m calling it my redemption workout because I haven’t really worked out in a while, and it’s just been my birthday. I drank way too much champagne.” But after weeks off from her regular diet and exercise routine... Will she be able to manage her intense track workout? 

Videographer: Carlos De Varona 
Producers: Ruby Coote, Adam Fleet, Cecily Snowball
Editor: Pete Ansell

zIwfrxp69wg.title: My Wife Cheated On Me - So We Started Swinging | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
zIwfrxp69wg.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A WOMAN who "couldn't stop cheating" on her husband has revealed that swinging has changed their lives and brought them closer. When Krystina, 38, and Mark, 39, first got together 17 years ago, they had a more traditional relationship. But inwardly, Krystina struggled with the idea of monogamy. Though she loved Mark, she could not stay faithful and had several affairs. When he found out, he was devastated - but it also gave them the opportunity to be honest with one another about what they wanted. As they talked, he realised that he, too, had been desiring other women. They agreed to experiment with non-monogamy, and after research, settled on the idea of swinging. Living in a small town at the time, they felt pressure to keep the lifestyle a secret. But since moving away, they have been much more open. Krystina posts a lot about the realities of being a swinger on TikTok, where she has almost 250,000 followers. Unfortunately, they've lost friends since publicly coming out, and have had to deal with a lot of online hate, with people even telling her that she deserves to die. But they also have lots of support from people thanking them for normalising swinging. Krystina concluded: "Swinging has changed our lives for the better."

Videographer: John Azoni
Producers: Erin Cardiff & Ruby Coote
Editor: Omar Gobere
