AL9paIPRvNc.title: My Sleep Seizures Make Me Forget My Own Girlfriend | BORN DIFFERENT
AL9paIPRvNc.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A YOUNG woman has opened up about a little-known condition that sees her suffer with memory-wiping seizures - triggered by everything from extreme emotion to food. Meg, 21, has functional neurological disorder (FND) - where the basic wiring of the nervous system is intact, but the brain is unable to send or receive signals properly. As a result, she experiences debilitating symptoms like seizures, limb weakness, temporary paralysis, tics and narcoleptic-style episodes where she will uncontrollably fall asleep. So little is known about the condition that experts are still unsure what causes it, or exactly how to treat it. Since then, she has been trying to adapt to life, which is difficult, as every day is so unpredictable. Most days, she will have seizures, and also experiences regular sleep attacks. Both can be triggered by heightened emotions. In the past, she's had a seizure celebrating winning a sweepstake bet, and a sleep attack laughing at an episode of a sitcom. One of the worst parts of Meg's condition is that the episodes can wipe her memory, so she'll forget key people in her life - including devoted girlfriend Tara, 23, who keeps a diary and shows her photos or takes her to meaningful places to help her remember. Meg, who documents life with FND on TikTok to raise awareness, concluded: "I want to help give people with hidden disabilities a voice."

Follow Meg:
https://www.tiktok.com/@megjacks
https://www.instagram.com/megjacks_/

Follow Tara:
https://www.tiktok.com/@tarasorkin
https://www.instagram.com/tarasorkin/

Videographer: Nick Hamer
Producers: Erin Cardiff and Kim Nguyen
Editor: Garry Sykes

Pl9p4PSeN00.title: From Goth To Beauty Queen - How Will My Fiancé React? | TRANSFORMED
Pl9p4PSeN00.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

RAISED in a conservative Christian home, Jordan Bovee', from Minnesota, looks nothing like the stereotypical 'church girl'. Sporting her shiny latex bodysuit and fishnets, the 27-year-old describes her style as 'very eclectic industrial goth'. Growing up as an alternative kid dressed in all black, Jordan always felt like 'the black sheep of the family' - especially when she was compared to her sister, Angela, who was once crowned as Little Miss Minnesota. Throughout her entire life, people have been trying to convince Jordan to try a different style but she has never done so - until now. Today, Jordan is going to step into her sister's shoes for a day as she undergoes an extreme beauty queen makeover. She will also be seeing Angela for the first time in over a year - will Angela recognise her sister in a dazzling evening gown with a tiara?

y7kPyfpiIME.title: People Say I'm 'Sick' For Breastfeeding My 4-Year-Old | MY EXTRAORDINARY FAMILY
y7kPyfpiIME.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A MUM-OF-TWO, and an advocate of extended nursing, has been breastfeeding her four-year-old daughter every day since she was born. Describing it as 'mother's intuition', Cherrelle Granville, 31, from The Hague, Netherlands, says she has always wanted to breastfeed her children for as long as possible - even beyond toddlerhood. When Cherrelle had her first child Christiano, now 11, she was forced to stop breastfeeding him aged two after her desire to continue was met with disapproval among family and friends. As Cherrelle began to educate herself on long-term breastfeeding, she was welcomed by a community of mothers who shared the same belief and gave Cherrelle the support she needed. After her daughter Cavani was born, Cherrelle decided to fully embrace the nursing method regardless of others' judgement. Four years later, Cherrelle has been breastfeeding Cavani at least once a day with no plans of stopping it anytime soon. Now the proud mother regularly shares her breastfeeding photos on social media in a bid to raise awareness of extended nursing and natural parenting.

Follow Cherrelle here:
https://www.instagram.com/fromcherrywithlove/
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxBQtZ8_VbuPuHA_BJuK9bw

Follow Eva (photograher) here:
https://www.instagram.com/evabours_fotografie/

Thanks to @devrouwmetcamera for providing additional photography for this project. 

Follow Nanouk here:
https://www.instagram.com/devrouwmetcamera/

OqTQw-fKPNc.title: I Was A Plus Size Model -  Until I Lost 195lbs | BRAND NEW ME
OqTQw-fKPNc.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

JILLIAN Rogue was a plus-size model before she lost an incredible 195lbs. She was always an overweight child because she used food to comfort her in times of need and gained even more weight when she became homeless and fast food was cheap to get. She became a plus-size model after deciding that she was ‘going to embrace her body and learn to love it’. Modelling gave her confidence to go out and enjoy her life and all her experiences ‘brought her away from addiction with food’ and she started losing weight. After actively focusing on her health she started ‘bike riding, intermittent fasting, controlling portion sizes’ and lost ‘a whole person’. Jillian says after losing weight she feels like she has ‘a new lease on life’. 

Follow Jillian here: 
https://www.instagram.com/jillian.rogue/
https://www.youtube.com/c/JillianRogue

Videographer: Genaro Delgadillo
Producers: Nosheen Hussain, Ruby Coote
Editor: Paul Zeller

tC2xvCFr-UA.title: My Groom Came Out As Trans On Our Honeymoon | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
tC2xvCFr-UA.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A MARRIED COUPLE are tying the knot again as wife and wife - after the groom came out as transgender during their honeymoon. Rayna, 33, and Jae, 30, first met on MySpace back in 2010, when they lived in the UK and USA respectively. At the time, Rayna, who was born male, was still living as a man and using her birth name, Jake. After around seven months of speaking daily, Rayna flew to the States to meet Jae. The couple went on to get married in an intimate ceremony in 2018. But unbeknownst to her new wife, Rayna was secretly battling with feeling as if she had been born in the wrong body. As Rayna grew older, she met people in the LGBTQ community - which led to the realisation that she was transgender. But it was not until two months after their wedding that Rayna revealed her true identity to her wife, whilst the pair were on their honeymoon at Centre Parcs. Since then, Rayna has spent £45,000 on her transition. She and Jae have faced judgment for their relationship, particularly since going public about their story online. But they have vowed to continue trying to educate others, and cannot wait to walk down the aisle together for a second time.

Follow Rayna and Jae here:
https://www.instagram.com/officiallyrayna/
https://www.instagram.com/heyitsjaegrey/

Videographer: Simon Vacher 
Producers: Erin Cardiff & Ruby Coote
Editor: Shane Fennelly

IBmSsTU515k.title: I Have 2 Separate Vaginas | BORN DIFFERENT
IBmSsTU515k.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A WOMAN has spoken candidly of the rare condition that means she was born with two vaginas. Growing up, Evelyn, 31, recalls a few symptoms, like unusually heavy periods. But it was not until she turned 20 that she was officially diagnosed with uterus didelphys - meaning she has two vaginas, two cervixes, and two uteruses. In time, she felt comfortable enough with her condition to speak more publicly about it. Evelyn, who now works as an OnlyFans model, added: "People were mostly intrigued and had lots of questions rather than saying anything negative." Luckily, her condition has not gotten in the way of her finding love. She first met her boyfriend Adam when they were teenagers. As they grew older, they lost touch for about a decade - before rekindling on Facebook. Today, Evelyn is setting up her own YouTube channel, where she'll tackle the questions she gets asked most frequently once and for all. She concluded: "The message that I'd like to give the world by sharing my story is that everyone can be completely different. And that's okay."

Videographer: Aaron Fioni
Producers: Erin Cardiff, Ruby Coote
Editor: Sarah-Jayne Galpin

X5J4Q6kX-X8.title: I've Shrunk My Waist To 15 Inches | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
X5J4Q6kX-X8.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

RUTH Lujan, 24, from Torreon, Mexico is a practitioner of tight laced corseting. Naturally, her waist is 40cm and when Ruth’s corset is fully laced up it shrinks down to a tiny 30cm - or 11.8 inches. Five years ago whilst at a ballet class, Ruth’s teacher noticed some issues with her movement and advised her to go to see a doctor. She was diagnosed with a rare condition called Hyperlaxity Syndrome which affects muscles and ligaments. The doctor recommended that wearing a corset could help the condition which resulted in Ruth gaining an interest in tight laced corseting. Ruth began posting her corseting journey on TikTok and Instagram and began gathering a huge following online. However, some of the responses she got shocked her as some people made bizarre and hurtful comments like: ‘You're not real. Your waist isn’t real. You are a robot.’ And her sister Valeria sometimes worries that Ruth’s look is too extreme which creates a little friction between them both...

Follow Ruth here:
https://www.instagram.com/abracadabra.patadecabra/?hl=en
https://www.tiktok.com/@abracadabra.patadecabra?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1

Videographer: Fernando Poire
Producers: Tom Jones, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Hailey Wang

sEU4_rGTxqI.title: My Wart Turned Into A 1.5kg Tumour | BORN DIFFERENT
sEU4_rGTxqI.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

WHEN Samad, 61, from East Java, Indonesia, developed a wart on his face at the age of 12, he had no idea it would eventually morph into a 1.5 kilogram (3lb) tumour resembling the trunk of an elephant. Over the years, the growths have spread throughout his body and led to numerous surgeries, displacing his nose and obscuring his entire right eye. He often faces ridicule on the street and is avoided by people who mistakenly think he has an infectious disease that could spread from close contact. But Samad has found acceptance among his friends at the sugarcane fields where he works and says he no longer wants to pursue surgery but is instead channeling his energy into constructing his dream home.

To donate towards Samad’s treatment visit:
https://kitabisa.com/campaign/hidungmbahsamad

Videographer: Jefri Tarigan 
Producers: Tom Midlane and Ruby Coote
Editor: William Strange

oXpkKdoFnxo.title: Don't Hate Me For Spoiling My Kids With Expensive Gifts | BLING LIFE
oXpkKdoFnxo.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

THE Drewitt-Barlows are back! Today, they are opening the doors of their multi-million pound Florida mansion to give Truly a glimpse into their fabulously luxurious life. The impressive property - set on 10 acres of land - is home to Barrie, his ex-husband Tony, and their children, Aspen, Saffron, Orlando, Dallas and Jasper. Tony's boyfriend Brent, and Barrie's boyfriend Scott also live with the family, as does Valentina, Scott and Barrie's baby. Having earned their millions through a number of businesses, savvy entrepreneurs Barrie and Tony work hard for their cash - and have lots of fun spending it. The family's car collection alone is worth a fortune, from $160,000 Shelby trucks to brand new Teslas. They travel the world on yachts and private planes, stay in high-end hotels, and shop for designer clothes and jewellery. Previously, Barrie has faced criticism for "spoiling" his children - but he has hit back, saying it is his money to spend however he pleases. Today, Saffron - who Barrie jokes is "the most expensive thing" in the Drewitt-Barlow household - is having a special surprise delivered. After she wrote off her old car, her twin brother Aspen and Barrie joined forces to surprise her with her dream £295,000 G-Wagon.

Follow the Drewitt-Barlow family at
https://www.instagram.com/donbarrie/
https://www.instagram.com/drewittbarlow/
https://www.instagram.com/scottroberthutchison/
https://www.instagram.com/brentbrown2019/
https://www.instagram.com/saffron_db/
https://www.instagram.com/aspendrewittbarlow/

Videographer: Gerritt Messersmith 
Producers: Erin Cardiff, Ruby Coote
Editor: Beth Angus

P3ktZrhNF90.title: I Was An Accountant - Now I'm An Adult Model | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
P3ktZrhNF90.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

JAZMYNE DAY has spent nearly $40,000 on surgeries to transform herself from trainee accountant to an overly enhanced online model. Overweight and miserable with her job back in Wales, Jazymne decided she needed to change everything about her life. After quitting her job, she had a breast enhancement, upping her size to a 32N, and followed it up with a Brazilian butt lift, new teeth and a stringent exercise routine. When a friend suggested she set up an OnlyFans account to flaunt her new body, she found posting pictures of herself online boosted her confidence, and was soon earning more in a month than she did in a year as an accountant. Now based in Las Vegas, Jazmyne’s moved on to creating professional content for her own website and is branching out into fitness, with no plans to return to her old life in finance.

Gym: https://www.instagram.com/smashironfitness/

Videographer: Travis Robinson
Producers: Jake Slight and Kim Nguyen
Editor: Tom Waddington

sBoXdH-cYLA.title: The Conjoined Twins Who Don't Want To Separate | BORN DIFFERENT
sBoXdH-cYLA.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

PAN and Pin are conjoined twins from Thailand – the two girls are joined from their hips down, meaning they share one pair of legs. Separating Pan and Pin is a possibility, but an incredibly risky operation with a 50/50 chance of survival. Their grandmother Noknoi has brought them up since birth, due to their parents being unable to take care of them full time. Noknoi told Truly: "It was challenging at the beginning, because I've only ever raised a one-headed child." Pan and Pin are now thriving, however, as they've learnt to walk and can even cycle independently. "We have to cooperate, there are some times when our legs can't support our weight well, we fall a lot," Pan and Pin said. Since they share a stomach, the twins also have to eat separately to avoid digestion problems. Despite the difficulties, the twins say they love being conjoined because it means they are never lonely and always have each other's support.

Videographer: Don Poonpat
Producers: Giacomo Brunelli and Yasmin Walker
Editor: Rueben Yarwood

uCanM994Jns.title: Romantic Goth To Jock | TRANSFORMED
uCanM994Jns.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

INSPIRED by horror stories and alternative music, Peter Black, of Amsterdam, Netherlands, has been gaining traction online for dressing as a romantic goth from the Victorian era. The 35-year-old Argentina native moved to the Dutch capital after he struggled to freely express his passion for makeup and be accepted by people for his sexuality. Now enjoying his life in his new home, Peter has been able to experiment with his style more creatively and publicly. Peter describes his style as a fusion from underground 80s goth to historical Victorian couture. Both on social media and in real life, Peter has consistently kept an all-black aesthetic - but he is eager to try something different for a change. Today, Peter is meeting up with a makeup artist who will transform him into a 'sporty jock'. With a few layers of fake tan and trendy tracksuits, will the makeover convince Peter to introduce a new style to his wardrobe?

Follow Peter here: https://www.instagram.com/pterblack/
Follow Shannon (MUA) here: https://www.instagram.com/shanmua_/

Videographer: Stijn Brinkmann
Producers: Emilia Jiang, Yasmin Walker
Editor: Giulia Bassanese

crcvUZFQCv0.title: Why Can't I Be Sexy At 71? | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
crcvUZFQCv0.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

71-YEAR-OLD Keiko Guest, from Georgia, is proving that old age is just a mindset. The former dancer and photographer became a TikTok star overnight when she started posting videos and photos of herself posing in stiletto heels and tight dresses. Keiko credits her youthful looks and mindset to her active lifestyle. She frequently works out to stay strong - she even learnt to fly the aerial trapeze when she was 70. Keiko uses her social media account to challenge ageist stereotypes. She told Truly: “I’m trying to normalise a woman who can age with grace, but I’ve received so much hate.” Despite some of the negativity she’s received, Keiko still loves to post videos for her fans. She said: “I’ve been doing this kind of work all my life. Now TikTok gives me the opportunity to share my content with the world.” 

Follow Keiko Here:
TikTok & IG: @keiko.at71

Videographer: Aakash Bakshi
Producers: Milly Martin, Ruby Coote
Editor: Omar Gobere

PUhJEbqn_78.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

TELSAH, from Arizona, USA, has completely transformed her body and life after losing an amazing 120lbs. Telsah was always a bigger child and developed a bad relationship with food at an early age. Her calorie count was between 6,000 and 7,000 per day and was filled with unhealthy junk food. Telsah told truly: "I used food as a comfort for anything, whether it was sadness, happiness, scared, stress, it didn't matter what it was." This unhealthy binge eating led to her weight gain and despite showing a happy exterior, Telsah kept her real feelings hidden way inside. Telsah said: "The feeling of me being scared to die at such a young age, me being almost 300lbs, eating three to four dinners a day... I knew I needed to change my life." At the age of 18, Telsah decided to act and made the life changing decision to have vertical gastric sleeve surgery. With a lot of hard work, changing her diet and working closely with a personal trainer, Telsah dropped an incredible 120lbs and has finally got the body and confidence she always wanted. Telsah added "When I look in the mirror now, I see me, I see happiness and I see a fit, healthy, happy person. You have to have faith in yourself and just go with it." 

Follow Telsah Here:
https://www.instagram.com/tels123/

Videographer: Michael Giannantonio

TL52EJrJ49U.title: The Girl Born With No Eyes | BORN DIFFERENT
TL52EJrJ49U.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

EIGHT-YEAR-OLD Monroe Wright was born without both of her eyes due to a condition known as bilateral anophthalmia. The condition occurs at an estimate of about 1 in 10,000 births. When Monroe's mum, Heaven, was told by the doctors that her daughter had no eyes, it came as a complete surprise as until this point nothing had been detected. Although it hasn’t been easy, Heaven was determined to show Monroe that she could still achieve everything she wanted. Heaven told Truly: “Monroe’s biggest strength is her adaptability, she could so easily be dependent on me but she is fiercely independent." Monroe loves to sing and act, and is fearless in her approach to everything she does. The pair have also set up a clothing brand called "Love Is Blind"  with the mission to bring awareness to diversity and inclusion, while advocating for blindness.

Follow Monroe here:
https://www.instagram.com/monroewright_/ 
http://www.teammonroe.org/

Thank you to Rob for his photography. To see more of his work, click here: https://www.instagram.com/robseher/ 

Videographer: Clint Montgomery
Producers: Joel Ross and Ruby Coote
Editor: Alex Lubetkin

ROxlcRtH2HU.title: Vampire Princess To Girl Next Door | TRANSFORMED
ROxlcRtH2HU.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

SPOTTED at her stately castle home in Sweden, Victoria Lovelace describes herself as a magical vampire princess. The 32-year-old alternative model and beauty entrepreneur has had a lifelong obsession with vampires as well as the aesthetic inspired by the folklore creature. Victoria and her musician husband, Dracul Grotesque, are known on social media as the couple who dress as vampires every day. Victoria even had permanent fangs installed to immerse herself in the vampire lifestyle. With a wardrobe full of black clothes and gothic accessories, Victoria has never tried putting on anything in neutral colours or high street fashion. But today, the vampire princess decides to swap her vintage garments for a casual chic look in an extreme transformation. Will Dracul still recognise his beloved vampire princess?

ZdwlMRopQqA.title: I Binge Ate My Way To 300lbs - But Look At Me Now | BRAND NEW ME
ZdwlMRopQqA.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

TORI SCOTT, from Baytown, Texas, has gone from over 300lbs to a bodybuilding competition - after losing a staggering 160lbs. She was overweight as a child and blamed her weight to binge and emotional eating. The turning point for Tori was when she saw pictures of herself during a vacation and was horrified. After feeling upset with the way she looked, Tori decided to have VSG surgery and began her weight loss and fitness journey. She started to visit the gym at least five times a week and began a vegetarian diet. Her newest goal is to push things even further and she is currently training for her first bodybuilding competition. She told Truly: "I want to be the healthiest, best version of myself when I walk across that stage to say goodbye to that 300lb version of myself."

Follow Tori here: https://www.instagram.com/torrrrrific/ 

Videographer: Trent Wittenbach, Andrew Olson
Producers: Kim Nguyen, Adam Fleet
Editor: Athina Chatzidaki

9c1A7_CDzLQ.title: From Pastor's Daughter To Millionaire Adult Model | BLING LIFE
9c1A7_CDzLQ.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A WOMAN has told how she went from "sheltered" pastor's daughter to a millionaire adult model. Growing up, Nala Ray, 23, would read the Bible every day and attend church regularly. Strict rules meant that makeup and provocative dressing were banned - but around the age of 16, she began rebelling. Eventually, aged 20, Nala stopped going to church. Around the same time, she began using social media -  and slowly started sharing more risque snaps. Eventually, she joined OnlyFans, and within just six months, she had banked her first million. Now, Nala is living the high life, renting a $15,000 a month mansion in Los Angeles, and regularly splashing the cash on fast cars and designer clothes. Sadly, not everybody is accepting of her chosen career. Still, as she reflects on how drastically her life has transformed, she has no regrets. She said: "I never dreamed I would have this lifestyle. Money is just not an object anymore."

Videographer: Istvan Lettang
Producers: Erin Cardiff, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Reuben Yarwood

8QkOblZeRuE.title: My Fake Biceps Are Botched - Now What Do I Do? | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
8QkOblZeRuE.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

THE BABY Ken Doll has undergone over 80 procedures including filler, laser treatments and surgeries to achieve his ‘naturally plastic’ look. Tyler Dyvig, aka the Baby Ken Doll, 24, first had botox at the age of just 15. Since then, he has had more cosmetic procedures including; forehead reduction, pec implants and bicep implants. However, Tyler’s experience with some of his cosmetic procedures has definitely not been a smooth one. Tyler told Truly: “I used to think I was invincible. But I had some really crappy procedures, and it really opened my eyes.” Doctors believe some of the injections he received may have caused issues with his body regulating his heart rate and he has had issues with his bicep implants. Tyler is not done with cosmetic procedures yet but feels he has learned a lesson to ensure he does his research beforehand. 

Follow Tyler here: 
https://www.instagram.com/tylerdyvig/ 

Jesse - https://www.instagram.com/jesseme93/ 
Jared - https://www.instagram.com/jaredherzogmusic/ 
Timmy - https://www.instagram.com/timmymhood/ 
Jeremy - https://www.instagram.com/iamglamazonprime/ 

Videographer: Armando Aparicio
Producers: Emika Berry, Ruby Coote
Editor: Sonia Estal

sPlaNlohDpY.title: My EB Has Taken My Hair But Not My Spirit | BORN DIFFERENT
sPlaNlohDpY.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

34-YEAR-OLD Assya, from Birmingham, was born with a severe form of the ultra rare disease Epidermolysis Bullosa. Diagnosed with her condition at birth, Assya was only given 24 hours to live but has defied the odds and doesn't let the EB affect her positivity. Due to her condition, Assya lives with painful blisters all throughout her body, both externally and internally. She has to dress her blisters each morning, and on the worst days it can take up to seven hours to fully bandage herself. Though she experiences pain throughout her entire body, the worst-affected area is her head, where she's lost all of her hair. Assya told Truly: "I started losing my hair when I was about 11, 12, and then by the time I turned 16 I was completely bald - it was really hard." With over 15,000 TikTok followers, Assya now enjoys her social media success.

Follow Assya here:
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@ebqueeen
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/assyaebqueeen/

Videographer: Jordan Carroll

3IJfvVFTQnI.title: My 'Beast' Physique Won't Stop Me Looking Glam | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
3IJfvVFTQnI.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

HAVING spent years pushing herself to the limit at the gym, 28-year-old Jessica Sestrem, a female Brazilian bodybuilder based in Frankfurt, Germany, has biceps that would give anyone a run for their money. Using social media to show off her toned physique, Jessica has racked up over 100,000 followers on Instagram and is a regular on the competition circuit. The gym is a constant part of Jessica’s life with her spending hours working out there on a daily basis to sculpt her incredible, muscular figure. One thing she has found though is that the preconceived notion of bodybuilding being a macho activity means people struggle to accept her femininity. Jessica rejects this preconception and outside of her gym life dresses in elegant, glamorous clothes and also loves wearing high heels. To Jessica, there is no reason bodybuilding and beauty can’t coexist together comfortably, telling Truly: “I can be a beast at the gym and a lady on the street." 

Follow Jessica here: 
https://www.instagram.com/p/BwosnecH0NV/

Videographer: Ly Berheide
Producers: Tom Jones, Ruby Coote
Editor: Alex Lubetkin

vd1W1d9d_Ds.title: I Lost 100lbs Inside A Year | BRAND NEW ME
vd1W1d9d_Ds.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

CRYING herself to sleep after trying what felt like every diet going and losing no weight, Martyna couldn’t see a way out. She describes her relationship to food as an addiction that was ruining her life. The change in her weight loss journey came when she focused on finding foods and exercise that she actually enjoyed, not to mention placing a bet that she would lose 100lbs within a year - and she did just that. Binge eating had been a part of Martyna’s life since she was a child. From age 19 she went to Overeaters Anonymous but stopped after a number of years: it wasn’t so much the desire for food itself that was the problem but more how she used food as a solution to her problems in life. When lockdown hit, Martyna realised it was the perfect time to lose weight - she didn’t need to go out, could drink water at home and phase in a more healthy diet - she became vegan and now eats a predominantly plant-based diet. Every single morning before she had a chance to think what day it was, Martyna would put on her trainers and at 6am go for a long walk. She also discovered she loved at home weight workouts and would do personal training sessions in the park once the lockdown eased. 

Follow Martyna here:
https://www.instagram.com/consistencykilledthefat/

Videographer: Alessandro Di Rosa
Producers: Nathalie Bonney, Yasmin Walker
Editor: Tom Waddington

ybJ10XqCdis.title: They Call Me 'The Tree Man' | BORN DIFFERENT
ybJ10XqCdis.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

34-YEAR-OLD Mohammad Abul Bazadar, from Bangladesh, is known as the ‘tree man’, due to suffering an incredibly rare condition which makes his hands and feet look like bark. He has Epidermodysplasia verruciformis, a skin condition which causes wart-like lesions to cover parts of the body. It's an inherited condition that makes the sufferer highly susceptible to infections caused by the human papillomavirus (HPV). Mohammad told Truly: “I am known as the ‘tree man’. My disease is very rare and it is hardly seen anywhere.” Mohammad has undergone treatment for his disorder, but the warts always grow back. “I tried traditional medicine but it was no use”, he explained. “My hands and feet have turned into roots.” 

Videographer: Haziq Qadri
Producers: Kate Moore and Ruby Coote 
Editor: Giulia Bassanese

bm6195n_v8A.title: I'm Going To Share My Girlfriend With Other People | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
bm6195n_v8A.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

SHARING your partner with someone else might seem unthinkable for some, but for one couple it's a dream that will soon be realised. 33-year-old Gideon and his 19-year-old girlfriend Marley have been together for nine months and recently decided to venture into the swinger lifestyle. Now, the pair – who live in conservative Utah – are opening up about their lifestyle with the launch of a new podcast. Marley said: "We get people saying 'that is not love' and 'that is not what you should be doing in a relationship'. But I would describe our relationship as explosive and magnetic. I feel 100 percent comfortable with him."

Videographer: Holly Tuckett
Producers: Joe Roberts & Kim Nguyen
Editor: Garry Sykes

yERwnUjrOc8.title: Kawaii Goth Gets 50s Makeover | TRANSFORMED
yERwnUjrOc8.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

 24-YEAR-OLD Renzyll from Brisbane, Australia, describes her style as a fusion of spooky goth and cute Kawaii. She started exploring alternative clothing as early as 13 years old, a taste influenced by her mother who was a punk music fan. Renzyll's unique style emerged when she became a keen cosplayer and was immediately drawn to the Japanese fashion. Red contact lenses, dolly eye makeup and platform boots are all essential parts of Renzyll's everyday look. But Renzyll admits that she often 'feels like a girl rather than a real woman' in her alternative style. Today, Renzyll is going to be transformed into an ultra-feminine 50s rockabilly look with the help of a vintage makeup artist and her close friend and real-life pinup, Zara. Will the new look inspire Renzyll to consider switching up her style?

Follow Renzyll here:
https://www.instagram.com/renzyll/

Follow Cath (MUA) here:
https://www.instagram.com/cmwcreatingfaces/

Videographer: Beau Newton
Producers: Nathalie Bonney, Kim Nguyen

8kj9yF0_NHU.title: I'm Only 3ft Tall - Will My 6ft Blind Date Mind? | DATING DIFFERENT
8kj9yF0_NHU.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

JONNA ROSS is a 31-year-old singleton currently living in Kingsburg, California, who was born with a rare form of dwarfism. Jonna told Truly: “I’m only 3 feet and typically (people with) other types of dwarfism are a lot taller than me. I look average size, just smooshed together!” High school was the hardest for Jonna as kids were having crushes but no-one wanted to date a ‘little person’. She said: "Dating with dwarfism is very different. Dating someone that has something physically different about them, you’re learning to understand and there’s a lot of questions to be asked!” Jonna has never been on a blind date and doesn’t have many expectations. “The only expectation I have is that he’s nice and that it goes well!  As I get older I realize that if someone that's genuine and honest and loyal is like a huge checklist!” Will Jonna's blind date - 6ft 1'' Brian - be the guy of her dreams?

Follow Jonna and Brian:
https://www.instagram.com/lilmissross7/
https://www.instagram.com/briancade1/

Videographer: Matt Mealer, Joe Roberts
Producers: Dav Rich and Ruby Coote
Editor: Paul Zeller

localized.title: I'm Only 3ft Tall - Will My 6ft Blind Date Mind? | DATING DIFFERENT
localized.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

JONNA ROSS is a 31-year-old singleton currently living in Kingsburg, California, who was born with a rare form of dwarfism. Jonna told Truly: “I’m only 3 feet and typically (people with) other types of dwarfism are a lot taller than me. I look average size, just smooshed together!” High school was the hardest for Jonna as kids were having crushes but no-one wanted to date a ‘little person’. She said: "Dating with dwarfism is very different. Dating someone that has something physically different about them, you’re learning to understand and there’s a lot of questions to be asked!” Jonna has never been on a blind date and doesn’t have many expectations. “The only expectation I have is that he’s nice and that it goes well!  As I get older I realize that if someone that's genuine and honest and loyal is like a huge checklist!” Will Jonna's blind date - 6ft 1'' Brian - be the guy of her dreams?

Follow Jonna and Brian:
https://www.instagram.com/lilmissross7/
https://www.instagram.com/briancade1/

Videographer: Matt Mealer, Joe Roberts
Producers: Dav Rich and Ruby Coote
Editor: Paul Zeller

Ty3gNU-4Zpc.title: I Got Pregnant At 14 - But Wouldn't Change It | MY EXTRAORDINARY FAMILY
Ty3gNU-4Zpc.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

16-YEAR OLD teen mum Macey from Atlanta, Georgia was just 14 when she found out that she was pregnant and expecting her first child. “When I found out I was pregnant it was hard to process, I was really shocked,” Macey told Truly. With a mum and grandmother who were both teen mums themselves, Macey’s family were worried about the impact this would have on her. And even Macey herself had her doubts: “I didn’t really think I was cut out to be a mum, I didn’t really want kids and used to judge teen mums.” However, the highschool freshman decided to keep her baby and Macey gave birth to her daughter Scarlett last year. Macey has been documenting her experiences as a teen mum online to support other young mums. Whilst she receives huge amounts of support on her social media platforms, she has also faced a lot of judgment and negativity. “I received a lot of hate when I was pregnant, I had people drag my name through the mudd.” Determined not to let the negativity get to her, Macey continues to share her story and today she’s meeting her cousin Taylor to take some pictures for social media. 

Follow Macey here:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/maceyyburnett/ 
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@maceyyburnett 

Videographer: Michael Catron
Producers:  Stephanie Stijkel, Ruby Coote 
Editor: Giulia Bassanese

17NMX_n7l-U.title: Influencer Shocks Mom With Her New 'Cat Eyes' | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
17NMX_n7l-U.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AFTER spending over $100,000 radically overhauling her appearance, reality star and influencer Nicole Zavala promised her mother that she would stop. But after almost a year-long break from plastic surgery, Nicole has decided to dramatically alter her face - by getting a ‘foxy eyes’ thread lift. The procedure involves inserting threads into the corner of her eye arch to make the outer brow slant upwards, lifting and elongating the upper eyelid. But will Nicole like the results? And what will her brother Michael and friend Flac - both of whom have been critical of her surgery addiction - make of the finished look? Oh, and here comes Nicole’s mother...and she does not look happy.

Follow Nicole on Instagram:
https://www.instagram.com/realnicolezavala/

Videographer:  Carlos De Varona
Producers: Tom Midlane, James Thorne, Giacomo Brunelli

9E-5_UONYOc.title: I'm 16 - But I Look 50 | BORN DIFFERENT
9E-5_UONYOc.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A 16-year-old is suffering from a rare condition that makes her look like she's 50. Raizel Calago, from the Philippines, is 16 years old but looks middle-aged due to an undiagnosed, mystery genetic condition. Raizel told Truly: “I have a rare condition that makes me look old. I noticed my condition in 2019, I was shocked and asked myself why my face was like this.” When Raizel and her family started noticing the changes to her appearance she sought medical advice. “The doctors believe it could be progeria”, she explained. However, she is waiting for a formal diagnosis. The teenager had previously been competing in beauty pageants, but over the course of two years her body began to age rapidly and her life was turned upside down. 

Videographer: Sherbien Dacalanio
Producers: Kate Moore and Kim Nguyen
Editor: Hailey Wang

yQGT3dQ6Jy4.title: Will My Blind Date See Past My Wheelchair? | DATING DIFFERENT
yQGT3dQ6Jy4.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

NILA MORTON is a 22-year-old singleton currently living in Greenville, South Carolina. Nila was born with Ullrich, a rare form of Muscular Dystrophy, and does not let her condition affect her day-to-day life. Nila told Truly: “I'm a very active disabled woman, I don't allow my disability to define me or hold me back. It just causes limitations and some challenges, but you know, I'm going to just keep going.” Nila is yet to find the ‘one’ and is excited to go on a blind date. “Dating hasn't been the best. But I do know that because of me being in a wheelchair, I will say that it causes a lot of men to feel insecure. It's just, it's just a life thing.” Nila is looking for a man who is open minded, has a good sense of humor and who she can have a really good time with. “I do like them nice and tall, not problematic and nicely built!” Will Nila find the man of her dreams?

Follow Nila and Kian:
https://www.instagram.com/nilanmorton/
https://www.instagram.com/kinnylewis/

Videographer: Michael Catron
Producers: Dav Rich and James Thorne
Editor: Reuben Yarwood

EpUa2ABUeKk.title: Glamour Modelling Funds My Lavish Lifestyle | BLING LIFE
EpUa2ABUeKk.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

APOLLONIA Llewellyn has made over £100,000 from her OnlyFans account in the last 12 months. The already successful bikini and fashion model joined the platform 18 months ago, six months before the global pandemic. She says: “The first six months were quite successful, then lockdown happened and boom my profits started to soar." Having started modelling for local brands aged 14, Apollonia turned it into a full time career after winning the World Teen Supermodel UK crown at 17 years old. That said, Apollonia never could have dreamed she’d be as successful as she is now, and as such, she likes to treat herself to designer clothes and recently even bought a luxury sports car, that she of course had wrapped in pink. Today, Truly meets Apollonia at her home in the UK, where we’ll follow her to her studio and see her in action at a photoshoot. 

Videographer: Adam Young
Producers: Erin Cardiff, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Tom Buckman

Me1PvEnNjP4.title: Twins Spend £140K On Surgery To Look 'Identical' | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
Me1PvEnNjP4.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

TWIN sisters Daisy and Dolly have together spent £140,000 on cosmetic procedures in a bid to look as identical as possible. The 25-year-old twins, of Stockton-On-Tees, UK, started getting lip filler together at the age of 18 and have since undergone surgery together too. The twins had breast augmentations on the same day, by the same surgeon and asked for the same size and both underwent rhinoplasty surgery earlier this year - again on the same day and asked for the same shape. They describe their look as ‘hyper feminine, girly, glamorous and luxurious'. Both Dolly and Daisy are planning to have BBLs in the future, but differ on where to get them done - will Daisy be able to convince Dolly to hold off? And what will their mum think of their future plans? Daisy told Truly: “I would say our ultimate goal is to look even more identical than we are now. So we will continue getting more cosmetic procedures to look more identical.” 

Follow the twins on Instagram:
Dolly: https://www.instagram.com/dolly_bxo/ 
Daisy: https://www.instagram.com/missdaisyxox/

Videographer:  Paul Chambers
Producers: Emika Berry
Editor: Shiona Penrake

And what will their mum think of their future plans? Daisy told Truly: “I would say our ultimate goal is to look even more identical than we are now. So we will continue getting more cosmetic procedures to look more identical.”

qJ8COwoW5Rk.title: The Family Whose Faces Change Shape | BORN DIFFERENT
qJ8COwoW5Rk.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

 A FAMILY in North Sumatra, Indonesia, are living with a rare condition that causes their faces to change shape. Out of the six children of the Manurung family, four of them are living with an undiagnosed and incredibly rare facial condition. Suyra told Truly: “The fact is, our faces they have changed shape but we accept it and just live with it. In my opinion, growing up with this condition made me feel inferior. But now, I don’t feel like that anymore.” Despite many suggesting the family had been cursed, they have realised their condition must be genetic, as their father is also affected. The family are yet to visit a doctor for any diagnosis and, due to the unusual nature of their looks, they have had to get used to people reacting negatively to their appearance. 

Follow the family here:

Instagram : www.instagram.com/keluargamanurungofficial
Facebook : https://facebook.com/keluargamanurungofficial/

lDuZ4hZ7Dbk.title: $1M Human Ken Doll Meets Supersized Surgery Mom | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
lDuZ4hZ7Dbk.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

WELCOME to the Million Dollar Body Club! Known worldwide as the “Human Ken Doll,” host Justin Jedlica has spent over $1m to achieve plastic perfection - designing some of his own custom implants and becoming a plastic surgery consultant in the process. Today Justin is joined poolside by glamour model and mom-of-eight Allegra Cole, who has made waves in the plastic surgery community with her supersized breasts and buttocks. Allegra shares the story of her plastic surgery journey over a glass of Champagne and shows off the results of her recent butt fillers. She also reveals the elusive price-tag on her body transformation - and asks Justin for advice on the work she wants done in the future.

ooTzB27hiP4.title: I'm Called A 'Bad Mum' Because I'm Covered In Tatts | MY EXTRAORDINARY FAMILY
ooTzB27hiP4.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

BECKY HOLT has been dubbed Britain’s most tattooed woman, with approximately 80% of her body covered in tattoos. The inked model and influencer is now a mother to seven-month-old Aurora Forrest, and her critics out there aren’t shy in passing judgement. Becky told Truly: “I have been called a bad mother because of my tattoos and that my daughter will be embarrassed of me when she’s older." It’s not just the haters that think Becky has gone too far with her look. Even some of Becky's friends and family members think she needs to stop getting any more modifications. Becky has wanted to get her tongue split for years and despite concerns from others she is determined to do as she pleases, being a mother or not. Today, she is meeting her younger brother Toby, who is especially against her plans of getting any more body modifications. How will he react to Becky’s latest plans?

Follow Becky Here: https://www.instagram.com/becky_holt_bolt/ 

Videographer:  Paul Chambers
Producers: Stephanie Stijkel, Yasmin Walker
Editor: Cecilia Brunelli

wQBlyarsOxk.title: We Get Trolled For Our Interabled Relationship | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
wQBlyarsOxk.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AN INTERABLED couple whose wedding pictures went viral have hit back at cruel trolls who judged their relationship. When motivational speaker Winston, 35, and life coach Mayfair, 23, met at a networking event in 2018, neither were thinking about romance, so the bond they struck up was initially platonic. But in time, romance blossomed. Because Winston has a condition called osteogenesis imperfecta (OI) - a skeletal disorder causing bones to become brittle - part of becoming a couple was a candid conversation about what his disability would mean for them. From there, their relationship went from strength to strength, and they got married last August. But when their wedding pictures unexpectedly went viral, they were met with some nasty comments. Mayfair was dubbed a "golddigger" and accused of cheating, while Winston was called "selfish" for being with her. They also deal with judgment in the real world, with some people asking intrusive questions, or assuming Winston cannot speak for himself. Happily, though, the couple, who document their relationship on YouTube, recently discovered Mayfair was pregnant and are now committed to being the "best parents possible."

Follow Winston and Mayfair at
https://www.youtube.com/c/TheClements
https://www.instagram.com/theclements_/

Videographer: Matthew Hurley
Producers: Erin Cardiff & Ruby Coote
Editor: Giulia Bassanese

dBX9QmRhHoY.title: The Girl Whose Skin Peels Off | BORN DIFFERENT
dBX9QmRhHoY.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A 21-YEAR-OLD girl was born with Lamellar Ichthyosis - a rare genetic condition that causes the skin to crack in dry weather and peel off. Nisha Lobo currently lives with her adoptive parents in Bengaluru, India, and refuses to let her condition impact her life. Nisha told Truly: “I don’t want people to treat me differently. When I go out, most people stare and are scared initially. I don’t want it to affect how they treat me or how they look at me.” Nisha has to ensure her skin is treated and properly maintained. “My skin doesn’t hurt, but I have to take certain measures, even in certain weather conditions I have to make sure to stay hydrated.” Nisha is currently studying and does not let her skin condition take over her life. “My life is good. Right now with studying and with COVID I’ve been at home, but my life is good. My family have been very supportive, they’ve always helped whatever way they can." 

Videographer: Haziq Qadri
Producers: Dav Rich and Kim Nguyen
Editor: Alex Lubetkin

-TiS1rgawt8.title: My Burns Stop Me Finding Love - Will My Blind Date Care? | DATING DIFFERENT
-TiS1rgawt8.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

MARIUS WOOWARD is a 22-year-old singleton currently living in Las Vegas. Originally from Romania, at the age of just eight years old, Marius was involved in a tragic accident. His father threw a gas can onto his mum in a heated argument causing a house fire that took both of his parents’ lives. Marius suffered third and fourth-degree burns, causing 75% of his body to be covered in burns. Since the accident, Marius has been in six relationships, but is yet to find the ‘one’. Marius told Truly: “Because of my burns, I found that it’s a little harder to date. y0xQqgmVlss.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

ATHOLL MILLS is a 27-year-old singleton born with Cystic Hygroma - a condition where cysts form on lymph nodes. Currently living in the Scottish borders, Atholl finds dating extremely difficult. Atholl told Truly: “Being gay with a visible difference is very tough. I have that mentality where I think I’m going to be forever alone, and I told myself I would be single for the rest of my life.” For the longest time, Atholl hasn’t really dated and has found it hard to know who and what he is exactly after. Atholl has many pre-notions about how people will react to his visible difference, which has put him off dating for a long time. But today, Atholl has a brand new outlook on life and is ready to go on his first ever blind date. “I’m feeling slightly nervous! Anxiety is through the roof, but I am totally done with thinking that I will be single for the rest of my life. I think it is about time that I actually explored the dating world.” Will Atholl meet the guy of his dreams?

ARttBL3oQ7A.title: Injecting Synthol Gave Me 28 Inch Biceps | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
ARttBL3oQ7A.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

TONY Geraldo, 52, from Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, has gigantic 28" biceps - earning him the nickname ‘Hulk’. But Tony’s extraordinary arms do not come from hitting the gym, but from synthol, a type of oil injected into the muscle to enlarge their volume. While Tony believes the weight of his supersized muscles have contributed to his back problems, he still loves his look - but his wife Marimilia is not a fan. In this episode, Tony goes to see a doctor to hear what the long-term risks his synthol use could have, and his wife tells him how she really feels about his Hulk look.

Follow Tony here: https://www.instagram.com/tonyhulkgeraldo/

TEuVRRrJOyM.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

JADE Stanley and her husband Elliott are proud parents to four children - and they've been running a successful sex doll business for the last few years. Jade says her children - three boys aged 17, 15, and 8, and a 4-year-old daughter - know about the family business and just see it as something mom and dad do. Jade told Truly that “they are very aware there is a stigma attached to what they do but that’s from people who are small minded and it’s just a business." Eldest son, Harry, has recently expressed an interest in joining the family business and wants a career in social media and marketing. As the business goes under a revamp, now is the perfect opportunity to get Harry involved. Today, the couple have a photoshoot with a collection of their dolls and Harry will be on set for the first time assisting his parents.

GGIRDanuUYc.title: I'm Not Ashamed Of My Tumours | TRULY
GGIRDanuUYc.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

TAN Tjaen Eng, 59, from Indonesia has been living with tumours on his body since they began to develop when he was 5 years old. Tan fell over and hit his face playing football, and what started as a small lump close to his eye, was just the beginning of his condition that has stayed with him for life. At the time, doctors suggested immediate surgery, but fearful of anything further happening, Tan’s parents decided against it. Gradually over the years the tumours have spread, and now cover the majority of his body. Tan lives in the same village he grew up in, and although he has had to face fear and prejudice from other villagers who are afraid of his condition, he has tried to live as normal a life as possible. Tan’s younger brother Salim told Truly: “I am proud of my brother, other people are ashamed of him but he is not inferior, he is normal." The love shown by Salim and other family members has been a huge support for Tan, and has helped him remain positive over the years. 

Videographer: Jefri Tarigan
Producers: Joel Ross and Ruby Coote
Editor: Ethan Edwards

bTKPOPDqcns.title: I've Spent $700K On My Kim K Surgeries | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
bTKPOPDqcns.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

JENNIFER Pamplona has ‘designed’ her own ‘Kardashian-style’ body. The 28-year-old, originally from Brazil, has spent over €600,000 on more than 20 cosmetic procedures to create her dream body. Jennifer got her first surgery at the age of 17 when she underwent a breast augmentation and has since had three nose jobs, other breast augmentations, liposuction and even underwent nine surgeries in 24 hours. Jennifer has endured some bad experiences with some of her surgeries, including being in pain as a result and would not want other girls to get surgery as young as she did. While she has some regrets, Jennifer loves her look. Jennifer wanted to look like Kim Kardashian because she thinks she is beautiful but now feels she can be a bigger star. Jennifer told Truly: “It’s my turn right now. Keeping Up With The Kardashians is over, it’s done, so they did very well. So this is my time right now.”

Kartier told Truly: “It's really hard to date with a disability. I find that a lot of people just don't see me as a sexual being, which I don't see where that stems from. I tend to go with someone who's quite confident, quite bold and I love someone who has tattoos.” Will Kartier meet the girl of her dreams?

localized.title: I Can Be Sexy In A Wheelchair - Will My Blind Date Agree? | DATING DIFFERENT
localized.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

KARTIER ROSE is a 24-year-old singleton born with Spinal Muscular Atrophy (SMA). Currently living in Leeds, UK, Kartier has been single for the past six years and has found dating hard. Kartier told Truly: “It's really hard to date with a disability. I find that a lot of people just don't see me as a sexual being, which I don't see where that stems from. I feel like I've been on all the dating apps, none of them have been successful. I think the fact that I'm gay as well makes the dating pool a lot smaller.” Kartier is nervous and excited to find out who her blind date is and hopes they have a lot in common. “If we have the same sort of hobbies and interests that would be really cool. I tend to go with someone who's quite confident, quite bold and I love someone who has tattoos.” Will Kartier meet the girl of her dreams?

Im2UMXVX1hQ.title: I Identify As Korean - Now I'm Getting My Sixth Nose Job | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
Im2UMXVX1hQ.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

OLI London describes themself as ‘transracial’. The British-born social media star recently came out as non-binary and announced they ‘identify as Korean’ on social media, which caused major backlash and the influencer has faced accusations of racism and cultural appropriation. Oli’s interest in Korean culture and K-pop star Jimin, of BTS, started when they lived in South Korea in 2013. Since then, Oli, 31, has undergone over 18 procedures and spent over $200,000 on cosmetic procedures to look more like their boyband idol. However, after five nose jobs, Oli suffers difficulty breathing and has come to El Paso, Texas, to seek the help of Dr. Agullo aka Dr. Worldwide, to resolve these issues. Oli told Truly: “Becoming Korean, becoming this new person has really kind of given me a new lease of life. And at the end of the day, people just need to be a bit more accepting. They don't have to support it, I'm not asking people to accept the way I identify, that's fine, you can have your opinion, I always believe in freedom of speech. But this is just how I am and people need to realise that I'm actually not racist at all, I'm actually doing a lot for the Asian community and this is just generally how I feel.”

https://www.tiktok.com/@olilondon

54kBXxAmIgk.title: The 26-Year-Old Trapped In A Toddler's Body | BORN DIFFERENT
54kBXxAmIgk.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

MANPREET Singh, from India, was born in 1995 but stopped growing before he could walk and talk. He stands at just 23 inches in height, and his condition has always been a mystery to medical professionals. Doctors believe the growth defect is due to a hormone deficiency, but are unable to identify exactly what without an expensive medical investigation that the family is unable to afford. Manpreet will have the appearance and mental age of a toddler for the rest of his life, yet there are people in the village who see this as a blessing from God. Manpreet’s mother told Truly: “People in the village consider Manpreet an incarnation of God and call him 'Baba'." Manpreet is taken care of 24/7 by his parents and lives with them, along with his brother and sister. Despite his differences, he is loved unconditionally, and lives a happy life surrounded by his family. 

Videographer: Haziq Qadri
Producers: Giacomo Brunelli and Kim Nguyen
Editor: Akash Beri

yjZ1cxnFjsc.title: I'm 26, My Wife's 63 - Why Shouldn't We Have A Baby? | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
yjZ1cxnFjsc.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A COUPLE with a 37-year age gap have decided to ignore their haters and are planning on starting a family. Julia, a 26-year-old YouTuber, met 63-year-old Eileen, a political correspondent, through Tinder three years ago. The couple, who get mistaken for grandmother and granddaughter, say they have been in love ever since their first date. Two years ago they decided to prove their love and commitment to one another by getting married. Now, despite the torrents of judgement they already face, the couple are ready to take the next step in their lives and start a family.

MINdVJBtgzQ.title: My 8.5M Fans Mistake Me For Scarlett Johansson | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
MINdVJBtgzQ.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

MODEL and social media sensation Kate Shumskaya bears a startling resemblance to Hollywood actress Scarlett Johansson. Based in Russia, Kate’s similarity to Scarlett was first noticed by her classmates at school when she was just 12 years old. She looks so much like Scarlett, her Instagram gets flooded with well wishing messages as fans think Kate’s profile is actually the real Scarlett J’s... Kate not only looks like Scarlett, she also regularly dresses up in cosplay as Johansson’s Marvel character Black Widow, performing dances and comedy sketches on her TikTok with each upload gaining her thousands of views. Her Black Widow content has changed Kate’s life; her first video in costume went viral. Encouraged by this success she quit her job as a sales manager and is now a full time model and content creator. Kate hopes to one day meet Scarlett in person and often wonders if the Hollywood A-Lister has heard about her and the uncanny likeness they share.

e24EeJloVVo.title: We're Conjoined Twins Who Share Legs | BORN DIFFERENT
e24EeJloVVo.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

TWIN sisters Al Putri Anugrah and Al Putri Dewi Ningsih, from Indonesia, were born conjoined at the waist with a fully formed pair of arms and three legs between them. The girl's father told Truly: “The doctors told us they wouldn’t survive long with their condition, but they are still here and healthy." At birth, doctors told the girl's parents they couldn’t be separated, as they shared a stomach and vital organs so they didn’t want to take the risk. They have had some surgery over the years to improve aspects of their health. The biggest breakthrough was having their extra leg removed, which was badly deformed, and has subsequently enabled them to become much more mobile. The girls practice walking 15 minutes every day; as their legs move by two different bodies it has taken time to synchronise their movement but they are improving every day. The girls have faced many obstacles in their young life and sadly lost their mother last year to illness. Despite this, they remain positive about their future, attend school and have a loving, supportive group of friends. 

Videographer: Jefri Tarigan
Producers: Joel Ross and Kim Nguyen
Editor: Tom Waddington

Crowdfunding for the twins:
https://kitabisa.com/campaign/borndifferentputridewi

dhEAv43Gf6o.title: My Date Doesn't Know I Have No Arms & One Leg | DATING DIFFERENT
dhEAv43Gf6o.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

TREDANTE BIAS aka ‘TreNuBB’, was born with no arms and only one leg. Currently living in Houston, Texas, 28-year-old Tre has been single for the past three years and is very popular on social media. Today, Tre will be going on his first ever blind date and wonders if his date will recognise him. Tre told Truly: “I'm an entertainer! I travel and I do motivational speaking. I have fans all the time coming, “Hey, we're sending love from Italy,” or “Hey, we're sending love from Australia". So, it’s a possibility my blind date might know who I am because I've been doing this for so long and I've been viral on multiple different platforms.” But will Tre meet the girl of his dreams and ultimately find someone who can appreciate and handle his work, lifestyle and fame?

So, it’s a possibility my blind date might know who I am because I've been doing this for so long and I've been viral on multiple different platforms.” But will Tre meet the girl of his dreams and ultimately find someone who can appreciate and handle his work, lifestyle and fame?

Zm5ITLhAPoM.title: I'm Accused Of Catfishing Cos I Have No Teeth | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
Zm5ITLhAPoM.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A WOMAN who lost her teeth at the age of 30, is normalising having dentures through TikTok. Alicia from New York first started noticing problems with her teeth at age 21. After four pregnancies she had lost all her teeth by age 30. She now proudly wears dentures and is using TikTok to normalise losing your teeth at a young age. She told Truly: “I began TikTok about a year ago. I started doing this to help myself heal and to see how far I could get with my own self-acceptance - and it turned into something much larger than I ever thought possible.” Alicia went viral on her TikTok, and now has over 2 million subscribers on her channel. Despite receiving some negative comments on her videos, Alicia refuses to let it affect her. She said: “Someone’s opinion on you, and their comments about you says more about them than you." 

Follow Alicia here:
https://www.tiktok.com/@princxssglitterhead?lang=en

Videographer: Neal Ten Eyck
Producers: Shannon Lane, Ruby Coote
Editor: Shiona Penrake

SJ0Ycz-hVss.title: I Lost 130lbs In 11 Months | BRAND NEW ME
SJ0Ycz-hVss.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

BRIANNA, from New York, has credited becoming a mother and the Covid-19 pandemic for helping her to lose 130lbs and become the best version of herself. Brianna has spent the last year getting fit and healthy after having a “lightbulb moment” after the birth of her daughter in late 2019. Brianna, who at her heaviest weighed 281lbs, has lost 130lbs in a year where the world shut down due to the Coronavirus. Brianna told Truly: “The pandemic helped me reset because I had more time to reflect and make changes.”

Follow Brianna here: www.instagram.com/beginwithbri

dUE3GzyQUjg.title: My Boyfriend Gave Birth To Our Baby | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
dUE3GzyQUjg.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A TRANSGENDER couple who have just welcomed their first biological child into the world have been defending their choice to become parents against online haters. Rodrigo and Ellen first spoke online, and after meeting in person, instantly fell in love. They were open and honest with each other about their pasts; Ellen was born biologically male and Rodrigo was born biologically female. Rodrigo told Truly: "When she told me that she was a trans woman, it was something really natural. I was already in love with the person she was, so for me that wasn't a problem." As the couple's feelings and relationship developed, they both realised they wanted children and after six months of trying, Rodrigo became pregnant. With both of their dreams becoming true, the couple took their news online and opened up about becoming parents. However, they suffered huge backlash: "The comments are something that makes us very sad because we are a couple who aren't doing anything wrong. We just decided to have our baby and we are being criticised for that." Today is a big day for Rodrigo and Ellen as they are taking their daughter to her very first photoshoot as a family.

Follow their story here:
https://www.instagram.com/gestacaotrans/

Videographer: Bruno Mazzoco
Producers: Adam Fleet & Kim Nguyen
Editor: Pete Ansell
Fixer: Marilia Marasciulo

Ymuc-jx37Hk.title: My Plus-Size Body Earns Me $120K A Year | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
Ymuc-jx37Hk.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A WOMAN weighing over 300lbs has pledged that she will keep growing her body regardless of what others might say. Olivia Jaide, 29, from Las Vegas, struggled to feel happy with her weight as a teenager as she tried every diet possible and failed. When Olivia started working in the adult entertainment industry, she quickly amassed a large following of fans who were obsessed with her curves. The fat fetish model, who earns up to $120,000 a year, has learned to love her body and is on a mission to gain more weight to keep her fans happy. To achieve her goal, she indulges herself with high-calorie meals, spending over $4,000 on food every month. Olivia, who likes to flaunt her curves on social media, says she doesn't care about others' opinions even though she often receives judgement for her lifestyle and her plus-size body. 

Videographer: Michael Sweeney
Producers: Emilia Jiang, Ruby Coote
Editor: Tom Buckman

5t4J3Gyi2ik.title: The Teen With The Giant Hands | BORN DIFFERENT
5t4J3Gyi2ik.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

KALEEM, 13, from Jharkhand, India was born with an undiagnosed condition which has affected the growth of his hands. His hands have grown rapidly throughout his childhood, and now each hand weighs around 2.5kg. During his younger years, Kaleem was bullied for his appearance: “People would always ask questions and judge him. They call him the son of the devil and run away from him in fear,” his mother Halima said. Despite these challenging times, Kaleem takes it all in his stride and doesn’t let it affect his everyday teenage life. 

Follow Kaleem here - 
https://www.instagram.com/mohhamad_asif_razwi/

hrBJDEuN8_s.title: My Blind Date Doesn't Know I'm An Amputee | DATING DIFFERENT
hrBJDEuN8_s.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

DANIEL GALLAGHER is a 31-year-old singleton living in Manchester, UK. In 2012, Daniel was involved in a life changing accident. He told Truly: “I had my legs amputated, a stoma fitted, mesh put into my heart, I've got a partially broken spinal cord and I was in a coma for 17 days." Daniel has been single for six years and is looking for someone who can look past his wheelchair and accept him for who he is. “The gay community can be very shallow just because I'm in a wheelchair and I actually had one guy tell me that he would date me but I'm not like aesthetically pleasing because of the wheelchair...” Today, Daniel is excited to go on his first ever blind date and hopes to meet the man of his dreams. 

Follow Daniel Gallagher: https://www.instagram.com/justdanpb/
Follow James Hall: https://www.instagram.com/tipsy_jesus/

DANIEL GALLAGHER is a 31-year-old singleton living in Manchester, UK. In 2012, Daniel was involved in a life changing accident. He told Truly: “I had my legs amputated, a stoma fitted, mesh put into my heart, I've got a partially broken spinal cord and I was in a coma for 17 days." Daniel has been single for six years and is looking for someone who can look past his wheelchair and accept him for who he is. “The gay community can be very shallow just because I'm in a wheelchair and I actually had one guy tell me that he would date me but I'm not like aesthetically pleasing because of the wheelchair...” Today, Daniel is excited to go on his first ever blind date and hopes to meet the man of his dreams.

FNdh_RtKpX8.title: I'm A 16-Year-Old Mum Of Two | MY EXTRAORDINARY FAMILY
FNdh_RtKpX8.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

16-YEAR-OLD mum of two Ava King from Marion, Indiana first fell pregnant at the young age of 13. The teenager decided to keep her baby, and in February of 2020 her son Jordan was born. In August that same year, Ava fell pregnant for a second time, she told Truly: “The second pregnancy was the most traumatic experience of my life. I just sat and cried, I could cope with one child, but the thought of having another one was devastating.” In May of 2021, Ava gave birth to her second child, daughter Aveaya at the age of 15. Being a young mum of two can be challenging, Ava explained: “Regular girls my age, they’ll babysit and they can give the kids back to their mums at the end of the day. Well I can’t do that, I have these kids 24/7, and it’s really hard to adapt to that.” Additionally, Ava deals with a lot of judgement towards being a teen mum, often receiving negative comments on her social media platforms where she talks about her life. Ava said: “I get a lot of people say that I’m too young to be a good mum. My kids changed my life in the aspects of maturity, love and patience. I don’t worry too much about people questioning my parenting skills.” 

Follow Ava: https://www.instagram.com/iamavaking/
Photographer: https://www.instagram.com/maciemaevisuals/

Videographer: Macie McCarthy
Producers: Stephanie Stijkel, Yasmin Walker
Editor: Akash Beri

Gqtamaky0qE.title: I Love To Show My Plus-Size Body | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
Gqtamaky0qE.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

JASMINE Jones, from Texas, has battled with her self esteem and confidence since she was a young girl - but she's now taken to TikTok to show the world that she loves her plus size body and self love is her superpower. Jasmine has incredible strength and has learned to love herself, but this wasn't always the case for her. Jasmine told Truly: "I grew up hating my body, I didn't wear shorts until I was probably 18. I'd go to the pool and have shorts and a shirt on, I didn't like my body for a very long time." However, Jasmine made the decision to not hide away any longer and began to learn how to love herself. Now she proclaims that self love is her superpower and has taken to TikTok to show the world. She said: "I make these TikTok videos for both myself and others, just to let them know they can be plus size and still love yourself and your body." Today, Jasmine's journey is taking another huge step forward as she is taking part in her first poolside photoshoot. She feels ready, but how will she feel in front of the camera? 

Follow Jasmine Here:
www.instagram.com/jazzynichole19/
www.tiktok.com/@jasminejones654

Videographer: Trent Wittenbach
Producers: Adam Fleet, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Ethan Edwards

Yt40NHaOyJU.title: I Went From Pastor To Adult Model | BRAND NEW ME
Yt40NHaOyJU.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

UNDER the alias Nadia Hilton, Crystal DiGregorio was a successful porn star with a luxury lifestyle when she gave it all up to marry a pastor - and become a pastor herself. After her marriage broke down, Crystal tried attending other churches but experienced massive judgment and so stepped away from organised religion altogether. Crystal found love again with her current husband Andrew and the pair now have a four-month old daughter. Taking stock of her life, felt that she had swung from one extreme to the other - and so was determined to find a happy medium. With her fans still calling for new content, in April 2021 she launched an OnlyFans - with her husband running her fanpage. Crystal says that she is still very definitely a believer in God and will never go back to porn, but that OnlyFans allows her to be in control and take charge of her sexuality in a way she never could in her porn days.

Videographer: Colin Bell
Producers: Tom Midlane, Yasmin Walker
Editor: Shiona Penrake

yaoU0mk0YDg.title: My BF Has No Legs - But I'm Not Using Him For 'Fame' | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
yaoU0mk0YDg.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A YOUNG couple are standing up to online trolls who judge their interabled relationship. Menecis, 23, met Brody, 22, when they were in kindergarten, but it wasn’t until senior year of high school that the pair became a couple. Since then, the couple have been fully committed to each other. However, despite the loving relationship, they have faced judgement due to Brody being a congenital amputee, which means he was born without legs. For the most part people have judged them online, questioning whether Menecis is using Brody for fame and there are others suggesting the idea that Menecis would be loyal is impossible. In spite of all the judgement, Brody and Menecis are continuing to post videos online of them having fun together, loving one another and defying their haters.

Music: Starboi3 - Dick (Audio) ft. Doja Cat

Menecis & Brody’s TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@menecisss_?lang=en
Menecis Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/menecisss_cx/?hl=en
Brody Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/brodyusa4/?hl=en

Videographer: Michael Darling
Producers: James Thorne, Frazer Randalls

vrr5PLHqRZc.title: The Man With No Face | BORN DIFFERENT
vrr5PLHqRZc.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

PURWANTO, 45, from Nganjuk, Indonesia, has tumours that cover the entirety of his face. His first tumour became visible when he was 12 years old, beginning as a small lump behind his right ear and rapidly spreading until it eclipsed all his facial features. Purwanto, who works as a farmer, has to use a headband in order to see and his tumours make eating a challenge. But despite his condition, in his village he is well-liked and respected. Purwanto did have his tumours operated on in the past, but they grew back even worse - and now he says he does not want any further surgery as his mother forbade it. 

Videographer: Jefri Tarigan
Producers: Tom Midlane, James Thorne
Editor: Tom Waddington

YSP8gOXMajM.title: I'm A "Hot Piece Of Disabled Booty" - Will My Date Agree? | DATING DIFFERENT
YSP8gOXMajM.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

ALEX DACY is a 27-year-old singleton born with Spinal Muscular Atrophy (SMA) - a progressive, genetic disease that causes muscle wasting and mobility problems. Currently living in Fort Lauderdale, Florida, Alex, a disability advocate who looks to break barriers and stereotypes, is new to the dating scene and hasn’t been in many serious relationships. Alex told Truly: “I’m very independent. I’m a workaholic and I like to go out and have fun but I’m never really in a serious relationship.” Today, Alex will be going on her first blind date and she doesn’t have many expectations. “My ideal date would be a guy that is fun, and he's going to ride on the back of my wheelchair as I'll be driving to the sunset.” Will Alex finally meet the guy of her dreams?

uiAxWhnNnXM.title: The Real Life Rapunzel With 6ft Long Hair | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
uiAxWhnNnXM.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

‘REAL Life Rapunzel’ Alena Kravchenko hasn’t cut her hair in over 30 years - and has zero plans to start! Based in Odessa, Ukraine, Alena’s hair is a staggering 6ft long and the last time she had a haircut she was just five years old. Taking inspiration from her mother and grandmother who were also long hair enthusiasts, Alena is now famous in her home country and worldwide. Unsurprisingly, her long locks mean that Alena gets a lot of attention and she’s developed a huge following on her Instagram page receiving thousands of likes on her posts. She has also received messages from strangers who are so enchanted with her hair that they have proposed marriage. If it’s untied, Alena's hair now sweeps the ground when she walks so she sometimes wears her hair in a braid or a bun to stop it dragging along the floor and to allow her to drive. Although she doesn’t cut or trim her hair Alena regularly visits her stylist who she has formed a strong connection with and together they experiment with different styles and looks.

Zg66ELSoWng.title: I'm Accused Of Faking My Tourettes | BORN DIFFERENT
Zg66ELSoWng.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A TEENAGER suffers from Tourettes so badly that she has been accused of faking it. Nicole, 14 was diagnosed with Tourettes aged 13 after her mum, Jodie noticed her face and hand tics had developed seemingly overnight. Her vocal tics developed quickly too, and consist of swearing, screaming and whistling, as well as physical arm movements. In moments of extreme emotions, Nicole can sometimes be violent towards herself, scratching and hitting her head. She explained to Truly: “There are moments where you can be really scared, because you don’t know what’s going to happen, or when it’s going to happen.” Nicole also has FND (Functional Neurological Disorder) which means her arms and feet can sometimes lock if her tics get too overwhelming. Despite her diagnosis, a lot of people have accused Nicole of making up her tics for attention, including close family members, and online commenters.

https://www.instagram.com/x_.nicole4._x/

90EKpq3qt4w.title: I Suffered 65% Burns When I Was 1 | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
90EKpq3qt4w.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A WOMAN who suffered 65% burns in a childhood accident has taken to Instagram to show she's proud of her scars. Marina Bogdanova, from Massachusetts, was caught in a house fire a month before her 2nd birthday, leaving her with 65% burns across her body. Marina suffered incredibly severe injuries but is proud of her scars as they tell her story and made her the person she is today. On the day of the fire, Marina's Mom, Olga, came back to their house after visiting the shops and found their home engulfed in flames. Marina told Truly: "I was rushed to the hospital and spent two months in a coma. My Mom was told, 'She's still alive but we don't know if she'll survive until the morning". Marina has a truly remarkable outlook on life and wears her scars with pride, they tell her story and she has now taken to instagram to share her journey. She said: "Not everybody is comfortable with scars, and not everybody is comfortable with somebody different. I'm proud of them, it's a part of me, I don't feel I should hide it". 

Follow Marina:
https://www.instagram.com/marina_bogdanova11.19/
https://vm.tiktok.com/ZMdTCST5m/

Videographer: Colin Bell
Producers: Adam Fleet, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Sarah-Jayne Galpin

Jc9NHfzdPiw.title: My GF Is Old Enough To Be My Grandmother | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
Jc9NHfzdPiw.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A COUPLE whose love started through TikTok, have hit back at trolls who have attacked them for their 37 year age gap. 24-year-old Quran first met Cheryl, 61, when he worked with one of her family members and they instantly had a connection. Their friendship developed and deepened through a mutual interest...TikTok. Quran started to develop feelings for Cheryl and felt like he had to go for it! He told Truly: "I asked her out and I caught feelings first, we decided to make it into a relationship because we were both happy". Then to their delight, their TikTok videos absolutely blew up so much that they even had celebrities reposting and commenting on their content. However, despite the couple growing from strength to strength, not everyone was accepting of their new found love, with them receiving hate comments every day. Quran said: "They call her a zombie, the walking dead, how can you date your Grandma?" As well as these awful comments, people kept questioning whether their relationship was actually genuine. The couple added: "You will never find happiness if you spew hate, we're happy and you can't stop us!"
