O8tG-RNE7bk.title: I've Spent $30k Becoming A Vampire Barbie | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
O8tG-RNE7bk.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

MARILYN, a tattoo artist from Germany, has spent €30,000 on plastic surgery and tattoos in her quest to be the ‘ultimate vampire Barbie doll’. At only 12 years old, Marilyn started getting into goth clothing and makeup, and soon took inspiration from her favourite vampire dolls. She told Truly: “When I was young, I always wanted to look like a vampire or demon. The inspiration for my first plastic surgery was to look like a doll.” She loved that vampire look so much, she paid for real fangs to be fitted, and admitted she “can’t imagine smiling without them.” In her pursuit of the ‘vampire doll’ image, Marilyn underwent a breast augmentation, liposuction, facelifts and facial injections. Despite all of these procedures, the tattoo artist told Truly she’s absolutely not finished yet, adding: “I wanted to look more fake and more plastic, but the doctors made it more natural. Dolls always look perfect, they stay beautiful forever.” Marilyn is set on her next procedure being the Fox Eye Lift, which means putting dissolvable wires underneath the skin around the eye... But will she want to continue when she knows the risks involved? 

Follow Marilyn here:
https://www.instagram.com/mizz.intra/

Videographer: Chris Piotrowicz
Producer: Cecily Snowball, Charles Richards
Editor: Omar Gobere

EKT1ex5NDaQ.title: I've Lost Half My Body Weight In A Year | BRAND NEW ME
EKT1ex5NDaQ.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

23-YEAR-OLD Dana Nicole Oswald from Ontario, Canada has lost half of her body weight within a year - losing an incredible 125lbs. Dana says she’s always struggled with her size, but it was during university that Dana gained most of the excess weight. She told Truly: “Food was an addiction to me back then, I was eating 3,500 to 4,000 calories a day.” Dana’s food habits were starting to have an impact on her body, weighing in at 265lbs at her heaviest, she often felt tired and struggled with stomach issues. But it wasn’t until a doctor told her that the excess weight was causing Dana to have high blood pressure, that she realised something had to change. Completely reconstructing her eating and exercise habits, she soon started shedding the extra pounds. Dana shared her journey online, posting updates and tips on her instagram page: “When I started with my weight loss journey on social media, I was posting to share with my friends, but then it became a really good way to help out others.” When asked how the transformation affected her life, Dana wants to make clear that it’s not just about the physical changes she’s undergone: “The greatest part about the transformation is all mental, my mindset is so different, I’m so much more positive, less anxious and much happier.” 

Follow Dana - https://www.instagram.com/p/CJrNWOIg1KM/

Video Credits:
Videographer / director: Marc-Andre Lavoie
Producer: Stephanie Stijkel, Ruby Coote
Editor: Pete Ansell

8W0b3S2UPTM.title: From Goth To Preppy - What Will My Mum Think? | TRANSFORMED
8W0b3S2UPTM.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

DESCRIBING her look as a mix of emo and goth, Bianca is not a fan of wearing pastel - or any colour for that matter. The 24-year-old got her first tattoo when she was 16 and now has tattoos across her arms, legs, chest and face. She started stretching her ear lobes when she was 12 years old and they are currently three and 3/4 inches wide. Bianca has so many piercings she's lost count and admits that when she first started dressing in all black her mom would try and persuade her to wear other colours. For one day only Bianca will transform from emo to preppy - and there's a lot of pastel. 

Social:
https://www.instagram.com/p/CJy6s65hKIT/ 

Videographer: Sean Grasso

ltjex-1fMLU.title: I Shot Myself In The Face | BRAND NEW ME
ltjex-1fMLU.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

18-YEAR-OLD Carson Molle attempted to take his own life when he was 14 years old by shooting himself in the face. He struggled with his mental health after difficulties at school, arguing with his parents and breaking his arm playing hockey: an incident that destroyed his sense of self-worth. Fortunately, Carson was immediately found and doctors saved his life. Today he is living life to the fullest with a passion for fitness and a return to his beloved football field. He's sharing his story with his friends and the world to show how important it is to talk about teenage mental health, and to prove that after an accident you can regain the narrative of your life and shape your own future.

Follow Carson Here:
https://www.tiktok.com/@cmolle35?
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPtpv-y41WhxcTBi895ZuKg

Video Credits:

Producer: Miles Overton, Charles Richards

d5gcPeQvXB8.title: I Built The Ultimate Mario Kart Simulator | TOTALLY GAME
d5gcPeQvXB8.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

MARIO Kart Live: Home Circuit brought Mario Kart into the age of augmented reality, but now one engineer has taken things a step further. David Wiernicki, of Trumansburg, NY, owns Force Dynamics, a company that makes high-end motion simulators. Now, the father and business owner has created a way to hook up Home Circuit to his impressive simulators, which are often used to train race drivers, resulting in the ultimate Mario Kart experience. David told Barcroft Studios: “This is the best possible version of Mario Kart. Gaming is something that transports you somewhere else, that makes you believe you're doing something else you couldn't be doing otherwise.” Find out more about Force Dynamics on their website: force-dynamics.com

localized.description:

MARIO Kart Live: Home Circuit brought Mario Kart into the age of augmented reality, but now one engineer has taken things a step further. David Wiernicki, of Trumansburg, NY, owns Force Dynamics, a company that makes high-end motion simulators. Now, the father and business owner has created a way to hook up Home Circuit to his impressive simulators, which are often used to train race drivers, resulting in the ultimate Mario Kart experience. David told Barcroft Studios: “This is the best possible version of Mario Kart. Gaming is something that transports you somewhere else, that makes you believe you're doing something else you couldn't be doing otherwise.” Find out more about Force Dynamics on their website: force-dynamics.com

jkOiFyTKP7w.title: I'm 6ft 9, My Husband's 5ft 4 - Now We've Had A Baby | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
jkOiFyTKP7w.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A MARRIED couple from Brazil with a 1ft 5" (43cm) height difference have to constantly deal with judgement from members of the public who stare. Elisane is 6ft 9" (2.07 metres) and her husband Francinaldo is 5ft 4" (1.65 metres), but the couple don't see the unusual height difference as an issue and have been happily together for over eight years and married for six. Three years ago their first son Angelo was born, and the couple were over the moon to have started a family. But it hadn't been an easy journey, as Elisane had lost her first pregnancy - and it was particularly difficult when they were told they were expecting twins. Elisane told Truly: "It still hurts, it was my dream to be a mother and for the doctor to tell me that I lost two, that they were twins, I was in despair."

For more Elisane, follow:

AN aspiring model with lymphedema will not let her swollen leg stop her from feeling beautiful. Mahogany, 23, from Tennessee, suffers from a long-term condition where excess fluid collects in tissues causing swelling in the limbs. One of Mahogany’s legs is incredibly swollen and there’s no cure to reduce its size, so she’s had to get used to living with one giant leg.

ZxSouRiIa-4.title: Shamed for Being 'Fat' - But Look At Me Now | BRAND NEW ME
ZxSouRiIa-4.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

ANYONE who has doubted Hayley Westoby has only empowered and motivated her. The 29-year-old from Sydney was determined to prove the people who said she could not lose weight wrong. At her heaviest, Hayley weighed 302lbs after the weight piled on due to lack of exercise and eating whatever she wanted. However, over the course of three years, Hayley dropped 143lbs as well as those who doubted her. She now loves the life she leads and is surrounded by supportive people. Hayley told Truly: “When someone tells me that I can't do something, I literally sit there and I'm like, 'watch me'.”

Follow Hayley - https://www.instagram.com/hayleywestoby/ 

Video Credits:

yr63UTaGCWQ.title: Kawaii Princess To Beach Babe - Will My Husband Recognise Me? | TRANSFORMED
yr63UTaGCWQ.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AN Australian woman with an extreme pink Kawaii style has been transformed into a typical beach babe to shock her husband. Sarah Guerra, from Adelaide, 34, is obsessed with Kawaii style, a look which started in Japan and is known for being charmingly cute. Her house is fully decorated with pastel colours, stuffed toys and her J-fashion clothes. A whole room is taken up by her wardrobe, which includes a wall of over 100 pairs of shoes. She has been married for four years, and her husband Riccardo has never seen her wear anything other than pink. In this video, Sarah is transformed into a style she would usually steer clear of - an Aussie beach babe look, the typical uniform of girls where she lives.

yv5hOWoAGCE.title: 'Daddy' Ken Doll Spends $500k On Plastic Surgery | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
yv5hOWoAGCE.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

JOHN OLAVARRIA, known as ‘Ken Daddy’, has spent $500,000 on plastic surgery - having over 25 cosmetic procedures to achieve his perfect look. At five years old, John knew that someday he wanted to get plastic surgery with his first being a nose job. John told Truly: “I knew early on that I wanted this as a procedure and my family were super supportive. I’m very fortunate to come from a very open and supporting family structure." John has always been around a strong community of people who are interested in plastic surgery, which has helped guide his direction on what surgery he should get next. And he remains proud of what he has had done. One procedure John has always wanted to get is ‘Coolsculpting’ which can cost anything from $800 to $1,000 per section. This procedure will freeze the flanks; in other words, his love handles, and can dramatically make the skin look younger. But will John be happy with the results?

Follow John here: 
https://www.instagram.com/xoxojohno/

Follow Dr. Kahen here: 
https://www.instagram.com/beverlyhillsmedspa

Videographer: Colin Weatherby

1Nq01ZHtQxs.title: I Lost 210lbs After My Doctor Told Me I Was Dying | BRAND NEW ME
1Nq01ZHtQxs.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

40-YEAR-OLD Miami based Jeancarlo Danies lost an incredible 210lbs after his doctor told him he was dying. Always on the heavier side, JC told Truly: “I have always known that food was an addiction, I was never able to maintain a normal eating habit, eating over 6,000 calories a day.” After the birth of his son in 2014, JC says his weight really skyrocketed and he ended up weighing in at 431bs at the age of just 38 years old. It wasn’t until a cardiologist told JC he would die of heart failure within two years, if he did not lose the weight, that it really dawned on him. Following a strict diet and workout regime, Jeancarlo lost 210lbs in 19 months and has since started competing in bodybuilding competitions. However, the drastic weight loss has left JC with excess skin around his abdomen. Which is why the aspiring bodybuilder is now having a tummy tuck surgery performed by local surgeon; Dr. Daniel Careaga. “In reality the excess skin doesn’t bother me, the reason I want to have it removed is because I want to pursue a career in bodybuilding, the abs, that’s what everybody wants to see,” JC said. 

Follow Jeancarlo here -
Insta: https://www.instagram.com/fatfreefoundation/
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/FATFREEwithJC/featured 

Videographer / director: Carlos De Verona 
Producer: Stephanie Stijkel, Kim Nguyen    
Editor: Tani McDowell

uO-stmuiqX4.title: This Gamer Will Destroy You - With His Feet | TOTALLY GAME
uO-stmuiqX4.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

PLAYING Overwatch well takes some practice, and one gamer has not only mastered the game but done so using his feet. Tucker Griggs, of Tulare, CA, was born without muscles in his arms due to a condition called Arthrogryposis Multiplex Congenita. But the 23-year-old has learned to use his feet to destroy competitors in Overwatch, in which he’s managed to reach Masters rank, putting him roughly in the top 5% of players in the world. Tucker, who streams on his Twitch channel ‘FragsByTheFoot’, told Barcroft Studios: “I use my feet for everything I do, whether it's cooking, cleaning or playing video games.” Find Tucker streaming at twitch.tv/fragsbythefoot 

Videographer: Elie Khadra
Producer: Joe Roberts, Charles Richards
Editors: Ciera Cecil

localized.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

PLAYING Overwatch well takes some practice, and one gamer has not only mastered the game but done so using his feet. Tucker Griggs, of Tulare, CA, was born without muscles in his arms due to a condition called Arthrogryposis Multiplex Congenita. But the 23-year-old has learned to use his feet to destroy competitors in Overwatch, in which he’s managed to reach Masters rank, putting him roughly in the top 5% of players in the world. Tucker, who streams on his Twitch channel ‘FragsByTheFoot’, told Barcroft Studios: “I use my feet for everything I do, whether it's cooking, cleaning or playing video games.” Find Tucker streaming at twitch.tv/fragsbythefoot 

Videographer: Elie Khadra
Producer: Joe Roberts, Charles Richards
Editors: Ciera Cecil

ZuHUBbT2P2w.title: I've Never Had Arms - And Never Needed Them | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
ZuHUBbT2P2w.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

BORN without arms, also known as bilateral aplasia of the upper limbs, Inga has got used to simply doing everything with her feet. Although she had prosthetic arms fitted when she was younger, Inga rarely uses them because they were only cosmetic with no practical use. The student and aspiring model uses a special chair in the kitchen that raises her level with the countertops. Inga has a driver’s licence and other than moving her seat forward, drives a regular car. The one area which can be more of a challenge is clothes shopping - Inga either has to order online or go with her boyfriend Joe. But all in all, Inga hasn’t ever had arms and she says she’s never really needed them. 

Follow Inga here:
https://www.instagram.com/ingadanielle/

Video Credits:
Videographer / director: Michael Catron
Producer: Nathalie Bonney, Ruby Coote

TWl_jGN0m6I.title: The Incredible Conjoined Twins Attached At The Head | BORN DIFFERENT
TWl_jGN0m6I.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

TWIN girls Joy and Joyce Magsino are craniopagus conjoined twins from the Philippines - meaning they were born with their skulls fused together. At birth, the doctors gave the twins a 10-year life expectancy, but the now 13 year olds are thriving against the odds. Separating Joy and Joyce is a possibility, but an incredibly risky operation that would cost the family $75,000. Their mother Jhomarie has left the country to work abroad, in an attempt to be able to save enough money to afford the operation. She told Truly: "When they were younger they were so difficult to look after, unlike today, they can look after themselves - now they can shower, feed themselves and also use TikTok." The twins love to record videos for social media, and have been slowly seeing their followers increase. "We would like to be famous on social media someday so that we can save up some money for our operation," Joy said.

Follow their story here:
https://www.tiktok.com/@magsinotwins5
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxG_xB3cXUk4ueUo--kHxiQ 

Videographer: Sherbian Dacalanio 
Producers: Giacomo Brunelli, Alma Enriquez, Ruby Coote
Editor: Ian Phillips

7-j2jq2L7do.title: My Girlfriend Acts Like A Dog - And I Like It | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
7-j2jq2L7do.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

MEET the couple giving new meaning to the phrase ‘puppy love’! Jenna, 21, and her partner Lorenzo, 30, from Austin, Texas, have broken the internet with their TikTok "puppy play" videos, in which she can be seen drinking from a bowl on the floor, jumping into a river while playing fetch, and ripping up his slippers - or being walked on her leash. Jenna says she has enjoyed acting like a dog since she was a small child and loves entering the mental zone of "puppy space". She said: "I never leave the house without my collar, I feel most comfortable on my leash. Even if no-one in the world knew my name, I would do this anyway." Jenna met her current “owner” Lorenzo at a photo shoot last year and the pair have been inseparable ever since. But while Jenna’s videos have attracted an army of loyal fans, her canine ways have received some intense backlash from some quarters online, with people treating her puppy play as a sign of mental illness or telling her to "blink twice if you are being held hostage". However, the couple have no plans to change their lifestyle any time soon. As Jenna said: “I would say that Lorenzo is the best owner I could ever ask for. He cares for me, I feel like the luckiest pup at the shelter.” 

For more of Jenna's content follow:
https://www.tiktok.com/@officialpuppygirljenna
https://www.instagram.com/jennathepuppygirl

Videographer: Davin Fitch
Producer: Tom Midlane, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Cecilia Brunelli

rfYIEG5wRV0.title: 'Human Ken Doll' Gets World's First Multiple Leg Implants | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
rfYIEG5wRV0.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

JUSTIN “HUMAN KEN DOLL" JEDLICA, pioneer and innovator in the plastic surgery field has spent an impressive $985,000 on his body modifications to date. Including a recent full leg augmentation surgery, Justin has had 1,000 cosmetic procedures in total. Justin loves customising his body, trying new things that others have never done before and most importantly, proving his doubters wrong. Justin told Truly: “I look at it as a challenge that’s exciting and adventurous, every journey I’ve taken with new body modifications I’ve discovered additional confidence and knowledge as an expert and innovator in the aesthetics industry.” Justin has been modifying his body and face for over 20 years which eventually led him to open up his own small business. It was only after having worked on a client for a custom quadricep implant that Justin decided to go that step further and undertake an eight piece full leg augmentation via silicone implants - all in one surgical session. Justin had the idea for a full leg augmentation about 10 years ago and was intrigued as it seemed as though no one had done it before. "I was the first person in the world to do three piece shoulder implants, the first person in the world to do four piece back implants. I wanted to be the first person to do full leg augmentation with eight implants all at one time.” Justin chose Dr. Barry Eppley, an implant specialist, for the leg procedure because of his love for custom implants. They worked together to come up with the perfect design...

Follow their story here: 
https://www.instagram.com/justinjedlica/
https://www.eppleyplasticsurgery.com/

Videographer: Istvang Lettang, Colin Weatherby
Producers: Dav Rich, James Thorne
Editor: Sebastian Heseltine

caVuOlbzdbs.title: I'm Covered In Tattoos - Will My GF's Mom Accept Me? | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
caVuOlbzdbs.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

ETHAN Bramble 24, from Australia, is covered head to toe in tattoos - and now he's confronting his girlfriend’s 'conservative' mother about the way he looks. He has previously filmed with Truly, when he was the “world’s most modified youth”, with extreme modifications including a split tongue, tattooed eyes and removal of his belly button. Since then, he has continued his tattoo journey and has taken on more responsibility in his life. He has a baby on the way with his girlfriend Meg and they are purchasing their first home together. Despite their excitement for the next chapter in their lives, they have faced hurdles along the way. And Meg’s mother Adele first had doubts about their relationship because of the way Ethan looked..

Follow Ethan here: https://www.instagram.com/ethanmodboybramble/  

Videographer: Josh Maguire
Producer: Kate Moore, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Reuben Yarwood

pwUpFzF0ijo.title: I Lost 135lbs - Now I'm Braving A Bikini | BRAND NEW ME
pwUpFzF0ijo.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

28-YEAR-OLD hairstylist Ali Bruch from Milwaukee has lost an incredible 135lbs without stepping foot into the gym. The mother of two was previously classed as morbidly obese at 270lbs, and struggled to keep up with her kids. Battling with binge eating, Ali would consume over 6,000 to 7,000 calories at a time. She told Truly: “I was an anxious eater, whether it was happy or sad, I was binge eating and I didn’t have control over it.” The turning point came on a shopping trip with her cousin, when a rude shop assistant pointed out to Ali she wouldn’t fit a regular dress size and instead should look at the plus size section. Ali started a ketogenic diet, based on high fats and low carbs which resulted in her losing half of her bodyweight. But losing so much weight in a short period of time meant Ali was left with excess skin. Four months ago, Ali had a tummy tuck and breast augmentation, finally feeling like she’s got the body she worked so hard to achieve. “I don’t need to hide in pictures, I don’t need to hide from social events, I just feel so much more confident," she said.  

Follow Ali Here: https://www.instagram.com/alicutsmyhair/

Video Credits:
Videographer / director: Dan Peters
Producer: Stephanie Stijkel, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Sarah-Jayne Galpin

ccax-FynRHo.title: From Kawaii To Kardashian - Will My BF Like My Transformation? | TRANSFORMED
ccax-FynRHo.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

TWINS Ali and Josie are as close as twin sisters can be but that doesn’t mean the pair want to look the same, in fact the two could not look more different. While pink-obsessed Ali has worn the same colour every day since 2016, Josie prefers darker hues, wearing a lot of black and green - although she’s not so mono-colour wearing as her sister. The pair do share a love for Japanese culture and fashion: Ali favouring Kawaii style, which loosely translates to ‘cute’, and Josie describing herself as a fan of Harajuku Neon. But what happens when the frills and pastel makeup tones come off and the twins are transformed into Instagram baddies?

Videographer: Taylor Blumel 
Producer: Chloe Sweet, Nathalie Bonney,  Ruby Coote
Editor: Helen Mckee

localized.title: From Kawaii To Kardashian - Will My BF Like My Transformation? | TRANSFORMED
localized.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

TWINS Ali and Josie are as close as twin sisters can be but that doesn’t mean the pair want to look the same, in fact the two could not look more different. While pink-obsessed Ali has worn the same colour every day since 2016, Josie prefers darker hues, wearing a lot of black and green - although she’s not so mono-colour wearing as her sister. The pair do share a love for Japanese culture and fashion: Ali favouring Kawaii style, which loosely translates to ‘cute’, and Josie describing herself as a fan of Harajuku Neon. But what happens when the frills and pastel makeup tones come off and the twins are transformed into Instagram baddies?

sras7uPYfrM.title: I Lost My Legs At 18 | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
sras7uPYfrM.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

Hülya, 37, was born with congenital dysmelia in her legs and hands. Although her hands looked visibly deformed, it was her legs that caused her the biggest physical challenges growing up. By the age of six, Hülya, had undergone 21 operations. Then at the age of 18 she contracted sepsis and was told by doctors they would have to amputate her legs. As an adult, Hülya had to learn how to walk again with prosthetics as well as use a wheelchair. The mum of one says crawling is often the easiest way to get around and she also uses a low wheeled trolley. Hülya, from Stuttgart Germany, also runs a fashion boutique and together with her husband Dennis, posts striking photos of her posing without her legs on social media. She doesn’t want anyone to feel sorry for her and hopes her photos will be an inspiration instead.  

Follow Hülya here:
https://www.instagram.com/huelya_dennis/

Videographer: Robin Weiland
Producers: Nathalie Bonney, Emika Berry, Ruby Coote
Editor: Cecilia Brunelli

YwpcwDE-fnA.title: I Can't Use My Arms Or Lower Legs | BORN DIFFERENT
YwpcwDE-fnA.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A MOTHER-OF-TWO born with a rare condition is restricted to permanently walking on her knees. Sarinha, from Brazil, was born with arthrogryposis, resulting in her arms and legs being twisted - but she doesn't see her condition as a problem. Thanks to her helper, there's nothing Sarinha can't do because of her condition and she lives life like a 'normal' person. Sarinha started a TikTok page a year ago and has already gained more than 250,000 followers. Her Instagram and YouTube pages boast thousands more, as she continues to raise awareness of her condition. 

Follow Sarinha here:
https://www.instagram.com/sarinhaaraujooficial/
https://www.tiktok.com/@sarinhaaraujooficial
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCCzxgXvCDNrjci2pWfIo2eQ/

WVJMSwrx6D8.title: Disabled Model Finds Love After Prejudice Online | LOVE DON’T JUDGE
WVJMSwrx6D8.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

COUPLE Bri and Sheldon started dating in 2019 after matching on dating app Hinge. Having used a wheelchair for most of her life, Bri had found dating online difficult, with men either being unable to see past the chair - or asking deeply personal questions about her sex life. For a while Bri even hid her disability on social media, hoping that would match her with more guys - but they weren’t the right kind of guys. Now a model and comfortable with her own body, Bri started posting photos of her in her chair on dating profiles. Bri and Sheldon connected over their love of style and fashion and since the pandemic hit have got even closer, moving in together and working as a model/photographer team on some of Bri’s street-style modelling assignments.

Videographers: Marcus Cooper 
Producers: Nathalie Bonney, Kate Moore, Kim Nguyen
Editors: Tom Buckmen

qBw94l4SF1I.title: 80% Of My Skin Is Covered In Moles | BORN DIFFERENT
qBw94l4SF1I.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A 24-YEAR-OLD from Kerala, India was born with moles that cover 80% of his body. Prabhulal, who is currently doing a Masters in Commerce at Madurai Kamaraj University, is the only member of his family to have this rare condition. The moles now cover over half his face, having been growing and increasing in size with age. As a young boy, Prabhulal was shy and avoided going out because of his appearance. However, with the help of his mother, Bindhu, he came to accept who he is. Prabhulal is now proud of his difference and seeks to inspire others on social media. 

You can follow Prabhulal here: 
https://www.instagram.com/prabhulalprasannan/
https://www.facebook.com/prabhulal.panoor

Videographer: Haziq Qadri 
Producers: Frazer Randalls, James Thorne
Editor: Akash Beri

-Agq2goAlaM.title: The Girl Whose Skin Grows Too Fast | BORN DIFFERENT
-Agq2goAlaM.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A 5-YEAR-OLD born with a rare skin condition isn’t letting the disorder stop her from being a fun, playful and outgoing little girl. Harper Foy, from Seattle, Washington State, was born with a rare condition called Harlequin Ichthyosis that leaves her with thick scaly skin across her entire body. Despite her rare and incurable condition, Harper is living life her life to the fullest. She loves to sing, dance and play football with her older brother, and last year she signed a contract with TCM models which her mum hopes will help in redefining traditional beauty standards. 

Follow Harper here: https://www.instagram.com/harper.incredible/

Videographer: Spencer Johnson
Producers: Frazer Randalls, Charles Richards

f7Cp1XyuKLI.title: My Skin Condition Has No Cure | BORN DIFFERENT
f7Cp1XyuKLI.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A 23-YEAR-OLD with a rare skin condition isn’t letting her disease stop her from doing what she wants - even getting tattoos. Paloma Lira from Sao Paulo, Brazil was born with congenital lamellar ichthyosis, a condition which causes the skin to become extremely dry and scaly. The genetic disease has no cure, and Paloma has to have a strict care routine to soothe her skin - especially during the hotter months. When Paloma was a child, she was frequently bullied for her skin condition - however now as an adult she refuses to allow anything to get in her way. She has even had tattoos and frequently tries out different makeup looks. 

Follow Paloma here:
https://www.instagram.com/palomaflira/

Videographer/Photographer : Marilia Marasciulo, Bruno Oliveira Mazzoco
Producers: Shannon Lane, James Thorne
Editor: Ethan Edwards

LxC4z1dyj4M.title: I Married A Man On Death Row | LOVE DON’T JUDGE
LxC4z1dyj4M.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

THIS woman has moved countries to marry a man on death row. Sigrid, 39, lives in Florida with her nine-month-old son. She is a long way from her native home of France, where she once had a large support system of family and friends. Since moving to the states three years ago to marry a man on death row her life has been turned upside down. Her husband Alan is in a prison a one hour drive away from her, where he has been incarcerated for the past 15 years for first-degree murder and robbery. Sigrid explained how they met: “I started writing to prisoners because I believe in second chances and rehabilitation.” She became Alan’s penpal, only looking to be his companion, however, after conversing for months, their relationship began to evolve. “When I started to realise that I was having feelings for him, and him for me, we both got scared,” she said. “We tried to stop writing to each other, [but] we were both miserable. After six weeks, he wrote back - the first words were, ‘I love you'.” 

Videographer: Gerrit Messersmith
Producer: Kate Moore, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Marcus Cooper

C8jXk_cJCEo.title: Revealing My Next Plastic Surgery To My Daughter | My Extraordinary Family
C8jXk_cJCEo.description:
FITNESS influencer and OnlyFans model, Tracy Kiss, receives judgment at every turn for her love of plastic surgery. What some call an obsession, Tracy says is a necessity, and the mum of two has spent in excess of £70K on an endless list of operations. Although she loves being a mum, Tracy hates what it has done to her body. Since giving birth she has subsequently had a designer vagina worth £5K, regular stomach tightening sessions to get rid of stretch marks, and a third boob job. Despite the criticism she faces, there’s no-one Tracy will listen to, not even her own children Millie, 13, and Gabriele, 8, who tell her she’s beautiful as she is. Next up, Tracy wants to get eyelid surgery at a whopping £4k, and she’s not told anyone yet…

Videographer: Billy Lucas
Producers: Joel Ross, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Garry Sykes

G6sk855HAM4.title: Ken Doll To Barbie: How Will My Friend React? | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
G6sk855HAM4.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

JESSICA ALVES, formally known as Roddy Alves, is a worldwide media personality who continues her sensational journey to becoming a woman - and now, she's revealing her new image to her close friend. Last year, Jessica had face feminization surgery, a nose job, lip lift and breast implants to continue her 'perfect' look. Although, when it comes to fashion, Jessica finds it hard figuring out what woman she wants to be. "My decision making about what to wear is very difficult! Being a female and being a woman, there are so many styles and colours and textures to choose from! It is very difficult." Jessica loves going into shops, trying on outfits and seeing what the latest trends are as well as spending time in beauty salons to keep up with her beauty regime. “I live a very healthy lifestyle, I eat very healthily and I use good moisturisers. But I love going to beauty salons to have my hair, lashes and nails done. I have been transitioning for a year so this is all very new to me." 

Follow Jessica here: https://www.instagram.com/jessicaalvesuk/

Videographer / Director: Marcus Hessenberg
Producer: Dav Rich
Editor: Pete Ansell, Kim Nguyen

aJGEhUyy5to.title: 3ft Man To Become World's Smallest Doctor | BORN DIFFERENT
aJGEhUyy5to.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AT JUST 3ft tall and weighing only 15kg, Ganesh Baraiya is set to become the world’s shortest doctor. However, his route to success was far from straightforward. The son of a farmer in Gujarat, India Ganesh was initially denied the right to study medicine by the local government and the High Court. Undeterred, Ganesh and his family appealed that decision in the Supreme Court, who finally ordered Ganesh’s admission to the college. ugRrHRsXnVs.title: Dumped For Being 'Fat' - Now I'm On OnlyFans | BRAND NEW ME
ugRrHRsXnVs.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AT 220lbs, Miriam Blanco from Houston, Texas, was body shamed by her first husband - claiming she was too fat and she was lucky he had stuck around. Over time, their relationship broke down; Miriam blamed herself and wished she was slimmer. In 2015, Miriam suffered a horrific car crash and was told she had a 50/50 chance of being able to relieve the pain on her spine. Miriam told Truly: “I didn’t want the pain medication, I already knew the pain medicine wasn't an option so I decided to beat the pain through exercising and eating right." Miriam saw this opportunity to get the body she always wanted. After three months, Miriam's weight started to drop, her self-esteem grew and her back pain improved. Miriam found new confidence since losing 70lbs from the tragic accident and last year she even started an OnlyFans account. 

Video Credits:
Videographer / director: Davin Fitch
Producer: Dav Rich  
Editor: Cecilia Brunelli

N37wQwqYt0w.title: Brazilian Ken Doll Spends $80K On 'Perfect' Face | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
N37wQwqYt0w.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AN influencer gets called a ‘monster’ for his $80k cosmetic transformation. Júnior Beviláqua is a model from Brazil who has "lost count" of the number of cosmetic procedures he’s had in pursuit of the “perfect look”. He told Truly that he sees himself as the “Brazillian Ken doll” who has “invested” $80,000 so far on his quest to appear ageless. Surgeries he’s undergone have included liposuction, two nose jobs and jaw reconstruction. He has regular monthly top-up procedures for his appearance, including Botox, peels and fillers. Júnior is an “aesthetic influencer” on social media so has to keep up a youthful look for his business. His many followers praise his glamorous look, but he has faced criticism from “haters.” He explained that people call him a “monster, horrible and deformed".

Follow Júnior here: https://www.instagram.com/jrbevilaqua/

Videographer / Director: Kadeh Ferreira
Producer: Kate Moore
Editor: Akash Beri

h5YTXA9H4Oo.title: I Was Born With A Third Arm On My Head | BORN DIFFERENT
h5YTXA9H4Oo.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

37-YEAR-OLD Kelly Lynch has two spines as a result of being born with an underdeveloped conjoined twin. The San Francisco based standup comedian explains she was supposed to be a conjoined twin, but her twin did not develop in the womb. As a result, not only does Kelly have two spines, she was also born with a third arm attached to the back of her head and has one eye instead of two. Over time, her two spines have formed a helix shape, which means Kelly has a condition called kyphoscoliosis; an unusual curvage of the spine. The severe scoliosis has most probably resulted in Kelly being only 3ft 10" tall. The curvage of Kelly’s spine also resulted in pulmonary arterial hypertension, which causes shortness of breath and heart palpitations; she now uses 24/7 breathing support. However, Kelly will not let her severe health issues stand in her way, she tells Truly: "Initially the doctors told my parents I would not live past a year, and I really showed them! I’m 37 now.” Kelly loves going to gigs with her friends and is building up an impressive following on social media, which she uses for her comedy and disability awareness. Kelly adds: "I don’t let my disability limit what I love to do.” 

Follow Kelly here:
https://www.tiktok.com/@toolowfrontrow
https://www.instagram.com/toolowfrontrow/ 

Videographer: Elie Khadra
Producers: Stephanie Stijkel, Ruby Coote
Editor: Ian Phillips

iLCzExb-S60.title: Identical Twins Work Their Abs Back Into Shape | MIAMI MUSCLE
iLCzExb-S60.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

CROSSFIT twins Pamela and Paola Del Hierro are keeping fit through healthy sibling rivalry. 43-year-old identical twin sisters Pamela and Paola, also known as the “Iron Twins” are both Miami based personal trainers. “Being twins we always have that healthy competition, always trying to beat each other,” Pamela told Truly. Having started their fitness journey in their early 30s, the sisters initially specialised in crossfit. However, since having had their children, they have now added pre and postnatal exercising to their list of expertise. Both Pamela and Paola have a 3-year-old son, falling pregnant at the same time. 10 months ago Pamela had another daughter, and she’s now working hard on getting back into shape. 

Video Credits:
Videographer / director: Gerrit Messersmith
Producer: Stephanie Stijkel
Editor: Shiona Penrake

qKj6tUxDzjE.title: Barbie Mum Spends $150K On Plastic Surgery | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
qKj6tUxDzjE.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A MUM has spent $150,000 on nine major plastic surgeries and 500 procedures to transform her body - and she’s "nowhere near finished". Elaina Starr is not your "average soccer mum". She admits that her schedule “revolves around everything beauty”, and plans to keep going with her extreme body transformation, despite suffering health complications. The 32-year-old from Queens, New York has explained what got her hooked. “The very first cosmetic surgery was a nose job. I woke up and there was instant gratification, I realised that I can transform into whatever I wanted.” Now she has regular Botox and silicone injected into her face. Her more extreme surgeries have included three Brazilian butt lifts, two tummy tucks and a corseting procedure. Her plastic obsession has even caused her major health issues. “I've passed out and almost bled to death in an ER, I have an open wound on my back from when my butt implants went in that didn't close.” She is determined to continue getting surgeries, despite her family being unsupportive of many of her decisions.

Follow Elaina here: 
https://www.youtube.com/user/omgiitsjuicy/videos
https://www.instagram.com/elainastarrxx/

Videographer / Director: Marcus Cooper
Producer: Kate Moore
Editor: Marcus Cooper

CTTYwhZ7948.title: We're Raising Our Kids With No Gender | MY EXTRAORDINARY FAMILY
CTTYwhZ7948.description:
A THROUPLE are bringing up their two-year-old baby as 'theyby', a term that refers to gender neutral parenting where the baby isn't outwardly identified by its parents as either a boy or a girl. Baby Sparrow follows in the footsetps of their 10-year-old sibling, Hazel, who was initially brought up as a girl but came out themselves as non-binary aged just four. Hazel and Sparrow are looked after by three parent figures: Ari, Gwendolyn and Brynnifer, who themselves are either non-binary and/or transgender. While the family, from Orlando, Florida, lives within a supportive community, online critics have argued it’s no wonder the children are ‘confused’ about their gender. 

Follow their story here:
https://www.facebook.com/thearinotsorry

Videographer: Gerrit Messersmith
Producers: Rafaela Kuznec
Editor: Tom Buckman

eiMo2E9C0AQ.title: They Call Me 'The Man With No Face' | BORN DIFFERENT
eiMo2E9C0AQ.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A MAN was born with such a severe case of facial tumours that he no longer has a face. Latif Khatana, from Jammu in India, has suffered from Neurofibromatosis since birth - a condition that causes tumours to grow on nerve tissue. Though Latif's tumours grow all over his body, unfortunately the largest ones are on his face. With both his eyes covered by the large folds of skin, Latif has lost most of his eyesight. After having suffered years of abuse for his condition, Latif is now a happily married father of two. Him and his wife Salima, who was born missing a foot, bonded over their disabilities. However, the parents are still afraid that their daughters might one day start showing signs of Latif's condition. 

Videographer: Haziq Qadri
Producers: Giacomo Brunelli, Ruby Coote
Editor: Ian Phillips

WITH the 'biggest breast implants in the world', Martina Big has now transformed herself into Jessica Rabbit. Martina, 32, from Trier, Germany has previously appeared on Truly with her extreme body modifications, including injections to darken her skin and large, expanding implants in her breasts. Her latest transformation project is to become a living cartoon character, her idol - Jessica Rabbit. Martina told Truly: “Since we filmed last, I changed my African curly hair to bright red. Martina explained why she felt it was integral for the transformation, “I have some parts of the Jessica look, but I need to make them more extreme.”

hIqmcMSgRIM.title: I've Perfected My Butt - Now For My Abs | MIAMI MUSCLE
hIqmcMSgRIM.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

FITNESS influencer and twerk master Starr Hawkins is getting back into the Miami fitness scene. Having spent the summer in the much colder London, UK, Starr has recently returned to the sunny beaches of Miami, Florida. Starr tells Truly: “I had a great time in London, but Miami is home for me.” However, Starr is well aware that out of sight out of mind, means she needs to make sure her long standing fitness network in Miami knows the glute goddess is back in town. Starr explains: “It is so important to network with other fitness trainers and influencers because everybody has their own audience and you’re kind of like mixing those audiences together.” Meeting up with friend and fellow fitness influencer, Vanessa Meija, the two women have plans to create fitness content for social media together. Starr adds: “We are both really big on social media, we use it as a way to promote ourselves and our fitness brands.”

Video Credits:
Videographer / director: Gerrit Messersmith
Producer: Stephanie Stijkel, Charley Sutton
Editor: Beth Angus

XguhyLGgirI.title: Twins Lose 290lbs To Become Ripped Instagram Stars | BRAND NEW ME
XguhyLGgirI.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

WITH a past combined weight of 665Ibs, Kalvin and Angelo Sanders, aka ‘The VisionTwins’, have lost a whopping 290Ibs together. Growing up was incredibly tough for the twins, who were labelled 'big kids' and kept gaining weight. Kavlin told Truly: “Our biggest time of our lives was 16-17 years old. We were extremely obese." The twins had no control over what they both would eat and due to their mum’s work, Kalvin and Angelo had to look after themselves. However the buoyant duo have not only shed the pounds, they have also created their own brand, ‘The VisionTwins’, to help and inspire other young people to lose weight.

QsLihZeX7Mg.title: How I Use Make-Up To Emphasise My Scars - Not Hide Them | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
QsLihZeX7Mg.description:
Uwe Westmeier, 19, from Oklahoma City, was just one year old when she was in a house fire and suffered over 40% burns on her face and body. She had to undergo multiple surgeries and was left with scars on her face and arms in particular. Growing up, Uwe would cover up her arms and legs and never wanted to wear short sleeves or shorts that would reveal her scars. But now the beauty enthusiast sees her scars as something to celebrate because they tell her story of survival and no longer hides them. Uwe uses her Instagram and YouTube accounts to post bold makeup looks and makeup tutorials without covering up her facial scars in layers of foundation. Here she shows how to create a colourful eye look using a rainbow palette of powders - and sticky tape. 

https://www.instagram.com/princessuwee/
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAW_aijXfnp9EDz6ivC8LOA?app=desktop

bLRMKWg-0mE.title: I Met The Woman With The Botched Butt | MIAMI MUSCLE
bLRMKWg-0mE.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

FITNESS influencer Rahki Giovanni gives booty shaping advice to Courtney Barnes after her surgery to remove her 59" butt. Courtney, known on social media as Ms. Miami, has previously undergone three rounds of illegal butt shots to increase the size of her bottom. Her booty has helped gain her the notoriety she enjoys today. But after years of sporting a larger than life behind, 36-year old Courtney no longer felt her booty portrayed the woman she inspires to be. Not knowing what was injected into her bum, it took Courtney five years to find a surgeon to take on the challenging task. Since then, Courtney has undergone 10 rounds of invasive surgery removing 12 inches from her hips and 30lbs of scar tissue and fat from her behind. Now that Courtney has had her surgery, Rahki has offered to help Courtney maintain her Ms. Miami status by showing her that with some hard work at the gym, anything is possible. 

Video Credits:
Videographer / director: Carlos de Varona, Ariel Martinez
Producer: Stephanie Stijkel, Charley Sutton  
Editor: Beth Angus

avoBG_xRzx0.title: I've Spent 30 Years Trying To Solve My Mom's Murder | CHASING JUSTICE
avoBG_xRzx0.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A GRIEVING daughter has spoken of her 30-year search to find the ‘serial killer’ behind her mother’s murder. Melissa Silva-Delgadillo, was just four when her mother Deanna Butterfield, then 21, was raped, strangled and dumped in Tilden Park, California in 1987. The police investigation, initially hampered by heavy rain, led nowhere and the case eventually went cold. But Melissa, who only learned the facts of the killing as a teen, refused to give up and promised to solve the case herself…

Video Credits:
Producer/Director: John Balson, Susan Tan
Edit Producer: Ruby Coote
Editor: Garry Sykes

ozb6RbqlSD4.title: World’s Longest Streamer Hits 2100 Hours - And Counting | TOTALLY GAME
ozb6RbqlSD4.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

SHARING his entire life with the world has become the norm for a Twitch streamer who says he lives the “real-life Truman Show”. Ronald Gardiner Jr., who goes by ‘GPHustla’ online, says he has the world record for the longest ever stream with over 2,700 consecutive hours of live streaming since August 2020. The Rhode Island-native plays a variety of video games but also takes his streaming community with him on his mobile phone when he takes showers and even lets them watch him sleep. Ron, 35, told Truly: “I’m in euphoria when I’m streaming. It helps me forget about my stress. A lot of people wonder ‘how do you do it with people watching you sleep?’ But everything just feels amazing. I feel I’m where I belong. This is what I should be doing. I feel like I'm going to be 60, 70 years old and still streaming.”

Ron can be found on Twitch at: https://www.twitch.tv/gphustla

jDflX966sb4.title: Family Of 9 Live Off Grid To 'Reject Society' | MY EXTRAORDINARY FAMILY
jDflX966sb4.description:
AN OFF-GRID family say the reason for moving away from city life was to remove themselves from the “negative things of the world” - such as the public school system and western medicine. Kip Smyth grew up in Thousand Oaks, CA, as a 'city boy'. He worked as a manager at a retail store and hated the consumer culture that came with it. So Kip and his wife Carrie researched the best place to relocate their family to a sustainable way of life. They landed on the Ozarks, and seven years ago bought the land for their dream to become a reality. The family-of-nine now live in a 500sq. ft. tiny home where they keep dairy cows, chickens and turkeys. Kip told Truly: “I'm pulling my children out of the negative things of the world. If you look at what's happening in America right now, the kind of craziness, it's not getting a better society.”

Videographer: Nathan Johnson
Editor: Thom Johnson 
Producers: Nathalie Bonney, James Thorne, Kate Moore

Follow their story here:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCx4UESQRB_o6egRHYjkOeWA

4Sh7_RYyhS0.title: Actress With Facial Difference Redefines Beauty | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
4Sh7_RYyhS0.description:
A WOMAN who was born with a rare genetic disorder that causes craniofacial deformities has fulfilled her dream of becoming an actress. Alison Midstokke was born with Treacher Collins Syndrome and despite numerous reconstructive surgeries on her face, as well as additional surgeries to correct her speech and hearing, she has dreamt of becoming an actress since she was a little girl. When Alison moved to New York to follow her dreams, the aspiring actress struggled to be accepted in a big city: “I remember when I moved to New York City - it was very volatile.” But despite the challenges she faced, Alison never gave up and embraced her unconventional beauty - she started auditioning for movies and has recently played the supporting role in Happy Face where she was also nominated for Best Supporting Actress at the Canadian Screen Awards. 

Follow Alison here:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/alisonmidstokke/
Website: https://www.alisonmidstokke.com

Video Credits:
Videographer / director: Marcus Cooper
Producer: Rafaela Kuznec, Ruby Coote
Editor: Sarah Galpin

FPt-dtnRaJg.title: Is This Miami's Fastest Personal Trainer? | MIAMI MUSCLE
FPt-dtnRaJg.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

MALCOLM claims he is no ordinary personal trainer - and he’s going to prove it by challenging himself to running 23mph. The fitness influencer from Miami, Florida, left college wanting to be a businessman. But found himself getting into personal training when he saw what he could bring to the industry. Using his college football and track training, he helps people slim down but maintain their strength and power. Malcolm’s hardcore regime sees him training seven days a week - working with clients from 5am to 5pm. On top of that, is Malcolm’s ‘gift of speed’, which saw him run 22mph on a non motorized treadmill two years ago. But can Malcolm beat his treadmill challenge by running 23mph? 

Video Credits:
Videographer / director: Carlos de Varona
Producer: Charley Sutton, Ruby Coote
Editor: Beth Angus

RlbeqbU4mHY.title: I'm A Real Life Red Devil | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
RlbeqbU4mHY.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A FATHER who is almost completely covered in red tattoos regularly gets called the 'devil'. Waldburger Pascal, also known as Toxo, is a tattoo artist from Switzerland. With 80% of his body tattooed, Toxo refers to his many tattoos as 'one big bodysuit comprising of countless small images'. He has also undergone surgical modification procedures including black eyeball tattoos, 12 body implants, scarification on the forearm, cut off ear lobes and pierced nipples. Toxo estimates having spent up to 80,000 Swiss Francs on all his tattoos and procedures. Toxo told Truly he receives a lot of criticism: "They say that someone who likes me has a bad soul or that I look like the devil."

Videographer / Director: Valentin Tripet
Producer: Giacomo Brunelli
Editor: Shiona Penrake, Kim Nguyen

vi_UPqjiWf0.title: I've Spent $50,000 To Become A 'Ken Doll' | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
vi_UPqjiWf0.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

JONATHAN DYLAN is back - Canada's very own ken doll who has spent over CA$50,000 to achieve his dream doll look. Amongst his many procedures, he's had countless lip fillers, cheek fillers, jaw fillers, chin fillers and botox all around his face. Jonathan is so happy with the way he looks now that he says he could never imagine going back to how he used to look. He even says he appreciates all types of comments on his Instagram page - including the negative ones - as they make his Instagram followers rise. Nowadays, Jonathan is a musician who is trying to become big in the music industry and is practicing choreography for his newest music video. Jonathan told Truly: "I'm so excited to be back with a completely new sound and to be able to show the world what I'm capable of doing".

Follow Jonathan here:
https://www.instagram.com/jonathandylan/

Videographer / Director: Ben Cox

dhZfN38QsEg.title: Trolls Claim My 63-Year-Old Boyfriend Looks Like ‘Shrek’ | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
dhZfN38QsEg.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

 A couple with a 43 age gap are laughing off the haters by posting TikTok videos that poke fun at their own relationship. Adrienne, 20, met 63-year-old Shafik on a business trip in Salt Lake City. In spite of their age gap and different appearances, the pair say they clicked straightaway - at first just as friends with a shared sense of humour but they have now dated for over a year. Aged 19 when she met Shafik, and still under the legal age to drink , Adrienne is younger than four of Shafik’s six children. While Shafik is 14 years older than his girlfriend’s mum. With her glamorous Instagram looks, Adrienne has been accused of only dating businessman Shafik, for his money. But rather than try to argue with the haters Adrienne and Shafik have instead turned to comedy. Making Tik Tok videos that parody the comments they get from online trolls - everything from Adrienne being a sugar baby to Shafik looking like Shrek. 

Videographer: Scott Hoon
Producer: Kate Moore, Nathalie Bonney, Ruby Cootes
Editor: Garry Sykes

8GjKAzjPImg.title: Man With No Arms Or Knees Becomes Internet Sensation | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
8GjKAzjPImg.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A YOUNG MAN who has declared himself 'Armless Freak' has become an internet sensation despite being born with missing limbs due to a rare genetic disorder. Colby Van Voorhis, 24, from Georgetown, New York, was born with thrombocytopenia-absent radius syndrome (TAR) - leaving him with no arm bones and without any knee joints. Colby recently decided to sign up to the video sharing platform, TikTok, and his profile has attracted over 200K followers after videos of him cracking jokes have gone viral. Standing at 4ft 1", Colby didn’t let his rare condition, which affects fewer than 1 in 100,000 births, define him - and has instead started embracing the things that set him apart. 

Colby's TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@armlessfreak

Videographer: Marcus Cooper
Producers: Rafaela Kuznec
Editors: Beth Angus, Ruby Coote

G75JlGIZMrs.title: I Lost 230lbs After A Seizure Almost Killed Me | BRAND NEW ME
G75JlGIZMrs.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AT 540lbs, Andrew Goldblatt fell into a deep depression due to his weight and the passing of his father. Born and raised in Long Island, New York, Andrew was always a big guy and when his father passed at the age of 15, it pushed him into a deep hole he could not get out of - he wanted nothing more than to lie in bed and comfort eat all day. Andrew told Truly: "I tried to lose weight a ton of different ways but putting back on the weight was a lot easier than expected. I couldn’t fit into most cars. I couldn’t go on rollercoasters or sit at my desk." To make matters worse for Andrew, he began having regular seizures and the turning point came when he had a seizure in his bedroom.. Due to a new food regime and intense workouts, Andrew has managed to lose 230lbs and continues to encourage others to do the same.

Video Credits:
Videographer / director: Marcus Cooper
Producer: Dav Rich
Editor: Athina Chatzidaki

95WzVU1jxUQ.title: I Can't Breathe Or Walk - But I Can Model | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
95WzVU1jxUQ.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A 22-YEAR-OLD blogger is embarking on a career as a model despite suffering from a rare generative disease. At eight months old, Vita Bernik's parents noticed she wasn’t meeting the milestones the same as other kids her age. After numerous doctor visits, Vita, from Slovenia, was eventually diagnosed with SMA (spinal muscular atrophy) type 2. With time, her muscles became weaker and weaker and various cases of pneumonia made her condition even worse, also damaging Vita’s vocal cords. At the age of 21, Vita was forced to wear a BiPAP, a breathing support device 24/7. In 2017 there was a glimmer of hope when the first ever treatment for SMA became available. However, during the initial testing, doctors found that Vita didn’t actually have SMA after all. Since then doctors have been unable to diagnose Vita properly. Vita’s illness caused plenty of insecurities during her teenage years. She told Truly: “When I got to my teenage years, I lost a lot of weight, which made me more self-conscious.” The turning point came last year, when a photographer reached out to Vita via social media, asking her to model for him. Since then, Vita has been scooped up by a prestigious modeling agency. 

Follow Vita here:
https://www.instagram.com/wheelchairsparkle/

Video credits:
Videographer: Matjaž Mrak
Photographer: Samantha Kandinsky
Producers: Stephanie Stijkel, Ruby Coote
Editor: Garry Sykes

bzphBFnVEBQ.title: I Lost 112lbs And Was Crowned Miss GB | BRAND NEW ME
bzphBFnVEBQ.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

 A FORMER 'couch potato' who lost 112lbs in weight has celebrated her achievement by being crowned Miss Great Britain. After constant binge eating and takeaways, Jen Atkin saw her weight rise to 247lbs. The 27-year-old from Grimsby, UK, felt like she was in a vicious circle. When she saw the scales read 247lbs, she was shocked into action; she ditched the takeaways, got off the sofa and started exercising. In two years she lost an amazing 112lbs. With her new found confidence, Jen entered and impressed the judges at the Miss Great Britain pageant where she was crowned the winner! Jen is over the moon with her success and hopes her story encourages others. Jen told Truly: “I feel like people can look to me and get a bit of inspiration and see that if I can do this, then they can too.”

Video Credits:
Videographer / director: Ben Brown
Producer: Emika Berry, Ruby Coote
Editor: Sonia Estal

IOnVQ4JiceI.title: I’m 25, He’s 71 -  But He's NOT My Sugar Daddy | LOVE DON’T JUDGE
IOnVQ4JiceI.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A man in his seventies has fallen in love with a woman in her mid-20s but the couple insist their relationship isn’t just about money. With 46 years between them, Fabienne and Denis have experienced more than their fair share of stares and comments when out in public. The common assumption is that Denis is Fabienne’s sugar daddy. Denis, 71, is a retired businessman who now spends his days playing the stock market. But glamorous Fabienne more than holds her own financially, working as a media personality and presenter, in Montreal, Canada. Fabienne, 25-years-old, fell in love with septuagenarian Dennis after they met at a charity event. They hit it off talking and Dennis asked for Fabienne’s number. Perhaps surprisingly Fabienne gave him her number, wanting to know more about the older man she so easily connected to. Now together for over 16 months, the couple live together and while they acknowledge their relationship won’t necessarily last long they are happy to enjoy the moments they have together now.

Videographer: Marc - Andre Lavoie
Producer: Nathalie Bonney, Ruby Coote
Editor: Shiona Penrake

_o_VGIfvNps.title: Progeria Has Taken My Teeth But Not My Smile | BORN DIFFERENT
_o_VGIfvNps.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A WOMAN who has been described as a medical anomaly has lost her hair and teeth but not her joyful spirit. Tiffany Wedekind, 43, from Columbus, Ohio, has progeria - a rapid ageing disease with an expected life expectancy of 13 years. Tiffany’s mum has the disease as did her brother, Chad, who passed away eight years ago. She has now lost her hair and her teeth as a result of the disease but is determined to continue living her life to the fullest. 

Follow Tiffany here:
https://www.instagram.com/tenacioustiffany614/

She has now lost her hair and her teeth as a result of the disease but is determined to continue living her life to the fullest. 

Follow Tiffany here:
https://www.instagram.com/tenacioustiffany614/

Videographer: Max Rodriguez
Producers: Martha Hewett, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Alex Lubetkin

NfgtKevBPGE.title: I Have 95% Burns - But I'm Thriving | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
NfgtKevBPGE.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A BURNS ‘THRIVER’ who has 95% burns to his body is now inspiring others to accept their differences. Johnny Quinn, from Millington, Tennessee, sustained life-changing injuries at just four-years-old and nearly died in a fire at his home but was saved by his older sister Leah who pulled him out of the blaze. Johnny suffered second, third and fourth-degree burns and had over 100 reconstructive surgeries. Johnny struggled to accept his scars for a long time but he is now embracing his unique look and inspires others to accept their scars. Johnny told Truly: “I'm not surviving, I'm thriving. I'm going above and beyond what I used to be doing and I'm really enjoying it and I would not go back to how it was before if that was ever an option.” Johnny, who has recently turned 21 years old, was featured by Truly in 2018 at the age of 18 when he had just started embracing his scars. 

Find out more about Courageous Faces Foundation at https://www.courageousfacesfoundation.org

Follow Johnny here:
https://www.facebook.com/Jadiant-Johnny-the-Model-Covered-in-Burns-100818784900257
https://www.instagram.com/jadiant/

Videographer: Michael Darling
Producers: Rafaela Kuznec, Ruby Coote
Editor: Ciara Cecil, Thomas Orme

5ptFPBdBpWk.title: I Lost 230lbs In Under 2 Years - And Got Ripped | BRAND NEW ME
5ptFPBdBpWk.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

WHEN he weighed 440lbs, Omar Thaher felt like he had hit rock bottom. The 21-year-old from Toronto, Canada, had grown up overweight and struggled through school as the number on the scales crept up. However, at the age of 19 and at his heaviest weight of 440lbs, Omar decided it was getting out of hand and was determined to fight for the life he wanted. Omar lost an amazing 230lbs in just under two years. As well as changing his eating habits, Omar committed to the gym and made incredible progress in his workouts and can now deadlift almost twice his body weight. Omar has shared his weight loss journey across social media, including his YouTube channel with videos offering advice and tips. Omar told Truly: “I was able to lose as much as 230lbs in under two years, and today, I'm happy, healthy, feeling strong.”

Video Credits:
Videographer / director: Dennis Porter
Producer: Emika Berry
Editor: Cecilia Brunelli

Rh0w6SDa4Io.title: Teen With Facial Difference Becomes A Model | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
Rh0w6SDa4Io.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A TEENAGER who was bullied through school because of his cleft nose has become a signed fashion model. Justin, 19, from New Jersey, was born without a fully formed nose due to a form of cleft, known as frontonasal dysplasia, a rare condition with around 100 estimated cases reported. But due to his unique difference, Justin was recently signed by New York-based agency 'We Speak Model Management' that represents models of all sizes, ages, and backgrounds. Justin was approached by the agency this year when the facial differences advocate started posting pictures of himself on Instagram to raise awareness of cleft and frontonasal dysplasia. 

Follow Justin here: 
https://www.instagram.com/_justinstewart/
https://www.instagram.com/smiling.within/

Videographer: Marcus Cooper
Producers: Rafaela Kuznec, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Shiona Penrake

P0OJTTk6mT8.title: I Lost 106lbs Without Stepping Foot In A Gym | BRAND NEW ME
P0OJTTk6mT8.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

DURING previous weight loss attempts, Grace Volsky of Kansas City, Missouri, felt shamed into working out. The 30-year-old would then put the weight back on and at her heaviest, she weighed 333lbs. Feeling disconnected from her body, Grace decided to try again after an awkward trip to Disney World, but this time she took a different approach - no gym, no calorie counting, just self-love. Grace wanted to help others on their weight loss journeys and so she became a life coach. Grace told Truly: “I’ve lost 106lbs without ever stepping foot in a gym.”

Video Credits:
Videographer / director: Nathan Johnson
Producer: Emika Berry
Editor: Sonia Estal

UlYlHpri1tI.title: My Millionaire Boyfriend Is 27 Years Older Than Me | LOVE DON'T JUDGE
UlYlHpri1tI.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

AN AGE-GAP couple have gone viral on social media after hitting back at ‘gold-digger’ comments they received from followers and from those closest to them. When 'Sillybandz' and 'Sanitizer Bracelets' founder Robert, aged 55, first came across social media influencer Sophia, aged 28, neither of them expected to fall in love... Now dating for almost two years, they are planning to get married and raise a family - even with an age difference of 27 years. 

Videographer: Sophia Spallino, Robert Croak, Kyle Nowicki
Producer: Chloe Sweet
Editor: Ciara Cecil

__60fKCGVZA.title: EB Sufferer Proves Doctors Wrong By Having A Family | BORN DIFFERENT
__60fKCGVZA.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A WOMAN who was told that she would never raise a family due to her painful skin condition has proved naysayers wrong. Shirvani Naran, aged 34, is one of the oldest surviving people living in South Africa with her condition. She was born with Recessive Dystrophic Epidermolysis Bullosa (EB), which causes “paper-thin” skin that blisters and tears from even the slightest friction. Shirvani’s form of EB is the most severe of its kind - whereby many sufferers don’t live to see adulthood.

Follow Shirvani here: https://www.facebook.com/RareFierceFabulous/

Videographer: Charles Meadows
Producers: Chloe Sweet
Editor: Alex Lubetkin

EV-vBB7I1lk.title: Conjoined Sisters Born As One, Now Thriving As Two | BORN DIFFERENT
EV-vBB7I1lk.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

TWIN sisters who once shared a body are now thriving after being separated. Erika and Eva Sandoval, 6, are formerly conjoined twins from California. When they were born, they were connected from the bottom rib cage to the pelvis, sharing a third leg. With only a 30% chance of survival, Aida, the girls’ mum, decided the risk of delivering the twins worth it.

Follow their story here: https://www.facebook.com/ArturosAngels 

Videographer: Elie Khadra
Producers: Martha Hewett, James Thorne
Editor: Ethan Edwards

WjAukHor0II.title: 75% Of My Body Is Burnt | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
WjAukHor0II.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A BURNS SURVIVOR who suffered serious burns to over 75% of his body has founded his own clothing line to help other survivors raise money for life-saving treatments. Marius Woodward was born in Romania and was severely burned at just eight-years-old when his father threw a gas can onto his mum in a heated argument that caused a house fire which took both of his parents' lives. Marius suffered third and fourth-degree burns and was put into an induced coma for two weeks. After nine months spent in the hospital, he moved from Romania to the United States to undergo treatment at the Shriners Hospital for Children in Los Angeles and was adopted by his parents in the United States. Marius, who is now 21 years old, has always maintained a positive outlook, despite his injuries. The young man is embracing his scars and inspiring others to accept their differences. He launched his own merchandise TeamMarius to help other survivors raise money for medical assistance and is hoping to start a non-profit organisation for burn survivors.

Visit Marius’s clothing store at: https://teammarius.org

Videographer: Colin Weatherby
Producers: Rafaela Kuznec, James Thorne
Editor: Ethan Edwards

WlYj4Sjkwxc.title: Twin Brothers Are The Same But Different | BORN DIFFERENT
WlYj4Sjkwxc.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

TWIN brothers Oliver and Harry are non-identical in more ways than one, but they don’t let their differences come in the way of their special bond. Oliver and Harry Beswick, aged 15, are fraternal twins from Stoke-On-Trent. The boys were born two months premature, weighing only three pounds each. Harry was born with Goldenhar Syndrome, a rare congenital defect which meant he was born with no features on the left-hand side of his face. Harry was also diagnosed with autism and has the functioning skills of a 4-year-old. Their mum, Charlie, told Truly: “The biggest thing my boys have taught me is there’s no such thing as perfect and imperfectly perfect is good enough.”

Follow Oliver and Harry here: https://www.instagram.com/ouralteredlife/

Videographer: Scott Dulson
Producers: Martha Hewett, Ruby Coote
Editor: Cecilia Brunelli

aahZVRQ6qyE.title: Mom's Bodybuilding Transformation Is INSANE | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
aahZVRQ6qyE.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A Bodybuilding mother won’t be intimidated by men at the gym and inspires other women to transform their bodies with muscles. Betsaida McAllister lives in Texas. Originally from Colombia, she once worked as an accountant and she had a slim physique in her younger years - something deemed more conventionally attractive in the country. However, after moving to the US 12 years ago she started going to the gym and began her bodybuilding career a few years later. Betsaida told Truly: “My body has changed a lot, [I was] very slim, no arm muscles.” She has competed in 25 bodybuilding shows, winning multiple competitions and has become an IFBB PRO. Betsaida hopes to show other women that you can be confident with bigger muscles too. “The most important thing is, follow your heart, no matter what other people say.”

Follow Betsaida here: https://www.instagram.com/betsy_mcallister/

Videographer / Director: Michael Rowley
Producer: Kate Moore
Editor: James Thorne

10xXcDRyFs8.title: My Twin Is Only 4ft 3" | BORN DIFFERENT
10xXcDRyFs8.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

TWO fraternal twins from Kentucky are as close as they can be – despite one being mistaken for a younger sibling due to their significant height difference. Cassidy and Caroline Carter are 23-year-old sisters from Tompkinsville, Kentucky. The pair are two peas in a pod despite Cassidy being over a foot taller than her sister. Caroline was born with McCune-Albright syndrome, a disorder that affects the bones and skin. The condition makes Caroline’s bones incredibly fragile and she has broken at least 50 throughout her life.

Videographer: Nate Spicer
Producers: Martha Hewett, Kim Nguyen
Editor: Garry Sykes

qDetf9vpUXI.title: 'Baby Ken Doll' Spends $75K Building His Perfect Body | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
qDetf9vpUXI.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A YOUNG man in Charlotte, North Carolina was only 15 years old when he got his first ever cosmetic procedure. Tyler Dyvig got hooked on changing his look at such a young age and loved being the centre of attention as he showcased his new looks. One main reason why Tyler started getting work done at such a young age is because he would hear his Mum’s dermatologist recommend that if you start at a young age, it would help break down the muscle, and once that muscle breaks down, you won’t get wrinkles. To date, Tyler has spent about $75,000 on procedures and had multiple rounds of laser treatments, bicep implants, buttock augmentation, his chin and jaw done three times, his lips done three times a year and will soon get a hair transplant.

Follow Tyler here: https://www.instagram.com/tylerkd97/

Videographer / Director: Heath Franklin
Producer: Dav Rich, James Thorne
Editor: Helen Mckee

URujQjGjJiI.title: I Lost 200lbs - And Became A Personal Trainer | BRAND NEW ME
URujQjGjJiI.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

 AFTER turning 21 in a hospital bed, Christa Sierra decided to change her ways. Christa, of San Marcos, Texas, had struggled with her weight all her life and was diagnosed as diabetic as a teenager. At 21, she contracted MRSA and the hospital stay prompted her to change. Christa’s weight had ballooned to over 400lbs and she relied on a walker before working on her nutrition and building her strength to then work out. Five months into her weight loss journey, her mum Georgia, dad Jonny and brothers Austin and Jarred were also inspired to lose weight and together the family have shed 560lbs. Christa herself has lost 198lbs and qualified as a personal trainer, helping others to get fit too. Christa told Truly: “Fitness has become a huge part of my life and I absolutely love it because I feel like it saved me.”

Video Credits:
Videographer / director: Davin Fitch
Producer: Emika Berry, Kim Nguyen, James Thorne
Editor: Ethan Edwards

THIS body modification enthusiast is determined to have the biggest stretched ear lobes in the world. Bianca Ferro, 24, from New Jersey, USA has stretched her ear lobes to 86 millimeters, however, her goal is to reach over 105 – the world record held by the current champion. She told Truly: “I want to look like a video game character, I like the idea of looking unnatural." Her collection of body mods includes a stretched labret, septum, and tattoos covering her face and body.

TqY-Q74ee9w.title: 90% Of Men Can’t Lift As Much As Me | MIAMI MUSCLE
TqY-Q74ee9w.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

Brittany “Flex” Watts is an IFBB women’s physique bodybuilder whose fitness goals are so next level, that even COVID-19 isn’t getting in the way of her training. The 31-year-old is prepping for her next big competition and we join her in the gym where she attempts to lift 360lbs. In her early 20’s, Brittany was living in her native Oklahoma, working at a bar, and “drinking every day.” But after her parents had some health concerns and Brittany accompanied them to an exercise class, she became interested in fitness and began to turn her life around. After seeing models in a bodybuilding magazine, she decided to move to Florida to begin her bodybuilding career. She has since spent the last seven years sculpting her body and becoming a pro competitor.

Producer: Dav Rich, Charley Sutton, Ruby Coote 
Editor: Beth Angus

3SMBCT72FQw.title: I Can Be A Bodybuilder And Still Be Feminine | HOOKED ON THE LOOK
3SMBCT72FQw.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A COLLEGE student has transformed her lifestyle from 'party girl' to dedicated bodybuilder - but "will never be satisfied" with her muscled physique. Olivia Rothenberg, 22, from North Carolina, USA started bodybuilding three years ago. Since then, her “whole life” has become centered around the sport. She told Truly: “I’ll never be satisfied with the way I look. It's a full-time job, I wake up, it's bodybuilding. I go to sleep - bodybuilding.” Before this, Olivia’s lifestyle was radically different. During her high school years, she would “party a lot.” Then, her boyfriend Bradley, who had already dedicated himself to the sport, encouraged her to start training. The couple now “eat, breathe, sleep bodybuilding."

Follow Olivia here: https://www.instagram.com/livrothh/ 

Videographer / Director: Heath Franklin 
Producer: Kate Moore

4J6v9m_S1Gs.title: I'm Finally Having Surgery For My 30kg Tumours | BORN DIFFERENT
4J6v9m_S1Gs.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

A MAN who was living with 30 kilograms of tumours hanging from his body has finally been offered surgery – thanks to his first documentary with Truly going viral. 34-year-old Andriadi, was born with a rare genetic disorder called Neurofibromatosis that caused mass tumours to form on his nerve tissues. For the last two years, Andriadi has found it very difficult to walk and was in pain on a daily basis. Residing in Medan, Indonesia, Truly filmed a documentary with Andriadi in May 2020 and since this film went viral online, the local Accu Plast Hospital has offered him free surgery. Andriadi and his family were unable to fund the necessary treatment before this point… But he now faces the most nerve-racking operation of his life. With such a high risk of danger attached to the complex procedure, will Andriadi pull through?

Videographer: Jefri Tarigan
Producers: Danny Baggott, Ruby Coote
Editor: Thom Johnson

UHx4KvsqcXs.title: The 3ft 9" Model | SHAKE MY BEAUTY
UHx4KvsqcXs.description:
SUBSCRIBE to Truly: http://bit.ly/Oc61Hj

Laura Alma Casados Mata, 28, wanted to be a model ever since she was a little girl but because of her dwarfism, (she’s 3ft 9") Laura wondered if it would ever be possible. Growing up in Querétaro, Mexico, Laura didn’t initially notice her height was any different to her other schoolmates until in high school they started to make mean comments, even putting her inside trash cans and lockers. She would go home crying to her grandmother who told her “you’re beautiful and you need to love yourself.” When she was 15, Laura stopped walking and came to LA to have 18 surgeries over a nine-month-period to straighten the bones in her legs so she could walk again. When she got back to Mexico, Laura decided to begin her own foundation to raise awareness of what it’s like to be a little person. She also writes a weekly column about the everyday challenges a little person faces, for her local newspaper. But even with all of her academic and advocacy achievements, Laura’s dream of becoming a model didn’t go away and in 2015, she decided to appear in a pageant – and loved it. Now she is signed to a modelling agency, LOA Models, and is the only little person on their books with dwarfism.

Follow Laura here:
https://www.instagram.com/lauracasadosmata/
https://www.facebook.com/unidosporunmundoincluyente/

Videographer: Colin Weatherby
Producers: Nathalie Bonney, Ruby Coote
Editor: Sonia Estal
